162b8(mdo): chen po 'di g.yo bar 'gyur/ bkal sa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mying brjod ma thag tu sa nges par stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten go/ sa
163a1(mdo): g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na yang / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dag rigs kyi bu de mying brjod par 'gyur ba/ de'i tshe brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo'o// 
163a2(mdo): de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar skom/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'dod
163a3(mdo): do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongasu sgom par yang shes/ bdag kyang mthong ba dang / sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug
163a4(mdo): sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces ka sol to// bcom ldan la// des ci nas kyang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham sa cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gi mthu
163a5(mdo): legs par bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag kyang rigs kyi bu de mthong bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'a das pa dag kyang skyes bu dam pa de mthong par 'tshal na/ ci nas
163a6(mdo): kyang skyes bu de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchi zhing rigs kyi bu de las brtsams nas chos zab mo bshad par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'gyur
163a7(mdo): zhing / mthong nas kyang de'i rjes su slob pa dang / sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzin de las ldang bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan na legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dra/ 
163a8(mdo): sred kyi rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas
163b1(mdo): pa lags/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i
163b2(mdo): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang / dang ba dang bal glang gi phung po'i sra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
163b3(mdo): 'chog zhes shing chos kyang ston te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de da ltar gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshe/ de ltar bdam
163b4(mdo): la bzhugs bzhin du zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bo las/ byang chub sems dpa' bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od ser gyi kha dog lta bu btang ngo // 'od de btang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi
163b5(mdo): zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam par rtol nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i/ sa la pog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la lan gsum bskor spyi bor gyis
163b6(mdo): par song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na// kang ka phyir de ltar 'od dang pa/ bdag la lan bdun skor nas spyi bor myi snang bar
163b7(mdo): song snyam du bsams pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
163b8(mdo): pa ser ge dang ngang pa dang bar klang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
164a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni steng gi phyogs su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po blta 'tshal lo// bka' rtsal pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na sor shig/ de nas
164a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang / rang pa dang / bal gling gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de'i g.yog don thams cad grub pa zhes bya des de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
164a3(mdo): bdag ni 'jug sred kyi rgyal po mthong bar 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang ba dang seng ge dang bal glar gyi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de'i tshe sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ngo // 'od
164a4(mdo): phyung ba des steng gi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba snang bar 'gyur te/ de nyid du byung bzhin du snang ste/ de
164a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub sem/ sa dpa' mang pos bskor cing / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gi/ ri bzhin du chos 'chad de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dom
164a6(mdo): gang tsam na skyes bu myig dang ldan pa gcig gis skyes bu gcig gi bzhin la rtog pa de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po/ byang chub seMs
164a7(mdo): dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang / sems gcig bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
164a8(mdo): zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten ki khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// spyan sngar 'dug go// 
164b1(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang bcas te/ lus kyi snang bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la lago zos phyag 'tshal te/ 
164b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor nas steng gi bar snang la gnas shing lus thams cad sun 'byin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
164b3(mdo): rnam par sel bas/ ji lta bu'i ltas kyis steng gi bar snang las/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa dang me tog de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'bab
164b4(mdo): cing me tog de dag las seng ge dang / ngang pa dang / bal glang kyi phung po'i sgra bsgrags de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bcom da ldan 'das la snyung ba ma mchis sam/ 'o ma rgyal tam
164b5(mdo): bzhengs pa yang ngam/ so bzhin nam/ mthu ma 'anga'/ bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes gsung zhes zer ba de 'dra pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ltas mdzad do// de na
164b6(mdo): 'khor de thams cad ngo mtshar thob par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang me tog 'di 'dra ba dag dang / sgra 'di 'dra bar yid du mchi ba sgrogs par bgyid pa su'i mthu lags shes de skad kyi tshig kyang smras
164b7(mdo): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog 'di dag char 'bab pa dang / me tog de
164b8(mdo): dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra yid du mchi ba 'byung ba su'i mthu lags bka' stsalang ba/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'i mthu yin no// gsol pa/ bcom
165a1(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa da gang na mchis bka' sachal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni
165a2(mdo): stang gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ bya dro chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang 'grogs nas nga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la lus thams cad su na 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
165a3(mdo): bar gzhog ko// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag myi gda' ba'o// bka' sanyal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mthus myi snang ngo // de
165a4(mdo): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ bad dag kyang lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i tong nge 'dzin la mnyam bar gzhag go// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
165a5(mdo): gzhag ste/ skyes bu dam pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sem ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su btsam bya'o// snyam po// de nas byang chub sems dpa
165a6(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad nas pam sel ba/ 'jas dpal gzhon nur byur ba'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bar sdung la lus kyi snang bar byas ste/ 'das dpas gzhon dur gyur ba sa
165a7(mdo): 'dis // 'jas dpas de'i sas pa su 'byin pa zus/ tu byed dasam na/ 
165a8(mdo): dpas rgyam ma 'ang sa rnams chen pan bya'i bur ba rdzi pa yod pa ro'o tu sogs pa jims snyed yod pa de byed kyi lum mamapa da khyod mati 'dzas gnon yong yang byed
165b1(mdo): yang byed de/ khyod ni de dag gi myo tsam yang myi shes so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ gal te bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de ma bskabs na bdag gis sngar sbyangs pa dag don/ 
165b2(mdo): myed do snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis/ se kol gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams so// de nas de bzhin gshes
165b3(mdo): pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' sal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin gang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba zhag khrig du 'ang grub par 'gyur ba de
165b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas se gol cig gis bsgrubs so// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyangs pa'i khyad par la ltos// de nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam da
165b5(mdo): gzhon nur gyur da pas 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag skyes bu dam pa 'di rnams dang / bya chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'tshal na bstan par gsol// 
165b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' mal pa/ 'khor de dag khyod mthong bar 'dod kyis// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gi lus ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems
165b7(mdo): dpa' slob pa sems cad rnam par ses pa dang/ bar snang de las 'bas te sa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la mgo pos kyas ma sa/ chum sems dpa' de dag dang 'grogs sde/ 
165b8(mdo): gyi spang bar byas nas/ 'jas dpal ga'ad na byung ba la 'di gad ces smras so// mthong dam/ ngas pa // dedas de zhin gshenas pa 'dun phred
166a1(mdo): pos byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' sal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag dang / 'khor 'di khyod kyi lus mthong bar 'dod kyis/ rigs kyi khyod kyis/ 
166a2(mdo): bdag gi lus ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum de dag dang 'grogs te/ gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pas
166a3(mdo): bdag gi lus ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las
166a4(mdo): slong shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong shig ces de skad smras pa/ ci 'di mying slang bar bya ba 'am/ 'on te gzugs dang / tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 
166a5(mdo): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bslang bar bya/ 'jam/ dpal gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam par myi gzhog go// tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa
166a6(mdo): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni/ mnyam par myi gzhog ldang par yang gyi byed do// 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mnyam par yang myi 'jog go// ldang bar yang myi byed na/ chos de dag
166a7(mdo): zhig bslang bar bya/ 'jam dpal gal te srong po 'di mnyam par gzhog par byur na ni/ de'i phyir bslang bar bya na/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'dis ni chung zad kyang mnyam par gzhag pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhen
166a8(mdo): chos thams cad ni g.yo zhing byed pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bkalasasal pa// rigs kyi bu
166b1(mdo): khyod kyis ming mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong zhika/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gyi tol bgyid pa'i ro gyi thog ste/ de bzhim gshegs pas khyod kyis dge ba bcab par gyis zhig ces bka'
166b2(mdo): sal pas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sring mo 'di bslang bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das bdag kri ni sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las bslang ba'i rdo myi thog mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
166b3(mdo): dag chos thams cad shes pa dang / ston pa la mkhas pa lags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/ sring mo bslang bar gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ ting nge
166b4(mdo): 'dzin gyi sems las ldang bar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// la mnyam par gzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam/ par gzhag ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
166b5(mdo): khams de ni// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ze dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa ji snyed yo da pa de dag thams cad langs par gyur to// sring mo de yang ting nge
166b6(mdo): 'dzin de las langs par gyur te/ langs nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te/ steng gyi bar snang la 'dug go// yang de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas sring mo de
166b7(mdo): steng ki bar snang la 'dug pas/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri kas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gter to// de nas 'dzam gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring mo the tsom sel
166b8(mdo): la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzidang thob pa ngo mtshar to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma gsung rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ bdag ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
167a1(mdo): thob pa ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni ma thob pas bskyed pa'o// 'jam dpal gang ma thob pa yod pa de na ni dmyigs pa yang yod
167a2(mdo): do// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni zhi ba nye bar zhi ba ste/ zhi ba ni zhi bar myi bya'o// zhi ba ni mnyam par yang myi gzhog ldang par yang myi byed do// smras pa sring mo de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa
167a3(mdo): bzhin mod kyi/ 'od kyang khyod ni ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po thob pa ste/ khyod ni sil snyan gyi sgra chen po byung bas kyang langs par ma gyur to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i chos kyi dbyings la mnyam par
167a4(mdo): gzhog pa 'am/ ldang pa ma mchis sam/ smras pa/ sring mo de ni ma lags so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci gar mnyam pa dar gzhag pa de bslang par ma nus sam/ smras pa/ de ma la/ 
167a5(mdo): so// spras pa 'jam dpal gang dag la kha dog dang / mtshan da dbyibs dang / mtshan ma mchis pa de dag mnyam par gzhon// de dgang la kha dog ma mchis/ mtshan ma mchis
167a6(mdo): dbyibs ma mchis/ mtshan ma mchis pa de dag gang du mnyam gzhog ste/ 'jam dpal de dag ni rang bzhin gyis dus thams cad du mnyam par bzhag gi/ de dag ni bslang bar mnyam gzhog/ ldang myi byed/ 
167a7(mdo): de bas na 'jam dpal gson cig/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ lha dang / myi'o sel sol snyan thams cad dkrol na/ ci yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin no// 'jam
167a8(mdo): dpal cinam mkha'i khams ni sil snyan 'di dag las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo snyam du 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ sring gyo de ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bas na 'di chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mchun
167b1(mdo): zhig sa thas par gyu/ gang la rnam par shes pa sod pa mams su 'dag so gang gis rnams par gyu rji brjod pa byed da// de
167b2(mdo): smra bar myur nas/ smras pa sring mo ci'i phyir cang myi smra bar 'gyur/ spras ci'i phyir smras pa/ rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sring mo the tsom sel ba des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
167b3(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag g.yo bar gyur kyang / rlung ni sus kyang bltar myi nus la/ de yang rnam par myi rtog/ de dag kyang rnam par
167b4(mdo): myi rtog ste rlung gi yang bdag gis shing dag bskul par bya'o// snyam du de ltar myi sems so// shing dag bdag cag ni rlur dag gis bskul to snyam du myi sems so// 'jam dpal de
167b5(mdo): bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa spyod pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad la yang bdag ni mnyam par gzhog go// ldang bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i
167b6(mdo): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa sring mo bar snang de las bobs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug la shod cig/ sring mo des
167b7(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi spyod yul du ma mchis kyi/ bdag la gzhan gyi spyod yul ni gyi 'tshal lo// smras pa sring mo khyod kyi bdag gi spyod yul gang yin// smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam
167b8(mdo): ma'a'i dbyings ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems cad thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ sems can gyi spyod pa de ji tsam pa de thams cad ni nam ma
168a1(mdo): snang las babs nas/ phyogs gcig tu pad mo la 'dug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mag pas phyag kyang gyi 'amal tshig kyang gyi lnga'o// de nas 'jas gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring na
168a2(mdo): de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring po kang khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag myi 'tshal bar 'dug ste/ gus pa ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal bdag ni kus/ 
168a3(mdo): pa ma lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar ci nas kyang byed payang myed/ myi byed pa yang myed pa de ltar bdag ma gus mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phyag bgyi ba nus so
168a4(mdo): smras pa de ma lags so// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang phyag 'tshal bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de ni ka nyi su myed de/ 
168a5(mdo): gnyis lta bur dbyer myed pa'i phyir ro// yang smras pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ smras pa mthong ngo // smras pa ci ltar mthong / smras pa ji ltar rdul tsam yang ma mthong
168a6(mdo): ba de ltar mthong ste/ de 'dra bar mthong ngo // smras pa/ de ltar mthong ba zhig mthong // smras pa/ de ltar mthong na/ chu zad kyang ma mthong ngo // smras pa/ 'jam dpral gang chung zad kyang
168a7(mdo): ma mthong na/ ci khyod myig rtul lam/ smras pa/ bdag ni myig rtul ba yang ma yin/ myig lnga dang ldan pa yang ma yin no// myig myed pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo myig ni/ 
168b1(mdo): ma skyes pa/ yang dag par ma skyes pa/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i phyir/ de ni dngos po 'am/ dngos po myed pa gang gis kyang bshad par myi bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam
168b2(mdo): dpal ci chos thams cad dngos po myed pa 'am/ smras pa/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ro bzhin ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de
168b3(mdo): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir na/ sring mo khyod bud myed kyi lus bsgyur bar myi byed/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma sA/ rnam par
168b4(mdo): ma rtog shig/ khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa 'am/ bud/ myed du gyur pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin/ no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji snyam du sems/ gzhugs
168b5(mdo): skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras pa ma yin
168b6(mdo): no// 'jam dpal de ci snyam du sems/ myig skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ rna ba dang / skra dang / l+le lus dang / yid skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// 
168b7(mdo): 'jam dpal de ji snyam tu sems/ sa'i khams skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes
168b8(mdo): pa'i khams skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yim nas/ smras pa/ ma yin no// 'jam dpal ji snyam du sems yi ke kang dag gis bshad pa'i yi ge dag tu skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dag du dmyigs
169a1(mdo): snyas pa sa yinan// 'jam 'o// das rgya la/ shu bye / 'asgyur ba myed sa nga na/ 'angs su
169a2(mdo): gal te / bdag bud myed du dmyigs sam/ skyes par mthong na ni/ bud myed kyi lus de bor te/ skyes pa'i lus blang du 'jam dpal bdag ri bu dbyed du'ang myi dmyigs// skyes par myi mngon
169a3(mdo): nade ji lta bud myed kyi lus las bsgyur bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar yang myi 'gyur/ 'jig par yang myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
169a4(mdo): stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar gyi 'brung / 'jig par myi 'gyur na/ de ji ltar na chos thams cadanadam mkhal dang mtshungs pa la/ bud byed kyi lus dor zhing skyes
169a5(mdo): lus zang bar nus par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nazhin gshegs pa ni blang ba 'am/ myi thub pa'i phyir rosa'achad par gyi 'gyur te/ yang 'jam dpal myig ni skyes pa ma yin
169a6(mdo): bud myed pa yin/ de bzhin dum pa dang / pA dang / se dang / spos bres 'du med/ bud byed pa yid do zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te// chos gang ldang skyes pa ma yin bud myed pa pa
169a7(mdo): ba de ni 'byung ba yang byed// 'jig pa yang byed do// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis ji srod nas/ zla byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ smras pa/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus
169a8(mdo): rdzisrid nas rnam par shes pa'o// smras pa/ slu ba'i skyes bu yod dag/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na ci'i gyir // de sangs/ khyod mi bzod pa skyes sam/ smras pa/ de/ 
169b1(mdo): ma yin no// rnam pa 'anam phyi na 'chad bar byed/ smras pa/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus dzum nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ de med nas bdag gis bya rtag tu sems bskyed do// dena'i phyi zhe// 
169b2(mdo): chos thams cad gyul la bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ji srid nas/ khyod kyis bya bra chub tu sems pa skyed ces sbas pa'i 'dra ba 'di ni tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci 'byor 'ing / phyi skye ba 'dod pa
169b3(mdo): bar gyi nus 'gag par kyi nus/ kadags par gyi nus kang dpag tu myed chos de ni bskyed pa 'am/ 'thag par gyi nus so// smras pa/ tshul bzhin du 'di 'dra ba ni kAng / tshul rje
169b4(mdo): gung smras pa/ mya skye ba 'di na bskyad par mya nus myi skye ba ni tshul te/ de 'dra bar 'di 'dra ba ni tshul bzhin du 'dri ba'o// yang sring mo khyod bzod pa skyes sam/ zhes
169b5(mdo): de gang sla ba bdag mi bzod pa skyes pa yang ma legs bzod pa mo skyes pa yang ma lags so// deci la phyir de/ bzod pa ni gyi dmyigs pa'i phyir bskyed pa yang sa lags
169b6(mdo): 'bril yang ma lagaso// de mas na bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags// bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// sring mo byang chub sems dpa' dod kang gi da bar mthong na/ bla na byed pa yang
169b7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dpas byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgo bar byed do// de la
169b8(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro// 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sems can kar yang yongasu mya ngam
170a1(mdo): ma bzlas ma byon pa'i rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zla bar myi 'gyur/ da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar myi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems cad byed/ 
170a2(mdo): pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ sring mo ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jam dpal myi bya/ myi byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ci'i phyir smras pa'adi la chung
170a3(mdo): zad kyang bya ba myed do// smras pa/ sring mo ci'i phyir na rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur/ smras pa/ mtshams myed pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
170a4(mdo): smras pa/ sring mo de su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang dag ye shes ma skyes myi 'jig pa'o// smras pa/ de la su zhig mos par 'gyur// smras pa/ kang mos pa'o// sring mo mos
170a5(mdo): pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mos pa la/ ni rnam par grol ba'i yon tan mchis so// smras pa/ sring mo khyod thogs pa myed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar
170a6(mdo): to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmyigs pa la ma spyod cig/ 'jam dpal kang du'ang tshags pa yod dam ce na/ de'i phyir ba dku khyod ni ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes smra/ smras pa/ 
170a7(mdo): de ma yin no// de bas na bdag ni thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa/ sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de/ ci la spobs pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ gang dag gis
170a8(mdo): rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do// smras pa/ ga tu rtogs/ smras pa/ gang du yang ma rtogs pas de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag gi
170b1(mdo): mtha' ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal yang gang dag gis la togs pa/ bdag gis rtogs pa mo// smras pa/ btu ba rtogs/ smras khams dasuH/ 
170b2(mdo): du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang dag gi khams gsum ma rtogs pa de ni khor du ma chud pas rtogs so// smras pa/ sring po 'od kyis ji srid na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// smras pa
170b3(mdo): kang gi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po// byang chub mngod par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur mod kyi// 'jam
170b4(mdo): dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang 'am/ thob par nus sam/ de/ denas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cad kyi smra bar gyurd pa dang / sring mo des 'di skad ces smras so// 'jab dpal cad kyi
170b5(mdo): smra bar bya ba'i dus la ma bab kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub ni bshad du myed na de'i phyir ci bsha dam 'tshal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi/ 
170b6(mdo): rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ston par bgyid pa ngo mtsha
170b7(mdo): na bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis yun ji srid nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ ji srid na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di
170b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji la bur 'gyur/ 'di'i myong cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsasal pa/ sring po 'das byang chub kyi phyir myang nas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig
171a1(mdo): brgya phrag kyi phrag dku bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol da pa/ sring mo 'dis kang kyi drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed// 
171a2(mdo): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags// bka' tshal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhi ge byung ste/ 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung
171a3(mdo): ba'i drung tu/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par gyur pa de dag/ bskal pa gang ga'i klar gyi bye ma snyed du bshad kyang / cha tsam yang bshad par myi 'gyur te/ sring
171a4(mdo): mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa ci bud myed du 'gyur pa lags sam/ bka' sal pa/ de ni ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i/ 
171a5(mdo): rgyas po sra dang / bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpa sring po 'di la ni bud byed ces kyang kyi bya/ skyes pa zhes bya/ dmyi bya'o// sring mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzid thong/ 
171a6(mdo): pa ste/ de ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gi lus sprul par byed do// 'jam dpal sring po 'din stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang yal ka dang / mdapa sa ji snyed yod
171a7(mdo): pa de snyed kyi bskal pa grangs pa brgya phrag stong gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu snang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
171a8(mdo): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi tshogs chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung pa'i sangs rgyas
171b1(mdo): kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar 'gyur ba 'di'i yang de bzhin te/ lhag pa myed pa chad pa myed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
171b2(mdo): sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyid pa mang pa bgyi ba mang ba ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtog par bgyid
171b3(mdo): do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ste/ de dag ni chos kyi dbyings myi zad pa'i phyir bde pa zad par myi 'gyur ro// de nas
171b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal ga/ zhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' cha lad to// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par/ 
171b5(mdo): sel ba dang ma rtsod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spobs pa 'dri ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
171b6(mdo): ba mnyam par bzhag pa gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi phyid tsam yang khyod kyis myi shes so// de nas 'khor de ni byang chub sems
171b7(mdo): dpa' las thog mar bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom
171b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems sems kyis la khyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba la bkal sa la pa/ rigs kyi bu stong gsum gi stong
172a1(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang / sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin kyi mthu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 
172a2(mdo): mo 'phrul dang / ye shes kyi brgya phrag stong kyi char yang phod do// ting nge 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog pa dang / ldang bar byed pa'i mying yang 'jam dpal gyis myi shes so// rigs kyi
172a3(mdo): bu gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu' dang / ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas the tsom sel ba dpa'
172a4(mdo): par gyur du zin kyang / de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgya phrag stong gi
172a5(mdo): char yang myi phod do// byang chub sems dpal sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhog cing ldang par bye/ da pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mying tsam yang sring mo 'dis myi shes so// 
172a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu gal te/ sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang de bzhin
172a7(mdo): gshegs pa'i gom pa 'do par yang myi shes te/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa ji ltar 'dod/ ji ltar 'jog kyi shes par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de lta ba sangs rgyas
172a8(mdo): kyi ye shes mi bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis kyi khyab pa bstan pa 'di stod pa'i ye/ srog chags brgya stong zag brgyan bcu blan byed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
172b1(mdo): sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la bka' sathal pa
172b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta bu de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs
172b3(mdo): ne gang ka'i klud kyi bye ma snyed yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs bcu na yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
172b4(mdo): pa 'dis sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ srid mo 'di ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpal gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rigs kyi bu 'dis ni shar phyogs su byang chub tu
172b5(mdo): sems bskyed du bcug go// phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du ya/ de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga nyid da ltar bla na myed pa ya/ bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
172b6(mdo): sangs rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngam/ rigs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las byang chub sems
172b7(mdo): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems bskyed du bcug ste/ ra ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcur byang chub tu sems bskyed du
172b8(mdo): bcug ste/ de dag da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho ba zhes so// dpag tu myed pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan 'das so// tshig de gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig
173a1(mdo): rten gyi khams nas pa drug tu g.yos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i che/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi skye ba'i/ 
173a2(mdo): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa yong su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs grag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byas
173a3(mdo): pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun tu gzung ngo // 'jig rten gi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas srog chags bya ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
173a4(mdo): skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun bcus ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// dge slong phrag pa cu bzhis ni zag pa las ma lus par sems rnam par grol lo// 
173a5(mdo): dge slong ma lnga stong dang lnga dang myi'i skye dgu sems can khrag khrig/ zag drug bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shakakya
173a6(mdo): thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' sal pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ gzhan la yang h+ya shod cig/ gsol pa/ 
173a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa cal ba/ ma pham pa ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi'i tshe/ gyod pa
173a8(mdo): 'gyur bar khyod la btang ngo do// ma pham pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs
173b1(mdo): pa 'tsho ba zhes pa ji snyed pa dang / gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ba dang / yongasasu brtag par bzung na/ sems can thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs

173b3(mdo): rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te slar zhugs par gyur la/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas rim gro byas/ 
173b4(mdo): sti stang byas mchod pa byas shing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang yun de snyed du mchod pa byas na/ byang chub se dmas dpal bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram// ma pham
173b5(mdo): bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dpe 'di tho sa nas/ sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar bas/ da nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// bcom
173b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' sacal pa/ ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin par byed pa/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed cing
173b7(mdo): chung ngu na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang shin tu bsrod na ma sa mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ma pham pa nga da mya ngan las 'das nas/ gang bud myed la la zhig kri
173b8(mdo): sring mo the tsom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos sam/ chung ru ngu na chos kyi rnam grangs
174a1(mdo): 'di thos na/ de nyid de'i lus za bar gyur te/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang gyur du/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas
174a2(mdo): nan/ 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa ma yang 'gyur ro// kyi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su song bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
174a3(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mngal du myi gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bud myed gang dag bdag cag gi phyir thos pa de yon tan 'di dag
174a4(mdo): dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bkalas lad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa
174a5(mdo): dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal/ pa la mngon par dka'o// sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba
174a6(mdo): theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / n+ya kar18skad du/ a r+ya sa ha be ri ha ra ka na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i
174a7(mdo): le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal
174a8(mdo): byed kyi tshal 'gon myed zas byin gi kun dga'ang ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po sto pa nyis brgya lnga bcu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpal brgya stong mang po
174b1(mdo): dang yang thabs gcig go// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po dang yang thabs gcig go// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma brgya stong mang po dang yang thabs gcig go// phyi mdzad kyi

174b3(mdo): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs gcig go// de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi na
174b4(mdo): du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gtam// srid yod bde dang sdug bsngal te/ zad na rten yod ma yin no// de ltas bde stug spangs ba'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde// zhes ston
174b5(mdo): bar mdzod do// 'di ltar smras pa ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa// dge slong lnga pa rgya tsam dang tha/ bas gcig tu bzhugs so// zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs
174b6(mdo): brjod par bya ste/ ci'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par grags pa'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang / 'khor po'i gtso bo dang ldan pa/ 'khor rtag tu myi byed/ 
174b7(mdo): ba rmad du byung ba'i chos dang cho 'phrul mang mnga' bo zhes sgra grags// gal te de ltar na ni 'khor lnga brgyar zad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bye ba can du 'gyur ro// yang 'dir smras pa gdul
174b8(mdo): ba thams cad la/ mara' sgyur ba'i stobs mnga' bas// mnyan yod na de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// zhes tshig tu gsungs pa/ ci dpar ni
175a1(mdo): mas bu khur du thogs te rang gi yul nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba na rang gi bu spo bsring ba'i phyir/ bu grong 'di nye'o zhes de lta bu'i tshoka smra ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom
175a2(mdo): ldan 'das 'gro ba rjes su srung ba rnams dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs gcig go zhes bya ba yin nam zhe na/ de dag la smras pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi gtam 'di ni lan gsum du bzlas pa
175a3(mdo): yin te/ de bas na dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ba de dag ni skyes bu'i gtso bo rnams yin par rig par bya ste/ don gzhan ni ma yin no// dper na khyu mchog re re la yang ba lang gi tshogs
175a4(mdo): yod pa bzhin du skyes bu'i gtso bo la yang slob ma lnga brgya yod/ do// re re la yang slob ma lnga brgya yod do// de lta ba/ sa na nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 
175a5(mdo): 'od srung chen po dang / de bzhin du kun dga' las rdzogs pa/ nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam po thams cad kyang dag bcom pa zag zad pa nyon mongs pa myed pa dbang du gyu rad pa/ 
175a6(mdo): glang po chen po cang shes pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phur bor pa/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid bkur
175a7(mdo): tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa rjes su thob pa/ myi slob pa slob pa rgyun tu
175a8(mdo): zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas las rdzogs pa/ dpag tu myed pa rnams dang / zag pa'i chos can gi dge slong gi tshogs du ma dag dang / 
175b1(mdo): son tan pa rgyas dang ldan pa'i bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kyang su pag tu byed pa phyogs btsun pa lags pa gang yin pa de dag gnod kyang 'jam dpal sa gtogs pa bcis ma'
175b2(mdo): nam bcis mkhan gyi spo ba mas kyang bgrang bar gyi nus shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang kyi nus pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chum
175b3(mdo): mas pa' ses dpa' chen po snyanashes dbang byag 'jas da ma gyur pa dang / zla rlabs sus dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sa sa tshogs pad
175b4(mdo): chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad byed cing grangs myed pa dper na shing chen po snang po 'i zhi shun rnams de 'byung ba de bzhinadu/ sa chen po 'dri shur ba bzhin du dngul ba'i byang chub sems
175b5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed cing / grangs byed pa kar yin pa de dag gi tshad kyang / rtsis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan ki sde chen la ka togs pa rnams kyis kyang
175b6(mdo): brjod par myi nus pa lhags pa rnams dang / sring po'i tshigs dge slong des ma las mtshogs pa dang / mi dgas 'dzin khyi ma sa ka dang btsun mo 'phreng ldan pa las satshogs ste/ 
175b7(mdo): dge bsnyen ma du ma dang / khyim bdag bzang sbyin las rdzogs pa dge bsnyen du ma dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyi kur la
175b8(mdo): sa ma ldan 'das chos kyin gang / denas de'i sa go sa la'i rgya mchags sa mams pa bang mam ldan
176a1(mdo): kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de rang gyi lam nas langs pa dang / rgyal po gshegs so zhes rnga bo che chen po dag ni rdung dung dag 'bud gdugs dang / 
176a2(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba dag ni nam mkha' la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin kun tu snar ngo // bcom ldan 'das mkhye nad bzhin du rmed pa yin pas de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis
176a3(mdo): kun dga' bo la bka' sa \u0f7flad pa kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po dag gi sgra dang / dung dag gi swa grag pa 'di na rtse zhig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sa skyong ba'i
176a4(mdo): rgyal po gsal rgyal dam pa 'dir mchi ste/ de'i rnga bo che dag bdudzes pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa lags so// bka' saHlad pa kun dka' bo ci'i phyir rnga bo che'i sgra 'byinang
176a5(mdo): gsol pa rgyal po shag kya'i mgon po ste/ zhing mchi ba des rang dpung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'deng gis chos shig ces go par bgyis pa lags
176a6(mdo): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHya dpa/ kun dka' bo khyod kyis kyang / chos kyi rnga bo che chungs la chos kyi dung bus shig dang / ngas de nas rnga bo chen po zhes bya ba'i
176a7(mdo): chos kyi mdo bshad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnga che chen po zhes bgyi pa'i mdo sngon nam yang ma thos lags na/ rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba'i chos de rtsi la kas/ 
176a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa sa lang ba kun dga' bo ci khyod kyis shes par 'gyur snyam 'am/ re shika phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams
176b1(mdo): cad kyis kyang 'di ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo'i yig 'bru bzhi tsam yang myi shes na/ khyod kyis lha sngon ma thos pa ji ltar shes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di de ltar rnyed par dka' ba ni
176b2(mdo): mtshar che lagaso// de bzhin gshegs pas bkal chal pa// kun dga' bo mdo 'di ni shi nad tu rnyed par dka' ste/ kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'dini// 'di lta ste dper na/ 
176b3(mdo): 'jig rten na me tog u tum 'ba' ra rnyed pa bzhin no// gsold pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags// 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid ma lags sam// bcom ldan
176b4(mdo): 'das kyis bka'asaHlad pa/ 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma dbyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad ma rnams kyi chos nyid yin no// gsol pa// gal te 'di
176b5(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid la gas na ci'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu ma bshad cing rab tu ma bstan la/ 
176b6(mdo): ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya mchog 'di dag 'dir mchis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsa lad pa/ kun dka' bo dper na/ 'di na dge slong dgon pa 'ga'
176b7(mdo): zhika/ ri bo 'am 'bab chu'i 'gran 'am/ phuka cig na 'dug 'dug pa las nam nangs nas krong ngam grong khyer zhig tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba na/ des sprul 'am/ khyi 'am gyi zhi ba'i ngo 'am
176b8(mdo): shi ba'i ro gang rung ba mthong ngo // des de mthong nas e ma ho kyi hudas ma'o kyi hud bdag kyang yun ring por 'khor par ba na/ 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas/ da srid da
177a1(mdo): mi tha chad yin no zhes yid byung bar gyur to// de nas de'i dus gzhan zhig na snying dka' bar gyurd pa'i chos 'ga' zhig gis yid bde ba dang / de nas yang myi sems pa las yang
177a2(mdo): des ro mthong ste de mthong ba na de yid byung bar 'gyur nas/ de'i phyir zhing grong khyer 'am ri'am/ lung pa'i mdor rgyu zhing de de ltar rtsub na shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'amashi nas
177a3(mdo): zhag gnyis yon po 'am zhes bya ba nas khyi ro mthong nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de mthong ba kho nas 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa mngon/ sum du byed pa de bzhin du
177a4(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams stug bsngal kyi gtam yang myi gsungamyi/ rtag pa'i gtam yang myi gsung bdag myed pa dang / myi
177a5(mdo): gtsang ba'i gtam yang myi gsung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de dag gi chos nyid yin te/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag gis dgongs pa'i don du ni
177a6(mdo): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag re shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
177a7(mdo): sems can rnams kyi don tu zhing gi snyegs ma snyigs ma lnga can kyo zhing 'di 'dra bar 'byung ba ni dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis kyang de ltar slab par bya'o zhes rab tu 'jog
177a8(mdo): bar mdzad/ 'dems par mdzad do// de nas de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed 'dod par 'gyur te/ de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 'dod pa na de dag gis de rnams la nye bar bstan pas/ de'i phyir
177b1(mdo): de dag kyi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / 'ongs nas kha cig gis ni sa dang po thob par 'gyur/ kha cig gis ni bdun dang / brkyang pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa'i bar/ 
177b2(mdo): dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bas na/ rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni shin tu snyed par dka' ba yin te/ phyogs bcu nas lpags pa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad chos nyan par
177b3(mdo): 'dod pa yang de'i phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so// thams cad lhags pa legs so// lhags pa legs so// 'di dag thams cad kyis shind tu rnyed
177b4(mdo): bar dka' ba'i mdo 'di 'dra bar thob par gyur da cig/ bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' saHladra pa/ kun dka' bo thams dad kyi thun mong ltar mdo 'di thun mong ma yin pas/ lpags pa
177b5(mdo): legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig// gsold pa// pa com ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad lhags pa legs so// zhes myi baphyi ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las la
177b6(mdo): pa kun dka' bo mdo 'di ni zab cing rtogs par bka' ba/ yid ches shing dang par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi gas papa yin te/ kum dgal ba de'i phyir 'ongs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa thams cad
177b7(mdo): la lpags pa legs so// lhags pa legs so// zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lags// yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal g.yul 'byed pa'i
177b8(mdo): dus su rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa dang kham dkrol rdebs pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyi ma lags sam ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las sa la la// kun dka' bor po che de
178a1(mdo): nyid gang gi tshe/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol tu gyi dpung dang lhan cig g.yul 'byed pa de'i dus su ci tsam narnga po che'i sgra phyung ba de'i tshe/ sems can sngo dag ni thos
178a2(mdo): nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// do ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can sngar ma'i rigs can gzhan dag ni/ sgra de thos nas de nyid kyis dag 'chi ba 'am/ 'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ro// 
178a3(mdo): kun dka' de'i phyir rnga po che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni kun dag po khyod kyis kyang myi shes so// do ci'i phyir zhe na kun dka' bo chos kyi sgo'i mdo 'di la ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
178a4(mdo): pa can rnams yid ches par myi 'gyur ro// kun dga' de lta ba/ sa na rgyu des na gang gi tshe/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsu dal 'gyed pa'i dus su rgyal po rnga bo che'i sgra 'byind pa ji ba
178a5(mdo): de bzhin du rnga po che chen po'i mdo 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi sa sang ba yin te/ sangs rgyas pa'i dus su gsungs par 'gyuraro// de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od
178a6(mdo): sru chen po pos te bros nas 'di skad ces bka' sa ldad to// 'od srung ci dge slong 'di dag dad pa can tshul dang 'thun pa mthu dang ldan pa yin nam// de'i don ci lags// bka' sa ya nga
178a7(mdo): 'od srungs ched po sems can srun pa lta bu ma yid pa de dgar po che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di nyanang par 'gyur ro// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gnas bstan me'u 'gas kyi bu chen za
178a8(mdo): mang rang la smod par ba gying cing bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bdag kyang gal te de 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mchis na de dag gi nang du mchis pa ma legs na/ de bzhi gshegs pa bzhugs pa ste kyi rlom
178b1(mdo): te dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang / myi ldan pa gang lags pa de dag ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di thams ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa/ 
178b2(mdo): tshul dang mthun pa lags te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na de dag ni tsan dAn gi snying po 'dra ba sha stag lags so// bka' saHlad pa/ 'od srung 'khor 'di thams cad tshul khrims srungs pa dang / 
178b3(mdo): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin yang / ci dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i tshig ces bgyi ba ci lags// bka' saHla pa/ 'od
178b4(mdo): srung dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gsheg/ nges pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa brtan pa zhi
178b5(mdo): pa ther zug pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyams par myi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste/ mdo 'di ni dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya'o// 'od srung myi mthun pa'i mdo dag pa 'od
178b6(mdo): gsal ba 'don sems can dman pa rnams kyis rgyu dang / gtan tshigs brgya stong gis par bya dgos so// 'od sru de lta bas na yang khyod kyis me zhig 'khor 'di rtogs shig/ de

178b8(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang la smod par byed de/ dper na/ gyad kyi tshogs chen por
179a1(mdo): rgyal po'i gyang stong thub pa zhig stan spangs te/ 'dir kho bo dang snyan cig tu 'gyed par 'os pa'i rgol po pa gang yin pa de dag tham su yod ces dril bsgrags pa dang // 
179a2(mdo): de de na rgol bar ma 'os pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag bsad par 'gyur gyis 'di dang / lhan cig bdag cag 'gyed par myi nus so// zhes rang gis rang smad nas/ 
179a3(mdo): cang myi smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas gal te/ des der gyad kyi zla ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed na de de na dpa' bo gyad zla myed du gyur cing ru mtshon 'dzugs pa de bzhin du/ de na rgya chen po ma yin pa'i
179a4(mdo): sems can nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpal gang yin pa rnams kyang bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom
179a5(mdo): ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du yang nga ni rtag pa brtan pazhi ther zug pa yin no// zhes// stonang pa ni rtogs par myi nus so// zhes 'dong bar byed do// 
179a6(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni yul ring por stong pa nyid kyi lte ba nyams par byed pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te// dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis mdo dag pa 'di thos nas
179a7(mdo): dong ngo // phyogs bcu de dang de dag nas lhags pa'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la gas du zhugs pa kang kang dag yin pa de dag dang
179a8(mdo): lhan cig tu gang dang / gang dag lhags pa de dag las kyang bcu cha'i cha dang / brgya che'i cha dang / stong mchi' dang / brgya stong go cha'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha'i cha dang / grangs byed pa'i cha'i ma gang yin
179b1(mdo): pa dag 'dug par gyur da to// de la tsa nadan gyi snying po 'dra bar srun pa lta bu'i ma yin pa'i dge bsnyen ci 'dra ba dag 'jug par gyur ce na/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa dang bslab

179b5(mdo): zhing bdag gis dge slong rnams la mchod yon gyi sbyin pa dor bar myi bya'o snyam pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i du sa ngan pa la rtag par skal pa gang yin pa de/ ji tsam zhig
179b6(mdo): yod par 'gyur zhe na/ skyes bu dpa' bo de'i zla ba byed kyis za ma gcig cig 'byung ste/ des za ma gcig po yang dge slong rnams la byin na/ bsod nams myi zad pa'i skal can du 'gyur ro// skyes
179b7(mdo): bus de ltar byin na 'jig rten du/ skyes bu dam par 'gyur bas legs 'dod byin// 'di na bdag nyid bag myed cing bya ste// de bas bstan la bag myed mchog yin no// nor ni dgra dang chom rkun
179b8(mdo): rdzogs mang dang // rgyal po chu dang me dang 'dza' bshes dang // nye du myi 'dza' bgo skal spyod mang gis// sdig pa spyad pa'i sa ni zad par 'gyur// rang dang rang gi long spyod dag la yang // spyod
180a1(mdo): spyod par byed pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi dong // spyad pa nyid dpag nod la gzhan gyis kyang // mang par kyi 'gyur zhe byad ma chos phyir// 'dir zad byas mchog pa rol par kyi 'gyur/ 
180a2(mdo): 'jig rten 'dir 'phel 'jig rten pha rol tu// zad par myi 'gyur kha dog mthun bcas byed// mthong na thams cad dka' zhing rnyed pa dang // mdog dang grags pa rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// de'i
180a3(mdo): phyug rnams nyams par gyi 'gyur zhing // de'i bran po smras byed dang / las kyi mtha' rnams nyams par gyi 'gyur te/ de la zab mo thor dang 'gyed myed cing // de ni nam yang gnod seMm
180a4(mdo): myed mchog 'thob// sbyin la dka' ba'i skye mos 'jig/ rten du// de las mtshogs pa'i yon tan 'thob 'gyur/ pas// de lta bas rtag tu chos 'dod pa// sangs
180a5(mdo): rgyas rnams dang lhan cig 'phrad par 'gyur// lus dang srog la myi lta lhug par gtong // myi'i mya mchog de ni la ka rkyong yin// sems can kun la rjes su snying ba
180a6(mdo): bas// bu bzhin mthong na sdug cing rig par ldan// bsam gtan bka yod thob pas dpag tu myed// khyim na gnas pa'i shes rab can gyis ni// rtag tu de ltar bya dgos de dag
180a7(mdo): gi/ dpe ni de 'dra yang du yod pa yin yang de'i tshe/ de na dge bsnyen ma ci 'dra ba dgacig 'dug ce na/ ji tsam kha ba ma langs pa de tsam nas/ rang kyis phyags ma blangs te/ rang gi nyen
180a8(mdo): 'khor 'phyag cing/ ba'i lci ba'i byung bas sa gzhi byugs pas sa rgyan kyis ma dzes par byed pa'i legs par byed pa byed pa yin// des der bsod snyoms pa rab tu mang po 'ongs par
180b1(mdo): shes na rang kyi lag gis bzal ba dang / btung ba gya nom pa legs par rgyan tu stobs par byed cing / de dag dang bdag grong rdal lam grong khyer ram/ grong dag tu yang phrad cing 'grogs par gyur
180b2(mdo): cig/ bdag nam yang yul mtha' khob tu skye ba dang / dge ba shes gnyen dang skol sar dus stong bzhin byed par gyu rad cig/ bdag sbyin pa dang tshul khrims spyod dang / nyand pa dpa' dag chos
180b3(mdo): kyi gtam la rtag tu spyod par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i sring mo dge bsnyen ma yid rnam par dag pa ste/ de lta bu'i dge bsnyen ma'i yon tan dag yin no// de dge slong dang / dge
180b4(mdo): slong ma ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na dul ba zhi bag tsha ba myed pa zag pa zad pa/ tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / tsan dan kyi snying po nya dra ba'i 'khor dag go// de la byang chub sems dpa' chen
180b5(mdo): po ci 'dra ba dag cig zhe na thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'i chos 'dod pa dang / thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo sde 'dzind pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin
180b6(mdo): gshegs pa'i snying po phan pa stond pa/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid 'dod pa thams cad kyang dgongs pa'i tshig la byang ba thams cad kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde stond pa la sran thub pa/ 
180b7(mdo): thams cad kyang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshar gcod cing phan 'dogs par zhugs pa/ des pa rnams mchog tu gus pa/ theg pa chen po la dad pa chen po thob pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
180b8(mdo): kyi theg pa la ya mtshan du myi 'dzin pa/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rgya chen po mchog bor nas/ mdo sde gzhan gyi sgrogs pa'i shes rab can/ kang du sangs rgyas rtag pa de bzhin gshegs pa snying po yod do// 
181a1(mdo): zhes bya ba stond pa gzhan yang sgrogs shing myi spong ba/ brtan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta bas/ stong pas stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
181a2(mdo): pazer zug mchog ki gzhi de 'dod pa/ de lta bu las thogs pa'i yon tan la brtan pa dag ste/ yom tan lhag ya ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// 'od srung de lta bas na khyod kyis yan/ 
181a3(mdo): gnyis// lan gsum du yang 'khor sol cig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bltas shing brtags te bas lang na sbun pa lta bu'i skyes
181a4(mdo): bu lhag ma'i 'khor dag yod par gyu rad to// yang lan gsu ma gyi bar du gsal pas bsal ba na skyes bu sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa sha stag tu gyu rad to// de nas bcom ldan
181a5(mdo): 'das kyis gnas gtan 'od srung chen po la bkalasaHlad pa/ 'od srungs de 'khor 'di dag dag pa snying por gyur da pa yin mod kyi yang sangs rgyas yang bcom ldan 'das
181a6(mdo): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'od srung 'azhor 'di legs par sbyangs pa legs so legs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor yongs su spyad pa lags// stond ka'i zla ba nya ba rnam par
181a7(mdo): dag pa bzhin no// 'od srung dper na pakyis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas sngon gyi sdom pas bsdams pa la 'god pa'i chas phrin lhag ma kar yin pa de 'dug pa/ ji lta ba bzhin
181a8(mdo): rtsa 'khor lhags pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ces bya ba nas/ grangs myed pa dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/ 'od srung de dag las bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha ga bdag yin pa ni
181b1(mdo): myi mchog bag tsha ba myed pa'i 'khor 'dug pa 'di dag yin gyis/ 'od srung 'khod kyis da yang 'khor rnams la grogs po dag ci khyed cag rnga bo che chu po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po yangs pa theg pa gcig/ 
181b2(mdo): pa// 'di lta ste/ thag pa chen po dad par dka' ba yid ches par dka' ba 'di mnyam par nus sam zhes dris shig/ 'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 'khor rnaMs la
181b3(mdo): drise shika/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes ka so la nas de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
181b4(mdo): btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'khor mar po de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci
181b5(mdo): rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo nyan pa'i 'os yin nam de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul
181b6(mdo): 'das pa de/ khyed la stonang par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ka nas brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum du yang / bskul ba bskulang ba dang de rnams kyis sbas pa/ bcud 'od srung
181b7(mdo): bdag cag dam pa'i chos nyand pa'i ched du/ mchis lags pas nyan par 'tshal gyis btsun pa 'od srung/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ mdo chen
181b8(mdo): 'di legs par bsgrags pa mdzad du gsol/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa ji ltar ya de ches par 'gyur/ de dag kos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung dper na/ skyes bu bcas na sa lo nyi shu lon
182a1(mdo): ba zhig la/ bu lo brgya lon pa dag yod do zhes smras la/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na bzhin du gsungs na/ bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin du yid ches par bgyi lags na/ 
182a2(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la lta smos kyang / ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas
182a3(mdo): spyan mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis gzigs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srang gzhan yang bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyend to// smras pa shes ldan dag
182a4(mdo): khyed cag ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po mnyan pa dang / klag pa dang / gzung pa dang / bstan pa'i 'os yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHlad pa/ 'od srung 'di ni rdzi
182a5(mdo): ltar skyes bu matsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i bu la brgya lon padaka ltar/ rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di yang de dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan
182a6(mdo): las 'das bzhin du/ da dung du gnas so zhes bya ba pa dang / bdag yod pa ma yin zhing bdag gi yod pa ma yin pa dag la ya ba dag ces bya bas so// de dag gis gsol pa/ de ni bcom ldan
182a7(mdo): 'das kho nas mkhyend pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du/ gzung bar bgyi lags so// 'od srung gis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas da ni
182a8(mdo): rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnga bo che chen po btung gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung bud du gsol// bka' saHla pa
182b1(mdo): 'a sring meg pa le pa/ 'di sru das khyong rngam che chen po'i mer chen pa cad // ldan 'das dbangag gis sa nyan par 'gyis nas// su'i ma de/ na
182b2(mdo): 'das kyis bdag sa 'di sa sa'od srung khyod dang / na sa 'dug gis chu shog/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'od la ma bam pa
182b3(mdo): mche mam 'tshal so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'as dang/ 'od supa leg sa legaso// ngas kyang ngan 'di'i phyim gsungs so// 'od srung dpe na/ rgyas po gas
182b4(mdo): rgyal gyis/ glang po che dang / rta dang dmag phyi rnams Sha zas dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag/ pa las thogs pas gsor 'jug go// de ci'i phyir
182b5(mdo): zhe na/ gang gi che ba dag rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung ki skra shi nad tu chen po'abyind pa dang / gtugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag sgreng ba dang / gang gi che pha rol kyi dpung gi
182b6(mdo): tshogs chen nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis gsor bcug pa'i phan yon rjes su dran nas/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur zhing/ de'i tshe
182b7(mdo): sems can rnams la yang phan pa byed par 'gyur/ bdag gi bka' la yang phan par byed par 'gyur ro// snyam ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du yongasasu mya
183a1(mdo): ngan las 'das nas yang khyod kyis po che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byind par 'gyur ro zhes ngas khyod la stan gi phyed bstabs pa yin gyis/ nges par de kho na bzhin du gyis
183a2(mdo): shika/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyod kyis thugs las skyes pa'i sras kyi thu bor bzhag pa'i rig so// 'od srung dper na ko la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang ki bu dzas la
183a3(mdo): 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdag gi rigs 'tshob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan bcos sna tshogs dang / bzo'i gnas rnams la spyod par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung khyod kyang nga 'das
183a4(mdo): nas/ mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'od srung dpe man ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal po mang pos bsngos nas/ de rnaMs dang lhan cig g.yul 'byed pa de dang de'i dus kyi dpag
183a5(mdo): myi glang po che dang / rta dang / dpung bu chung gang dag yin pa las cha bzang po bgos shing rnga bo che chen po dang / dung gi sgra thos na myi sdang par myi skrag cing bred par myi 'gyur ba gang
183a6(mdo): yin pa de dag la ni/ rgyal pos bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / zas dang skom dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhu ba dang / chas dag sbyin par byed do// de las gzhan pa g.yul
183a7(mdo): rdo zhugs nas nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pa'i dpag myi gang yin pa de dag la ni gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig las stsogs pa dang / grong rdal dang / yul rnams sbyin par byed do// 
183a8(mdo): de na skyes bu dpa' bo sde dang bcas par phyir myi ldog pa/ glang po che dang / rta ba dang / shing rta dang / ldan pas dgra'i dpung pham par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal po rang gis rigs pa
183b1(mdo): byas nas rgyal tshab du dbang bskur pa'i cod pan 'ching bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du ra'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bslab pa legs par ji ltar bcas
183b2(mdo): pa la legs par bslabs pa gang yin pa de dag dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga dang / spyod yul la gnas pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ lha dang / myi'i bde ba sbyin
183b3(mdo): bar mdzad do// de las gzhan pa phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bcud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud pa ma par byed pa gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas// 'phakra pa'i bden pa bzhi'i
183b4(mdo): rna bar grol pI gcod phan 'ching bar mdzad do// de las gzhan pA rgya chen po la lhag bA mos pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying che ba'i bdag nyid rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug
183b5(mdo): pa 'dod pa'i sems can kar yin pa de dag la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ thams/ mkhyend 'i ye shes theg pa chen po'i dbang skur pa'i gcod pan 'chi
183b6(mdo): bar mdzad do// 'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyang de ring theg pa chen por dbang bskur ba'i cod pan bcings te/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga nas rnga po che chen po'i mdo 'ang byind par 'gyur ro// de lta
183b7(mdo): bas na 'od srung khyod kyis kyang da ni nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byung ba'i rigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das re zhig bdag gis rigs pa lta rngo myi thog kyang / bcom ldan 'das re shig/ de bzhin
183b8(mdo): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/ bzhugs kyang bdag kyis byung nas bstan par bgyi lags so// bka' saHlad pa/ 'od srung legs so// de bzhin gshegs pA rnga bo che chen
184a1(mdo): pa'is ma po 'du #// de las ma da/ mas sanas kyad/ 'a sung legs
184a2(mdo): ram ca pas cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dani ga rnams dang / 'brug gi tshogs rdzas kyang / me tog gi char 'bebs shi budud pa'i rgyus gang pa'i phye ma'i char gyi rgyunang chen po yang 'bebs so// 
184a3(mdo): 'od srung khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang / thugs las skyes pa ste de bzhim gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bong 'os so// de nas lha'i tshogs dang 'brug gi tshogs kyis skad 'thun par tshigs su ba
184a4(mdo): pa'adi smras so// mnyan yod grong khyer rtag tu chen dang / dag nang tung chen dung rnams sgrogs pa na// mgon ma chos kyi ni da'is rgyal byed kyi// chal du chos kyi ched sgrogs par mdzad// 
184a5(mdo): 'od srung khyod kyis chos rnga btung bar gyis/ chos kyi rgyal po dag kyis gsungs pa'i mdo// zhu ba'i dbyug gus chos che brdungs na// lha'i lhas ni chos ma the tsom gcod par
184a6(mdo): mdzad// oM a hUM nga bo chen po'i mdo las/ 'od srung 'od 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po
184a7(mdo): la 'di skad ces bka' sa lad to// 'od srung ngas sngar mdo 'di las kong nas kong du/ dge slong yangs pa la dad pa yid can zhes bya ba zhig yod ces bshad/ dge slong de'i mying dge slong ngam/ 
184a8(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mu ka gi zug du rnams
184b1(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ 'tsho byed kyi sku sman mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal ba rom
184b2(mdo): gyi dpag tshogs dang / lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur la de nas rgyal po g.yul shom pa na/ sman pa sman mchog bkug ste/ bkug nas 'di skad ces kye ma sman pa sman kar gyis sems
184b3(mdo): can kang dang gang dag zug rngus zug par gyu rang pa'i sems can de dang de dag ji lta ji ltar zug rngu 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sman sbyar la myur du khyer te shoka shika/ de nas sman pa sman mcho
184b4(mdo): des sman gyi rgyal po// dug sman rton pa zhes bya ba khyer nas rgyal po chen po g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i rnga bo che la sman des byug shing bdugs te btungaso// byugs shing bdugs
184b5(mdo): te btungs ma thag tu/ sems can zuka rngur zug par gyurang / pa/ kang dag yin pa de dag gis sma de/ dpag tshudadam dpaka tshad gnyis su thos na/ thos pa tsam gyis
184b6(mdo): sems can de dang dag thams can kyi/ zug rngu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ zug rngu rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong yangs pa la/ dad pa'i yid can de'i myir
184b7(mdo): thos pa'i seMs can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi/ zhe sdang dang / gti muka ki zug rngu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des nga'i bstan pa la/ mdo 'di phyung zhing
184b8(mdo): rgyas par byas te/ de bas na chos dang ldan pa mngon sum du byas pa de'i mthu'o// 'o srung ltos re shika rgyal po rnga bo che sems myed pa phal ba de yang seMs dang bcas pas sman gyis byugs shing
185a1(mdo): gdugs te/ bzungs ma thag tu sems can rnams la len pa bskyed par byed na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa la dad pa'i yod can gyi mying thos pas/ seMs
185a2(mdo): can rnaMs kyi nyon mongs par rnam pa gsum 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos// gal te de ltar re shig byang chub sems dpa'i mying thos pas/ seMs can rnaMs kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang kati
185a3(mdo): shug gi zug rngu nas 'bral bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das shig kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi mtshan brjod pa 'am/ yon tan yongasu sgrogs pa lnga spos
185a4(mdo): kyang ci dgos/ gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das shAg kya thub pa de'i mtshan tsam gyis/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gyi zug rngu rnaMs 'bral bar 'gyur ne/ 
185a5(mdo): sems can phran pa ston pa zhig gis/ rnga bo che chen po 'am do 'di las 'gres sam// tshigs su bcad pa 'am chi ka 'ag tsam 'am/ mying tsam bstand ta ma le'u bstan na/ 
185a6(mdo): sems can rnams kyi 'dod dang / zhe sda pa dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ras dge slong dag tshul khrims dang ldan pas sems kyi
185a7(mdo): smod lam 'grub bo zhes bshad do// smon las legs par byang bar byas pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rnga bo che chen po'i
185a8(mdo): mdo chen po ma byas pa ma byung ba ma 'gas pa'o// 'od srung khyod kyang de lta bas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi yang kying thos pa'i dge slong dam/ 
185b1(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa de dag dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug tu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ro// 
185b2(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung khyod kyang mdo 'di zhus nas/ yun ring por 'jig rten du 'byind par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal de lta lags na/ rnga che chen po'i mdo chen po de
185b3(mdo): las phyogs 'ga'/ tsam zhig bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ 'od srung dus la bab gyis khyod nga phyogs 'ga' zhig zhus shig/ 'od srung gyis legs so zhes gsol nas zhu ba 'di zhus
185b4(mdo): so// bcom ldan 'das/ gang na srid yod srid pa der sdug/ bsngal// gang na srid myed sdug bsngal myed pa yin// mya ngan 'das pa de ni mchog tu bde// bde stug spangs phyir mya ngan
185b5(mdo): 'das mchog 'gyur// srid pa yod na bde dang sdug bsngal te// srid pa myed na bde dang sdug bsngal myed// de phyir mya ngan 'ang sa thob 'dod pa'i// rigs kyi bu yis srid 'dod yongs su bcad
185b6(mdo): ces bka' sa lad pa 'di'i don ci lags// 'dir tshigs su bcad pas legs par bka' saHsad pa/ srid pa thams cad myi rtag myi brtan la// thams cad du yang snying po myed pas na/ srid pa gang
185b7(mdo): yin de ni sdug bsngal te/ gang la srid byed de na sdug bsngal myed// srid pa yod pa myin na sdug bsngal byed// 'di na srid yod sdug bsngal 'gyur na/ srid la mngon par dga' bar myi bya zhing // sridas
185b8(mdo): rnams la ying brtan 'gro gyi bya// bcom ldan srong dang srid pa myed pa dang // bde dang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba yod par sngo dang // de skad ces gsungs nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis brtan 'od srung rje/ 
186a1(mdo): po la/ 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// 'od srung de ltar tshig gi don 'di ni brtan pa'i tshig kyi don yin pas// re shig 'od srung khyod kyis myi shes so// sems can rnams ni phal
186a2(mdo): cher srid pa gcod par myi byed na// sems can rnams ni 'du byed skud pas brgyus// srid myed mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde// 'od srung gyis gsol pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das thob pa// mya
186a3(mdo): ngam 'das pa de myi gnasade la bde ba mying tsam ste/ myis ni myong bar 'gyur ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ tha dad pa brtan pa'i mying tsam myin// yod dang myed dang
186a4(mdo): ther zug bzhi// de byas na 'di ni nyan thos dang // rang sa ngas rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing / spyod yul ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs kyang
186a5(mdo): lags la/ ther zug kyang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bkalasaHlad pa// 'od srung dper na/ lho phyog/ sa kyi yul skya bo bcom brlag ces bya ba nas/ sems rba
186a6(mdo): gzhan 'ga' zhig yongs par gyur da la/ de kyi de la/ myi 'ga' zhig gis khyod kar nas 'ongs shes dris pa dang / de nas de'i smras pa/ kho bo ni lho phyogs kyi bcom brlag nas 'ongs so// mying
186a7(mdo): yang smras pa/ de yul gyi phyogs gang na yod/ de nas myi des 'dzub mos lho phyogs kyi nam mkha' bstan na// 'od srung myi des myi de la cig yid ches par 'gyur ram/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
186a8(mdo): so pa na de mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis ma mthong ba dad pas yid ches par gyis shig/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
186b1(mdo): kyis tshig su btsud pa 'di bka las a \u0f7f// ji ltar mkha' la mdzub mas stond ba stu // de bzhin tha rad bgying cas kyis bstan to// ji ltar gyi phyogs pa rtsam brnas kyi bzhin du// de bzhin
186b2(mdo): nga nyid rten pa myed nas byed// 'od srung 'di la don mthong na// rgyu ni dgos pa myed pa ste/ mngon gsum ma gyur nga don la mi/ chu dang rkyend kyang de bzhin no// 'od srung de ltar bsam sangs
186b3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgya du mas tha dad pa'i tshig gi don nye bar stonod par mdzad do// bka las \u0f7fsad pa/ 'od srung rgya zhes bya ba 'i yin par 'dod// gsolang ba/ rgyun byed rgyu zhe
186b4(mdo): bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa la dra pa/ rkyend ces bya ba gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ mang pa/ bcom ldan 'das rkyedad ces bgyi ba ni rten lag so// 
186b5(mdo): bka' sa sa da pa/ lho srung rigs pa'i dpe dang rgya dang nye b.rasbyar ba dang / byed rgya rnaMs kyis de ji lta bu yin pa de kho na bzhin du/ bsal bar ston da cig/ gsol pa/ bcon
186b6(mdo): ldan 'das dper na pha ma gnyis 'dus pa las bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la ni rgyu la ka so// pa ni rkyen lags te/ de lta bas na pa dang ma gnyis ni bu'i rgyu dang rkyend lags so// de bzhin du rgyu dang
186b7(mdo): rkyend kyis/ chos skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni grub pa zhes bgyi'o// grub pa zhes bya ba ci yin// grub bo zhes bgyi ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi grags pa lag so// 'jig rten zhes bya bani yin/ 
186b8(mdo): 'od srung kyis gsold pa/ seMs can dang ldan pas// btakra pa gang lags pa'o// sem can zhe bya ba ba ci yin// seMs can zhes dgyi ba ni chos kyi brdar btags pa lag so// chos shre bya
187a1(mdo): ci yin// gsol pa/ chos lags pa chos nyid dang chos kyi chos so// chos de dag kyang ni gnyi su bstand te// rna pa gnyis gang lags zhe na/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / gzug/ 
187a2(mdo): can dang gzugs can ma lags pa ste/ de las mu gsum pa ni mchis lagaso// de la chos shes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ gsol pa/ chos shes bgyi ba ni gzugs mchis pa lagaso// bka' sa \u0f7flang/ 
187a3(mdo): pa/ chos ma yin pa ci lta bu yin/ chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de yang / gzugs ma mchis pa lagaso// bka' saHla ba/ gal te chos dang chos ma yin pa/ gzugs myed cing mtshan nyid
187a4(mdo): myed pa yin na/ de la chos ni gang chos ma yin pa de ni keng // gsol pa/ chos shes bgyi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba lagaso// chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ srid
187a5(mdo): ba zhes bgyi ba lagaso// bka' stsa lad pa/ gal te de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa/ gzugs myed cing mtshan nyid myed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar ci zhig mtshan
187a6(mdo): ma gang gis 'di ni chos yin no// zhes rnam par mkhyend par 'gyur// gsol pa/ sems can rnaMs 'khor bar skyes nas/ dge ba'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs
187a7(mdo): la sten pa na// de'i tshul 'di dang de de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyad pas/ dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad kun tu skye bar bya ste/ de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyod pa gang lags pa/ 
187a8(mdo): de lta bu'i sems can de ni chos lag so// sems can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas// bsod nams ma lags pa sdig pa'i las rnams sna tshogs kun tu spyod cing / chos ma lags pa kun
187b1(mdo): spyod pa de kho na la/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i mtshan nyid de dag thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos ma lags pa kun tu spyod pa gang lags pa/ de lta bu'i sems can de ni ma lags pa lagaso// 
187b2(mdo): de la sems can zhes bgyi ba ni/ nang gyi ma'i khaMs dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang rlung kyi khams te/ khams bzhis yang dag par bsdus shing btags pa dang / myig dang rna ba dang / lce dang lus
187b3(mdo): dang / yid kyi skye mched drug dang / dbang po lnga dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/ de ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gsum gyi bar ni chos thams cad bgyi ba lags
187b4(mdo): bka' saHlad pa'o// 'od srung de dag kho na la/ sems can kyi chos shes bya na/ de la sems can zhes bya ba'i chos gang yi gsold pa de la sems can zhes bya ba bgyi bar btags pa'i
187b5(mdo): chos 'ga' yang ma mchis lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal kyi rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba kang lags pa de'i rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba
187b6(mdo): de gang lags// bka'asaHlad pa/ 'od srung rnga bo che gang yin pa de nyid/ rnga bo che yin par shes par bya ste/ rnga bo che zhes bya ba ni pags pa dang / dbyig gu dang / shing leb dang / chos
187b7(mdo): 'di gsum tshogs pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag la nga po che zhes bya'o// gsold pa/ de la rdung ba'i myi la rnga bo che zhes bgyi lags sam/ bka' sa yang ba/ myi myeng par yang rnga bo che rlung kyis/ 
187b8(mdo): spyod pa na/ skra 'byung ngo // gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags// rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba chos sam/ 'on te chos ma lags pa lags// bka' ma lnga pa/ rnga bo che zhe bya ba 'di na chos
188a1(mdo): kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no// gsol du pa// de ci zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gang zhig chos dang / yang lhan cig ldan pa ma yin zhing / chos ma yin pa dang yang ldan pa/ 
188a2(mdo): ma yin pa di ni lung du ma bstand pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ gal ta lung du ma bstand pa'i chos shig mchis na/ des na 'jig rten na chos gsum mchis par 'gyur ro// bka' stsal pa/ lung du
188a3(mdo): mo bstand pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ ji ltar skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin pa ldang ma ning zhes bya'o// dper ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsalang pa/ 'od srung khyod kyis 'di ni pa dang ma/ 
188a4(mdo): 'dus pa'i bu yin no zhes smras pa/ gal te pa dang ma 'bras bu med par gyur dan/ kha cig 'di skad ces ma dad pa ni rgyu dang rkyen ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// yang bkal su lang pa/ sems can sa bon
188a5(mdo): kyi rangangos po myed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'bras bu byed/ pas de dag ni/ rtag tu ma ning zhes bya bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung dpe da/ ko sa la'i rgyal
188a6(mdo): gsal rgyal gang gi che/ pha ro la gyi dmag tshogs dang / lhan cig lhag par nyam nga bar gyur pa na/ brgyal ji zhigaltar gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i drung na dbang za gyis 'tsho ba dag de
188a7(mdo): dang lan cig rjes su kyi 'amang zhing sgrol bar gyi byed pa gang yin la de dag/ bud byed dang 'dra ba sa par bya'o// / gsos pa ci'i mang cu/ bka' bra sa da pa/ rgyal po rnams ni sogs 'tsho ba'i gyi
188a8(mdo): rnams kyi rang bzhin btags nas gsor 'jug go// rgya des nas bon byed pa'i sems can de dag pa dang ma byi 'gyur bas/ sems can de dag ni rtag par ma ning yin par blta bar bya'o// ya
188b1(mdo): bka' stsas ba / dge bam chas dang byi dge ba'i chos dang / lung dus bsu dang pa'i chos te dge ba'i mas gatshor ba ba ma yin no// mi dge bams pa 'tshor ba sdug bsngal ba yin no// sung dus bstan pa
188b2(mdo): ni tshor ba/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin te/ sems can rnams ni chos 'di gsuM gyis rtag tu reg par 'gyur ro// de la tshor ba bde ba zhes bya ba ni lha dang myi nas kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin no// 
188b3(mdo): tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten gi yin no// tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin// sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa ni ji ltar 'brum bu
188b4(mdo): phra mo dang shu ba yin te/ de la 'brus bu mo dang / shu pas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams ni lung ma bstan pa yin no// 'od stsa dgyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka/ 
188b5(mdo): su lang pa/ ci'i phyir/ gsold pa bde ba las sdug bsngal/ 'byung zhing / sdug bsngal las kyang sdug bsngal 'byung ste/ 'di gnyis ka lung du bstand pa lags so// bka' rtsal
188b6(mdo): pa/ ci kha zas las nad 'byung ngam// gsol pa/ ga gyi tshe 'chal ba de'i tshe bde ba zhes bgyi ba lags so// gang gyi tshe nad du gyur pa de'i tshe/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi lags te/ de la/ 
188b7(mdo): thu gag pa lags pa de ni lung du ma bstand pa zhes bya gyi lags so// bka' stsal da pa/ gal te de lta na bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang lung ma bstan pa zhes bya la// pa dang bu yang lung du ma bstand par
188b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ de ni ma lags so bka' stsa lang pa/ 'o na ji lta bu yin/ gsol pa/ ji ltar 'du shes myed 'du shes myed byin la rdzogs pa la lta zer zug gi gzhi zhes myi bgyi ba ltar bu'i chos dge
