213b8(mdo): 'gyur te/ lta ba de lta bu gang yin pa de ni nga'i ma yin pas/ de'i phyir rtag pa dang / chad pa spangs pa zhes gsungs pa ni/ ngas legs par gsungs pa yin no// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pang bdag nyid skyes so// 
214a1(mdo): zhes gsung // ci de bzhin gshegs pa skyes sam nga tshems shing sten to zhes gsung na/ cing stend snyam 'am// 'od srung snga ma dang / phyi ma'i tshig gi don 'gal gyi don la ni ma yin no// 
214a2(mdo): gsol pa ji ltar ma lags bka' \u0f7flad pa/ 'od srung khyod la dpel bstand te/ dper na/ bco khrag mkhan mkhas pas gos phal ba zhig nyos nas dmar por byas te btsongs na/ rin chen por
214a3(mdo): lom mo// de nas des phyis rin lhag pas nyos nas gos de nyid sngon pos/ tshig kur byas te gzhan gyi lag tu gtsongs na/ de gnyis gyur kyi rin tu lom na/ 'od srung ci de gos de nyid yin nam 'on te gzhan
214a4(mdo): yin zhe na/ de ni gzhan ma yin te// kha dog bsgyur bar zad do// 'od srung de bzhin du gos kyi rnam pa bzhin du/ bsod nams gsar kyi rgyun chags pas/ de phyis mtshon ci'i thabs kyi thabs
214a5(mdo): mkhas pa/ kha dog sbyar ba lta bur byed do// 'od srung gzhan yang dper na/ grong khyer chen po zhig na/ dge slong rgyal khrims dang ldan pa gcig yod pa 'chi kha'i grong rdal lam/ grong khyer du
214a6(mdo): bsod nams la rgyu ba na/ smad 'tshong ma zhig mthong nas de sems chags par gyu rad te/ de nas des bsams pa/ gyon pa'i gos 'di byin la/ 'di lta bu zhig bya'o zhes nges par byas nas/ des gyon pa'i
214a7(mdo): gos des smad 'tshong ma de brongs pa dang / smad 'tshong ma de yang chags pa'i rang bzhin pas/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de la khas blangs so// de nas dge bsnyen thabs la mkhas pa zhig gis de mthong nas bsam
214a8(mdo): pa e ma'o kyi hung / dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di/ da ni tshul khrims 'chal bar 'gyur te/ 'di pas ni dge slong 'di lus 'dis shi ba bla yi/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ni ma yin pas// de'i
214b1(mdo): sdig pa gang yin pa de bdag la bab par gyur da cig ces/ de nas des gtam ci zhig nas mongs par byas te/ mod la bsad da/ 'od srung de ci myi dmyal ba bar 'gyur ram// 'od srung gyis gso med
214b2(mdo): pa/ de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyend lags so// bka' thald pa/ 'od srung mya de'i dge slong srog dang bral ba'i sdig pa gang yin pa de/ de zla ba bzhin rims kyis thebs nas/ lus de
214b3(mdo): nyid la rnam par smin pa dang dengs par 'gyur dan/ 'od sru pang 'bas mkhas pas// sems can gyi don tu tshig tsam chu spabs/ nyes pa byed de/ bdag bden par yod pa la/ bdag myed do zhes 'gog pa
214b4(mdo): tshig cam tu smras pa/ cir yang myi 'gyur ba la ci spos// / 'od srungaganya ngan yang khyod kyis kun dga' bo zi lad kyis mnan nas/ pal zhus pang / srid pa yod na bden pa dang sdug bsngal te/ myed na bde dang
214b5(mdo): sdug bsngal ka la yod// ces bya ba de'i don 'od srung khyod da nyon cig 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dngos po myed pa// sems can myed pa/ 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o// 
214b6(mdo): gsolang pa/ ji lta bu lags/ bka' thald pa/ 'od srung dper na/ ra'i rgyal po gangs can gyi drung na nor bu ni tshe 'od mthal yas par snang ba zhes bya ba'i khams yod do// de nas nor bu rin po che'i
214b7(mdo): khams de yang/ nor bu rin po che'i khams byi dor byed pas bltas nas/ des me mthong se shes nas/ des de blangs te/ gser gyi kha dog bzhin du sabs kyis drim sbyangs te blangs nas/ de nas des ga
214b8(mdo): kici/ dris ngas par gyurang ba de gan chad pa'am/ 'das thab 'as bye ma 'am/ snong gang dang gang na myings bag kyang des der nong bu rin pomed/ de lu de lar gyi ba dang byas pas/ jis sos ni rje 'i/ 
215a1(mdo): skyen de kho nas/ 'dres par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dper na gang dang gang du myi sgron ma thogs te/ song ba de dang de nyid du mun pa myed par 'gyur zhing sgron ma yang gsal ba
215a2(mdo): kho nar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du nor bu rin po che de/ gser bzhin du dri mas gos pa myed par gyur da cing / nor bu rin po che de yang / mtshan mo ni rgyu skar dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi rkye nad kyis/ chu 'dzag
215a3(mdo): thar 'gyur la/ nyon mo ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi mo'i kha dog ltar 'bar yang / chung zad kyang sreg par myi byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du// / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
215a4(mdo): 'jig rten du byung nas byang chub sangs rgyas pa nyid kyis skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i dri ma bsal cing / nyon mongs pa bye ba las rnam par grol te/ bag chags kyi dri ma thams cad
215a5(mdo): dang bral ba na/ nor bu dag pa bzhin du rab tu gsal zhing / pad ma bzhin du thams cad du gos pa myed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gyi gzugs kyis
215a6(mdo): 'jig rten kang dang gang bya 'byung zhing byung nas kyang / bal ba bzhin du sond par yang de/ bal par 'byangs pa ngan 'gro 'a nyes pa de dag kyis gos par myi 'gyur zhing / sa dang / myi'i bde ba dang / 
215a7(mdo): sdug bsngal yang nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur ro// lha dang phyi'i bdel ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin te/ sdug bsngal ni bka' la/ tha dad pa gcig tu mthar gyi nad pa ni
215a8(mdo): shin tu bde la yin no// de nas gnas gtan 'od srub kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bdag ni dgadod rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa/ dge slong gyi
215b1(mdo): dngos po dang / dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur lags te/ da ni bdag gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bgyis pa// gzo ba bgyis pa tshor bar bgyis lags so// gang de bzhin gshegs pas/ bdag la 'di skad
215b2(mdo): ces/ 'od srung tshur shog/ stan gyi phyed sbyin gyis bdag cag gnyis stan gcig la lhan cig 'dug go zhes gsungs pa/ de'i don de ring bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi'i dbus su/ bdag theg pa chen
215b3(mdo): bo la dbang bsgyur ba lags so// de nas 'khor de'i nang na/ sgra dang kha spu bregs pa/ dge slong gi kha dog dang / gzugs 'chang ba dag kyang 'dug/ dge bsnyen ma yin la/ dge bsnyen kyi gzugs 'tshang
215b4(mdo): bdag dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba dag dang da/ kha dog gcig tu phyogs pa dang / snyan dngags mkhan dang / mgrin pa sta re lta bu dang / dud 'gro dang / khagyen du lta ba dang / 
215b5(mdo): kha zur lta ba dag 'khod do// de dag thams cad ni/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol do// 
215b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni snyan te ma ma lags pa/ sbun pa dang bral ba/ bu ba ma mchis pa/ can gyi snying po lta bu sra ba brtan par gnas pa lags na 'khor 'di lta bu'i nang du 'di dag ci'i slad
215b7(mdo): du zhugs lags dang/ bka' cha lad pa kun dga' bo khyod gnas brtan 'od srung la dris shig/ kun dga' bos legs so bzhin tu 'tshal zhes mnyan nas/ gnas gartan la 'di skad ces smras so// / 
215b8(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung 'di dag 'khor ning du ji ltar zhugs/ 'od srung kyis spras pa/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni skyes bu blun po bdud kyi 'khor te/ bdud dang lhan cig lpags pa yin no// kun dga' bo
216a1(mdo): a bdag ni rgyu 'dis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhing srung ba thabs mkhas pa bzhin lu de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas dam pa'i chos srung rngo myi thog lags so// zhes
216a2(mdo): gsol nas don de'i phyir bdag gis de'i tshe sa chen po 'di khur du thogs pa na myi mdo' lags so zhes kyang gsold to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' thal pa// 'od
216a3(mdo): srung khyod kyis nga 'das na ji srid bstand pa nyams par ma gyur pa de srid du/ 'jig rten tu dam pa'i chos 'byind par nus so// zhes bdag la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba bskyed do// de'i tshe
216a4(mdo): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das re shig bdag gis dgung lobazhi bcu zhig dam pa'i chos dbyung bar bya'o zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lad pa// re shig de
216a5(mdo): li bar tu yang / khyod snyom las skyed dam cing ji srid bstand pa ma nyams pa'i bar tu/ brtson par myi nus sam/ de 'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bdag la bka'
216a6(mdo): byakha pa 'od srung re shig bdud tshol cig/ gal te nyed na de'i tshe dam pa'i chos 'byind nus par 'gyur zhing / nga'i don yang shes par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bdag gis ni/ de'i tshe lha'i myig
216a7(mdo): gis bdud sdig can bltas na ma mthong ma shes so// dper na mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du skye'o mang po'i dbus su zhing pa bu stor ba zhig gyis// rang kyi bu btsal te ma rnyed na/ dub
216a8(mdo): cing slar ldog pa'i 'gyur ro// kun dgal po de bzhin tu bdag gis btsal ba na/ ma rnyed do ma rnyed nas/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig can tshol bar spro ba ma mchis
216b1(mdo): lags so zhes gsol nas/ de'i tshe bdag phyogs gcig tu 'dug ko/ de nas de bzhin du 'od srung chen po'i 'og ma'i gnas btan nas nyan pos chen po brgya bcu'i bar gyi nyan thos chen po re re/ 
216b2(mdo): zhing / 'di lta ste/ zhing pa bzhin du dpe sbyar ba la/ tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam grangs kyis kyang 'asrings na/ stong phrag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / phug sbas
216b3(mdo): las sogs pa lnga brgya dang / 'jig rtend thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ma gtogs pa las thogs pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin du btsal na/ ma rnyed de de dag la yang tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du
216b4(mdo): bgrang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' rtsal pa/ 'od srung gang ma 'ongs pa'i rus na/ dam pa'i chos kun tu 'byind par myi nus pa'i rgyuni
216b5(mdo): dam pa'i chos nus nas lo brgya bcu lon pa dang / lo brgya cu pa nyid la lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / phug sbas las tshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya
216b6(mdo): bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi pha ma shes so des 'byin par 'gyur ba yin pas re shig de col cig/ gsolang pa/ legs so btsal bar lags te/ lid cha bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis
216b7(mdo): mthong ba dka' ba/ 'di nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa// de'i drung du song la gsol pa thob shika dang/ des bdud btsal bar nus so// de nas 'od srung chen po las thogs
216b8(mdo): te nyan thos chen po brgya bcu dang / bzang skyong dang / phug sras yas thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i drung du dong nas ko bar byas pa gzhon nu khyod kyis ni/ bdud sdig can bcatsal bar nus so// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
217a1(mdo): bstand to zhes grag go// de nas gzhon nus 'khor kyi gtso bo 'od srung chen po la/ 'di sprad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srung bdag gyis bdud sdig can bcal bar bgyi na / 'od kyang
217a2(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung bzang skyong las thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag nas/ 'jam dpal dang / s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / ngan song spong dang byams
217a3(mdo): pa las stsogs pa'i bar dag yod na ci bdag la mtho btsam 'am/ btsun pa 'od srung bdag bdud kyi rdzi bo ma lags kyis// / re shig bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyis col cig/ 'od srung kyis smras pa/ 
217a4(mdo): gzhon nu ci bdud sdig can tshar bcad pas bsod nams su myi 'gyur/ ras/ gzhon nus smras pa/ btsun pa gal te de ltar na brko/ dag gis kyang / ci ste myi nus na khyod nyid shin tu shes
217a5(mdo): pas khyod kyis tshol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'od srung gyis don de/ gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thald pa// 'od srung de skad byas na// gzhon nu mi zer/ 
217a6(mdo): gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu 'di skad ces/ re shig bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ legs par tshol cig/ de'i 'og tu bdag gis bdud sdig can bcal bar bgyi'o// re shig nyan thos
217a7(mdo): chen po brgyad bcus col cig/ bdag ni khyim na gnas pa/ rigs lhag par dma' ba lags pas de'i 'og tu btsal bar bgyi'o zhes mchi lags so// de nas nyan thos mchog de dag dang / bzang skyo
217a8(mdo): dang / phug lus las phyogs pas yang bcal na/ dper na zhing pa'i dru lagrong khyer na/ shu sor pa bzhin tu de dag bdag ni slo ba byed do// bdag ni spro ba byed de zhes/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
217b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu bos te/ bka' rtsal da pa gzhon nu khyod kyis bdud tshol cig// gzhon nus gsol pa hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzin kyi rgyal po'i bu mo rgyal po'i gzhon ma lnga dkar zhes
217b2(mdo): ba bsod nams dang ldan pa de 'dir mchi ste/ de'i slad du rnga ba che dang / dang dang rol mo'i sgra sgrogs shing mchi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
217b3(mdo): dpa' tshogs la// bka' tha lad pa/ sa 'dzind kyi rgyal po'i bu mo rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma lnga dkar zhes bya bas/ dri ba gcig gi lan ma thob nas/ mu stegs can thams cad 'pham par byas te de ring du
217b4(mdo): zhag bdun lon nas 'di skad ces rgyal po zas gtsang gi btsun me sbyar 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i sras de go'u ta ma'i rgyud// gzugs bzang po sangs rgyas shes bya ba zhig yod do zhes grag
217b5(mdo): gis/ de'i spyan sngar 'gro'o zhes smra zhing 'ong ngo // de nis de 'ong ba na/ de'i tshe mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de'i bar 'khor gyis rgyas par gyur rtsing // rnga bo che dang dung dang / 
217b6(mdo): rol mo'i sgras mnyan yod nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de'i bar grag sa par gyur da to// de nas gzhon nus gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bdud sdig can tshol la/ bsod
217b7(mdo): nams dang ldan pa rnams kyang / de skad mchi na de'i dri ba sus lan ldon par 'gyur lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' rtsa lad to// skyes bu brtan pos rtag tu ni/ gnod/ 
217b8(mdo): sems myed par byabu bzhin sbyin// nyams la nam yang myin zhes grag/ dri ba 'di yi lan thob shig// // de nas nyan thos chen po brgya cu dang / phug sbas las sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
218a1(mdo): tshogs kyis tshig mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gnod sems myed pa'i sems kyis su/ g.yel lam tshul khrims ldan yang rung // mdza' bo dgra la bu bzhin du
218a2(mdo): thams cad du ni sbyin pa bsngags// bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon po yis// dri ba 'di 'dra gsungs pa gang / 'di 'dra bdag cag ma zos na// re shig 'jam dpal gyis rtogs shig/ de nas 'jam dpal
218a3(mdo): las tshogs la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag gis kyang // de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa de nyid kyis lan blan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lid tsa ba gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na/ dga'
218a4(mdo): ba la bka' cha la pa// gzhon nu khyod kyis dris pa 'di'i la na thob shig/ gzhon nus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das re shig glang po chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis rgan rims bzhin rje len 'debs
218a5(mdo): su rtsal tu gsol// de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma lnga dkar / rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang / lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la/ mchod pa dpe myed
218a6(mdo): padag byas nas/ rnga bo che dag brdungs so// brdungs nas 'di skad ces smras so// brtan po gang dang dag rnga bo che chen po'i mdo nyan par 'dod nas// lhags pa de dag bdag kyi rnga bo che bsgrags pa/ 
218a7(mdo): gsan nas dri ba de'i lan lon cig gzhon nus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lan sngon du gcal tu gsol// de dag gis kyang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das re shig/ bud myed ni rang bzhin gyis
218a8(mdo): myi brtan pa lags pas// de'i slad du bdag cag lan lon rdo mya thog lags so// gzhon nus kyang gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bud myed 'di rang bzhin gyis gzhon nu ma lags na bdag
218b1(mdo): skyes par gyurd pas bud myed kyis rmas pa'i dri ba lan lags sam lnga dkar gyis smras pa gzhon nu khyed mgon po la bstand pa la zhugs nas khyod kyis chos nyid thos na/ ci dung skyes pa'o// bud myed
218b2(mdo): de snyam pa'i phyin ci log gi 'du shes ma spangs sam/ spras pa sring po ji ltar de yin/ de nas lnga dkar gyis smras pa/ re shig bcom ldan 'das kyang gang kyi phyir/ de skad gsungs na/ de'i phyir phyin kyi
218b3(mdo): log gi mtshan nyid can yin no// gzhon nu lnga dkar la smras pa re shig rje thog mar de bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de'i 'og tu 'di bdag dang lhan cig smra bar bya'o// 'od srung gyis gsol pa/ 
218b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu de skad ces mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' thald pa/ re shig gzhon nu kho na lan 'debs par 'gyur ro// gzhon nus kyang smras pa bu mo khyod su yin spras
218b5(mdo): pa bdag ni dkar zhes bya ba yin no// smras pa srid dus mo ci khyod kyis dkar po lnga tho ba 'am lnga dkar kyis smras pa pa chos rnams ni mying myed pa yin te/ mying myi rtog pas kun rdzob tu
218b6(mdo): bstan pa'o// gzhon nu'i mchog 'di ltar don ngas par ni de stong pa nyid kang yin gyis de ltar shes par gyis shig/ gzhon nu sa spras pa/ lA mo da dung yang phyin ci log ma spangs sam/ 'di la gal
218b7(mdo): te kazhon nu 'am gzhon nu ma zhes bya ba rnyed na/ de myur tu spros shig lnga dkar gyis spras pa/ gzhon nu legs so legs so// da ni dri ba'i las bcad de de bas na khyod rjes su dpags na/ 'jig rten
218b8(mdo): ru sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar shes so// des smras pa lha mo ci khyod kyis da dung dri ba bcad pa shes sam/ ji ltar gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma zad par 'gyur zhing myi skye ba de ltar khyod myi shes te/ khyod ni nyan thos dag rje
219a1(mdo): skad brjod pa de bzhin du brjod par byed kyi/ dri ba 'di ni 'jam dpal gyis ji skad spras pa bzhin yin no// lnga dkar gyis smras pa dper na ji lta bu yin/ gzhon nus spras pa/ kye ma'o// 
219a2(mdo): ji ltar skyes pa 'ga' zhig yi ge rnams kyi mthar phyi nad nas/ bdag nyid kyi mying bris na/ klog myigs pa de bzhin tu lha mo lnga dkar gyis kyang / lnga dkar myi shes so// 
219a3(mdo): bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub seMs
219a4(mdo): dpa'i tshogs dang / nam mkha'i lha'i tshogs dang / 'bru ga gi tshogs kyis phyogs bcu rnams g.yos rab tu g.yos ldeg rab tu ldeg/ chem rab tu chem de dag thams cad kyis de lta
219a5(mdo): bu'i mchod pa'i las chen po byas nas// legs so zhes bya/ ba byin te/ gzhon nu gang gyis ya mtshan can dra ba gcig gis char bcad cing srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dag/ de bzhin
219a6(mdo): gshegs pa'i bstand pa la btsun pa'i bu mo deng thub pa dang / de bzhin bzhag pa'i dri ba kun shes pa legs so legs so// des de'i tshe mu stegs byed ya mtshan can thams cad rang rang gyi rab tu byung ba spangs nas
219a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa rab tu byung ste/ de na gang dag rab tu 'byung ba la// myi rten pa de dag na dge bsnyen du gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ gzhon nu la legs so
219a8(mdo): zhes bya ba byin te/ gzhon nu khyod kyis gang gyi phyir dri ba 'di li lan lon pa legs so legs so// gzhon nus smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kho na'i mthu yin gyi bdag gi ni ma yin no// bcom
219b1(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bkal ha lad pa/ 'jig rtend thams cad kyis mthong na dka' ba// ngas kyang tshag su bcad pa/ de kho na bzhin du shes so// tshig su bcad pa de'i don kyi rgyal ni 'di yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes mchog gi// / 
219b2(mdo): rtag tu gnod pa'i sems su bya// kun tu sbyin pa bsngags pa ni// tshul khrims bkur ba g.yel la myin// byams dang dgra la bu bzhin myin// tshig 'di'i rnam bya'i sna tshogs nyon// skyes mchog gis tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong
219b3(mdo): na/ rtag tu gnod semasu bya zhing / de dag la tshul zad kyang sbyin pa sbyin par myi bya ste/ de dag ni bstand pa la/ dgra dang mtshungs pa yin pas// 'di la sbyin par bya'o// 'di la byin par myi bya'o// zhes 'byung po rnams kyi
219b4(mdo): ched du bsam par bya'o// sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs pa ni so so'i skye bo tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba la snying rjes sbyin pa'o// gal te tshul khrims 'chal ba la snying rjes byin na/ 
219b5(mdo): gos par myi 'gyur ram/ ji ltar mda' drug gis byug pa de sa ma byugs pa yang gos par 'gyur ba de bzhin tu dge slong tshul khrisa'achal bas kyang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de yang nyams par byed// 
219b6(mdo): de lta bas na 'di la char bcad pa kho na legs kyi sbyin pas lha ga la gzung / mthong na rtag tu dgra bo dang 'dra bar bya ste/ des na gnod sems su bya'o zhes gsungs so// tshul khrims 'dren ma myi bstend te/ rgyu de'i phyir na gnod
219b7(mdo): ba'i/ sems ni bskyed par bya'o zhes sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ mdza' dang dgral mnyam gang yin pa dang // g.yel dang rgyal khrims ldan la mnyam pa gang / gnod sems myed par spyod pa de kun ni// bstand
219b8(mdo): pa 'di la Tha dang 'dra bar bzang // bstand pa la ni nges pa'i don// de ltar rab tu bsngags pa'i/ gyod pa spu gri'i so lta bur/ rno ba'i mchog ni spyad par gyis// de'i phyir rnga bo che chen po'i dngos po 'i sangs bsgrags so// 
220a1(mdo): rnga bo che chen po'i mdos ci zhig bsgrags she na/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de 'dir/ rnga bo che chen po'i mdo las smos pas// des na mdo chen po 'di ni rnga bo che chen po'i zhes bya'o// de nas ji ltar lhag
220a2(mdo): pa'i 'khor de thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya la byin te/ kye ma gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dka' bar/ mkhas pa ji ltar rgyal po gsal rgyal/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don tu g.yulo rnga bo che sna 'byind pa de
220a3(mdo): bzhin du / rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di bsgrags pa na/ 'gro ba la dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa'i sgra brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi gsangapa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba zer zug pa'i
220a4(mdo): zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi gsal ba 'di bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'od srung chen po la bka' ha lad pa/ 'od srungakhyod kyis gang gi tshe bdud bstan par myi nus pa/ de'i tshe 'od srung khyod kyis/ 
220a5(mdo): bo che chen po'i mdo 'di nyon yang / 'das nas lo bzhi bcu'i bar tu ji ltar da ltar gnas pa bzhin du/ dam pa'i chos zung shig/ chos chen po'i rnga bo chen po rdungs shig/ chos chen po'i rnga bo che dang / dung sgrog
220a6(mdo): shig// de'i 'og tu lo brgya rgya na / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba/ de'i tshe de'i dus su/ gzhon 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dgal bas/ de'i tshe thog mar bdud kyis bsgyur ba'i sems can sgra
220a7(mdo): dang kha su bregs pa dag gnas pa dang / de'i tshe gzho nus sdig can 'khor dang bcas pa/ gzugs dang bcas pa bcing ba lngas bcings nas/ ri bong bzhin tu stond par 'gyur zhing / rnga bo che chen po'i mdo las gsungs
220a8(mdo): pa'i chos chen po sgrogs par 'gyur/ chos chen po'i rje bo che rdung bar 'gyur/ chos chen po'i dung 'bud par 'gyur/ chos kyi mchod sbyin par 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'jugs par 'gyur ro// gsold pa nam zhig na lags/ 
220b1(mdo): bka' rtsa lad pa/ gang gi che lo brgya bcu na/ bstand pa nyams par 'gyur ba de'i che na'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis blta lags na/ da ltar mngon gsum du mdzad du gsolang // de nas
220b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzho nu la bkal rtsa lad pa/ myur du bdud pa stond cig/ de nas gzho nas/ bcom ldan 'das kang na ba de logs su gdong phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdud
220b3(mdo): sdig can mchis pa'o ni lags te// 'on 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas mchis nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du/ dge slong gi gzugasu mchis pa la gzigs/ zhes 'jub mos bstand to// thams cad dang ldan
220b4(mdo): pa'i 'khor gyis kyang / bdud de bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong po / de nas bdud kyis smras pa/ gzhonu bdag mdo 'di la/ lan gnyis su bar cad myi byed do// zhes tshig de skad lan gsu smras pa/ gzhon
220b5(mdo): nus smras pa// ji ltar yid ches par 'gyur// brgyad kyis smras pa/ 'di ltar yid ches par gyis shig sbyor ba ji sangs rgyas snyed kyis/ bdud kyi cha byad du byas na/ sems can rnams dad pa bsgyur ba'i
220b6(mdo): sbyor ba de thams cad bstand par bya'o// gzhon nu bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs pa las thogs pa/ 'bras bu bzhi'i bar gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ston// 
220b7(mdo): stong pa nyid sgoms shig pa yang sma / sems can du lta ba yang 'dod par byed// 'di ltar sems can yod do// zhes kyang smra'o// bdag ni bdag gi lus nam mkha' la 'bar yang stond/ tu ba 'thul pa dang / me tog
220b8(mdo): gi char chen po 'bebs pa yang stond cing / kapangs spong pa chen po zhes bshad pa/ de thams cad ni zhi ba yin la/ gang ngas sems can yod do zhes bshad pa/ de thams cad ni stong pa yin gyis/ stong pa chen po ni de lta
221a1(mdo): gyis shig/ sems can yod do zhes bya ba ni/ de ltar shes par gyis shika ces kyang smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' tha lad pa// dge slong dag bdud sdig can de
221a2(mdo): lta bu byed par la ltos sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar 'di yang stond par byed na dge slong dag bdud kyis de ltar byas na/ sems can rnams ji ltar yang ches par myi 'gyur/ dge slong dag de lta bu/ 
221a3(mdo): na/ su yang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba na/ 'di lta bu'i tshig gnyis smra na/ de ni brgyad yin par blta'o// gang dag de skad du snga phyi tshig gnyis smras nas// yongs su mya ngan las 'dal na/ de ni nga'i
221a4(mdo): nyan thos ma yin par blta'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na// chos rnam par 'phrul pas kyang ma yin/ 'bras bu bzhis kyang ma yin/ bsam gtan gyis kyang ma yin/ mngon par shes pa'i rtse bas kyang ma yin te/ 
221a5(mdo): de dag ni de'i phyogs yin pas/ de dag la yid ches par myi bya'o// gang dag ji ltar yang rung / de skad du snga phyi tshig gnyis smras nas/ ste/ de'i 'og tu yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag ni bdud kyis srul pa
221a6(mdo): yon par blta'o// 'od srung ba yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas// lo bdun brgya'i bar gyis// nga'i nyan thos rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te// de dag ni 'di lta bu'i cho ga gnyis po/ nyon mos pa gang yin pa/ 
221a7(mdo): de ni spong pa'o// zhi ba gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bya smra zhing / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuraro// de byin chad ni nyan thos sam/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar myi 'gyur te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'a
221a8(mdo): lhar sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// yang de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sa phyi nas stong pa nyid lang / chud pa dang rtag par lta zhing spyod do// rung ba ma yin pa dang / 'dre bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de dag stong pa chen po nyid la rung / 
221b1(mdo): ba ma yin pa/ chad pa dang / rtag pas 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba nyid du smra zhing / de de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gtam bstand pa na smong pas// sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid kyi gto spong bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar myi 'gyur ro// gang dag
221b2(mdo): 'di ltar bdud kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bus yong su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni bdud kyis sprul pa yin par rig par bya'o// mya ngan las 'dal bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang phal cher bcud kyis yul la/ 
221b3(mdo): yongasu mya ngan las 'dal bar 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jig rten thos cad kyis mthong na dga' ba rdzogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bkal rtsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ ba longasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ khyed
221b4(mdo): mas kyi phyi ma'i tshe/ byi la'i dus na/ dam pa 'i chos 'byin par 'gyur// 'od srung chen po legs so// pa'adas nas/ dam pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur ram nyes lan gsum gyi bar du sro ba bskyed kyang gro bar myi byed do// de'i tshe bcom
221b5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lad pa// / rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa la/ khyad du gsod par ma sas shig/ nga la gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i/ dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slob ma mang du yod de// kang
221b6(mdo): du mdo 'di las gsungs pa/ bzang skyong dang / phug skal las cog/ pa brgya po ngag kyi// phyi ma shos gang yin pa/ de yin par 'gyu ro// 'od srung do yang gang zhe na/ li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
221b7(mdo): ba 'di nyid yin te/ phyi ma'i dus na lho phyogs kyi mkhas par gyur nas/ chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rdung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi hung 'bud par 'gyuraro// de nas gzhon nus bdud bkrol te/ bstan nas chos ji lta ba de bzhin tu mna' bsgrags
221b8(mdo): te/ de'i 'og tu btang ngo // de nas thas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des// gzhon nu la spras pa/ gzhon nu khyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lung bstan pa yin gyis/ phan pa bstan pa/ chos kyi rnga bo che rdungs shig// rnga bo che chen po'i mo/ 
222a1(mdo): spros shig/ chos kyi dung bus shig ces tshig tu spros// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' thal to// 'od srung khyod ni zhing srung ba lta bur ma nus te/ zhing srung ba bzhin du thabs la
222a2(mdo): mkhas pa'i gzhon nus mdo 'di thas cad mnyan lus la thogs ste/ 'jig rten du mngon su du 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ni ngas sa bdun pa la bzhag ste/ myi phal zhig tu byin gyis brlabs nas gang gi tshe/ lo brgya cu pa la bstand pa
222a3(mdo): nyams par 'gyur ba de'ing / ldeg phyog su yul mu run de zhes bya ba na/ chu bo'i 'grams rten pa'i grong khyer dpag gis kyi tshugs pa zhes bya ba dang nye ba'i thong 'breng ba chen po zhes bya bar/ ka ye ri zhes bya ba'i rigs rgyung der skyes nas/ ra'i
222a4(mdo): myi 'chang ba'i dge slong zhig tu gyur pa te// / zhing srung ba'i thabs mkhas pas/ nga'i dge sbyong g.yel ba rnams kyi/ nang rab tu byung nas// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos pos bsdus te/ mdo 'di rnyed nas/ lus la bcangs te/ 
222a5(mdo): dge 'dun dag par byas nas/ dang po rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi chen po yongasu spangs te/ chos chen po sgrogs par 'gyur// rnga bo che chen po'i mdo la sa gsungs pa'i chos kyi dung dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgrogs par 'gyuraro// 
222a6(mdo): gnyis pa theg pa chen po'i mdo stong pa nyid kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa// sems can gyi khams rtag pa'i gtam dang / rnga bo che chen po'i mdo'i gtam smra bar 'gyur/ chos chen po'i rnga bo che rdung bar 'gyur/ chos chen po'i rung 'bud par
222a7(mdo): gyur/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs par 'gyur// nga'i mngon sum du go gyon par 'gyur ro// phyis mdo 'di thos nas/ na chod chen por gyur pa te/ lo brkyar mdo 'di'i gtam smra zhing / chos kyi char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lo brgyar 'das pa'i 'o// 
222a8(mdo): tu de sngo phyogs kyi phyi rnams kyi nang du rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos na par 'phrul zhing / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa stond par 'gyuraro// rgya des na zhing srung ba'i thabs mkhas pa bzhin no// 'od srung de ltar bzang skyong dang / phug sbal la
222b1(mdo): thogs pa'i tshig ni/ skyes bu phal pa bzhin te/ 'dzin myi nus pa'i snyoms las can tu gyur da to// de ni skyes bu phal bA/ khro ba smod par byed pa de 'dra ba rnams kyi nang du na par 'phrul ba chen pos yong su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// / 
222b2(mdo): gsol da pa/ ji ltar lags bka' thal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ji lta ba de ltar ro// gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ji lta bu lags// bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi na par 'phrul pas ma yin/ 'brus bu bzhi thob pas
222b3(mdo): ma yin te/ de dag ni sa 'pho ba dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bas so// der yang gdul ba'i sems can dag yod na/ sems can de 'dra ba dag gi nang du/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa 'di byon pa la ltos/ 
222b4(mdo): shes smra zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag pa brtan pa/ zhi ba zer zug pa yin pa/ de lta bu de la ltos shig/ ngas brtan pa dang // de lta bu yin par shes par gyis shig ces lung ston par 'gyuraro// de nas phyogs brgya nas/ nam mkha'
222b5(mdo): las / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ so so'i zhal de la da stond cing 'di skad ces/ de ni de ltar yin no// zhes gsung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten thas cad kyang // de'i chos bstan pa legs par bstan to zhes zhen
222b6(mdo): ces par 'gyur ro// de nas par skabs der / ra'i myi 'chang ba'i dge srong de 'di skad ces/ kye ma gal te bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu zhig yod na/ ya mtshan can thams cad bdag kyis gtul ba zhig na/ zhes smra bar gyu
222b7(mdo): zhing / bdag nyid shind tu bal ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyu ro// de gang gi cheng la slob pa de'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyis shes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ni/ de 'dra'o// 'od srung / dper na re shig kun dga' bor/ 
222b8(mdo): nyid kyis / 'bras bu thob par myi shes te/ 'dis bzla thob pa yin yang / bdag gis ni 'bras bul thob po snyam su bdag nyid kyis zhes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang ngan/ sa bdun pa dang / brgyad pa la gnas
223a1(mdo): gnod par 'gyur ba myed cing / phan tshun yang bdag cag gang du khrid pa dang / khyer ba dang bcug pa yang myi shes la bya ba de yang rab tu spyod do// de bzhin du ji ltar ngas mkhyen pa de ltar khyed kyang shes la gzhan gyis kyang shes so// 
223a2(mdo): kha cig gis ni myi shes te// de ya par nga kho nas myi shes so// yang gal te de ltar sangs rgyas mthu dang ldan pa lags na// nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du ci'i sad du/ sems can thams cad byin gyis myi drab lags// rab 'byor nga re zhig sbyor ba mkhan
223a3(mdo): kyis chu'i bum pa kha ma bcad pa yang myi 'pho ba byed na/ ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams la/ byin gyis rlab par myi mdzad / 'od srung gzhan yang / re shig 'byung po'i sbyor ba mkhan gyis/ chu'i bum pa yang 'gul bar
223a4(mdo): byed na/ ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la// ji ltar rang gyis myi shes pa de ltar byin gyis rlob par myi mdzad/ ci de ltar mdzad dam myi mdzad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad lags te/ sa
223a5(mdo): bcu thob pa rnams la yang mdzad lags so// gsold pa byang chub sems dpa' yod tan tu dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/ myi byed pa'i sku mngon su du mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa'i chen pos/ rnam par
223a6(mdo): 'phrul zhing tus bgyid par 'gyur// bka' thal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan brgyad dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/ myi phyed pa'i sku mngon suM tu mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par sprul pa chen pos
223a7(mdo): rnam par 'phrul zhing // dus byed par 'gyur te/ brkyang gang zhe na/ mdo 'di bshad pa na/ myi skyo ba dang / theg pa gsuM kyis myi skye zhing / gtam rnam pa gsul skrag pa myed pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can rjes myi spong ba dang / dge 'dun bye ba yun
223a8(mdo): zhing / gcig tu gyu rang par yang dag par spo ba dang / bud byed dang ma ning dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / kun tu 'dris par myi byed pa dang / rgyal po dang / dbang phyug dang / lhan cig kun tu 'dris pa spong ba dang / bsam gtan dang / spong ba la mod
223b1(mdo): par dga' ba dang / mya gtsang ba dang / bdag myed pa'i 'du shes te brgyad pa de dag go// gzhan yang rgyu bzhis 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na// bdag gis chos nges par bzung ba ni/ shin tu legs par byas so// skye pa dang / bdag nyid/ bdag gi skyes
223b2(mdo): yin no zhes bya de ltar sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/ brtan pa zhi ba zer zug pa'o zhes bya bar the tsom myed pa ning / bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam pa dang / nyan mtshan rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu'i rjes su gyur
223b3(mdo): byed dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa myi byed pa'i sku mngon gsu du mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos na par 'phrul zhing // dus byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas de lta bu'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la/ chos kyi sku
223b4(mdo): bstan par bya'o// de grong rdal lam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gang na 'dug kyang rung ste// der ngas de dag la bstan nas/ 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhi dan gshegs pa nga ni rtog pa yin no zhes gsung ngo // deng phyin chad su zhig
223b5(mdo): mdo sde 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang sgrogs par byed cing / 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa/ brtan pa zhi ba ther zu ga pa'o zhes sba zhing shes par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu
223b6(mdo): bzhugs so zhes/ bdag nyid kyis bsam pa zag pa dang / ngan g.yo myed pa dang / bcos pa ma yin pa dang / sgyu myed pas de ltar shes par byed pa/ bsam pa dag pa phun sum tshogs pa de la ni/ ngas bdag nyid mngon su tu bstand par bya'o// 'od
223b7(mdo): srung khyod dad par gyis shig/ yid ches par gyis shig/ 'od srung gal te de ltar chos rnams la myi spyod na/ des nga mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/ rnam par 'phrul pa ji ltar 'gyur/ ngas yang nyan
223b8(mdo): thos kyi theg pa 'dir/ dge slong dag chos cig rab tu spongs shig dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba myi bar 'gyur bar / ngaganya' bod do zhes gsung ngo // dge slong dag de bzhin du 'dir yang / spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan na// khyod la lha chen
224a1(mdo): po rnams bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pas khyed lus la song ba'i dran pas zang zing tshol zhing ma 'dug shig/ 'od srung nga'i mying 'chang ba'i dge slong de ni rtag tu/ dge 'dun yongs su dag pa/ 
224a2(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar bgyid lags// bka' calang pa/ zhing srub ba bzhin du babs mkhas pas/ de dag kha'i tshogs ltar ji srid du/ kun tu bsdu ba'i dus yin pa de srid du gsol bar 'gyu ro// 
224a3(mdo): de'i tshe bzang skyong dang ji thug sa sa las tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya yang de'i tshe/ da ni sngon gyi zhing srung ba bzhin du/ phyi ma'i dus na nga'i das pa'i chos 'byin par nges 'gyur to// nga'i mying 'dzind pa'i dge slong des
224a4(mdo): kyang / ji mong du kun tu bsdu ba'i dus yin pa de srid du/ g.yel ba'i tshogs nye bar bsdus te/ bkur sti dang / ri mo dang glegs pas dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / ba lang gi tshogs dang zas kyi sbyin pas yid dga' las
224a5(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'og tu char gcad pa'i dus shes nas/ tshar/ gcod par 'gyur ro// gal te tshar bcad pa'i phra gtags pas/ myi// 'dug na spyospyod pa ma yin pa la gnas pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de dag
224a6(mdo): ni/ ji ltar mda' dug gis reg pas ma reg pa yang 'bags pa de bzhin du 'gyur bas tshar gcad nas spang bar sems so// de nas des de snyam du bsam nas dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan dag/ tshul
224a7(mdo): khrims nyams par gyur na/ myi rung ngo zhes 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa stond pa dang / gyod pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ de dag dang lhan cig thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyang myi byed/ de dag dang lhan cig gso sbyong
224a8(mdo): las dang sba ba dang / kun tu sba bar yang myi byed de/ ji ltar rgyal po la snying rings pas gzhan dag ma rung bar byed pa de ltar de yang de dang 'dra'o// des de ltar byas nas lo brgyar chos kyi char phab/ chos chen po'i
224b1(mdo): rje bo che rdungs pa chos kyi dung bus/ chos kyi mchod sbyin byas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos dus byed par 'gyur ro// de nas phyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong / 
224b2(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ bskal pa drug cu cha gnyis 'das/ rang sangs rgyas 'bum yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / gzhan yang mgon po brgyad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i 'og tu nga'i mying
224b3(mdo): 'chang ba'i dge slong 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung gnas 'od
224b4(mdo): ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe gang gis rgyal po'i bu mo lnga ka/ ra gyi dri ba lan btab pa de ni re shig phyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ rgyal po li gzhon nu lnga kar ni sngar/ de bzhin
224b5(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsu gyi mgon por 'gyur te// gzhon nu rgyas par lung stand pa ni phyis bya'o// 'od srung ltos 'od srung skye bo phal pas/ 
224b6(mdo): sangs rgyas 'di lta bu nyid legs par rnyed par jig nus sam// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// / re shig de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs
224b7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu/ gcig kho na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// gnyis pa gang yin pa dang / gsum pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// dper na yungs 'bru'i nang tu 'jig rten gyi khams
224b8(mdo): mang po bcug la de dag de nyid ni rgya yang bdag cag kang du khyer pa'am/ bcug pa yang myi shes gzhan dag ni ji ltar shes pa/ de ltar byed pa de bzhin du/ nga yang sems can gzhan dag kyis ni shes la
225a1(mdo): gzhan dag kyis ni myi shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig po 'di nyid na shag kya thub pa dang / 'di nyid na myi 'pham pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid sred pa'i bskal pa byung nas/ myi tshogs
225a2(mdo): dang/ 'di nyid na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di la dben pa'i bstand pa stond pa 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar yod na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dge slong phal ba'i ngo bo lta bur byin gyis brlab pa gang yon par
225a3(mdo): lta ngo mtshar ci chega'od srung khyod kyis rigs gang d+ha de skye ba len pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par ltar shes par gyis shig/ 'od srung bdag cag gi rigs su// 'di lta bu skyes so zhes
225a4(mdo): rigs kyi dga' ba dang / yid 'ong ba'i rang bzhin gyis de la rim 'gro byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cadangs ma ngags pa yin par khyod kyis de ltar shes par bya ste/ de dag kyang byang chub sems
225a5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin no// rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di bsgag sa pa sgrogs pa na/ bdag nyid chen po de'i phyogs 'ji nad pa'i 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / 
225a6(mdo): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / sngar grong du mdo 'di las 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dka' bas zhus pa'i tshogs kyi le'ur lung bstand to/ mdo
225a7(mdo): las mchod pa byed pa'i skyes pa dang/ bud myed gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / gdon myi za bar rang rang gi mchod pa dang / mying 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 'od srung rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di ni
225a8(mdo): nga'i mying 'chang ba'i dge slong 'di dang gnyis kyis chos chen po'i/ rnga bo che rdungs par 'gyur gyi gsum pa ni myed do// yang bka' nyal pa 'od srung 'das pa'i dus na nga grong khyer chen po
225b1(mdo): yangs pa can du rgyal po dga' ste zhes bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ni de ni grong bzhi pa'i tshang tsham du gyur to// 'jam bu gling ni myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
225b2(mdo): kyi chang cam la de bzhin du grong bzhi dang / de bzhin du stong gsum gi stong chen po yang de ltar bsgre bar bya'o// de na nga'i chi ni bsam kyis kyi khyab me/ de larang 'khor los sbyar ba nyid byed pa na de'i mgrangs
225b3(mdo): myed pa'i sbyin pa byin bsod nams bsags tshul khrims bsrungs 'phags pa dag la bstend to// skyes pa'am/ bud byed gang zhig/ rnga bo che chen po'i mdo spogs pa thos nas/ lan 'ga'
225b4(mdo): mchod pa byed pa'am dbyas pa 'a bsad nams gang ma de thams cad dkyis dbyes dgadags pa'am/ bsting pa 'am da lta bus 'gro ba yang rung ba'i sems gcig tsam skyed par sems
225b5(mdo): pa des bsags pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa'i bsod nams de la ni ngas byas pa'i bsod nams gong ma de thams cad kyis dpe 'i dper yang myi phod do// dper na rig pa'i rgyal po bram ze'i
225b6(mdo): gzil ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rig pa 'di lan gcig klags na/ zla ba'i bzhir sdang ba thams cad las bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ltos re shig rig pa phal pa de'i mthu yang 'di yin na/ mdo
225b7(mdo): 'di lan gcig klags na/ tshe'i mthar zug gi bar du bgegs myed par bsrung ba thams cad byas par ci'i phyir myi 'gyur// de lta bas na gang su yang rung ba dag gis mdo 'di la mchod pa byas
225b8(mdo): par 'gyur da na/ de ni sems can de dag thams cad kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur zhing 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub la thug pa'i bar du med 'di rnyed par
226a1(mdo): 'gyur // de nas 'khor thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsoyod to// dbyangs kyim mabrim mthun par tshig gsolang pa / kye sa po bcom ldan 'das gzhon 'di khrod kyim macan 'chang
226a2(mdo): ba'i dge slong du gyur da nas kang kyi dus las 'das par 'gyur 'di 'am gsang bzhican gyi bug na gnas pa'i la mgon ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de'i'i thad du zhes/ 'di sa 'di ni khyod 'dam nas/ 
226a3(mdo): thugs su mchis te dus 'gyid par 'gyur lags so// bka' ma lang pa de kyi 'angan ny-id der song ste/ bdag nyid bstan par bya zhig/ yul de thogs kho na pa bad 'de bzung bar bya'o// 
226a4(mdo): ci'i zhe na/ ji srid du mdo 'di de'i lag tu son par gyur pa de ni dad du de ldog pa'i sems 'askyed par 'gyur ro// yang dan de nyid du gdul bar dbang la brten te/ bachog sa chen
226a5(mdo): bos bdun gyis byas nas// / de'i ya mthun na 'dug par bya ste/ des pa mthong na de nyid du log par 'gyur zhing / der de dus byed pa yang stond par 'gyur ro// yang na ci 'dod
226a6(mdo): ba bzhin du byed cing de lha gdus pa gapa yod pa de dus byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'anga'i spobasas bcu thom pa/ kun dga' bo yang rnam par 'phrul ba chen pos/ deng gro
226a7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bas byin gyi bu mngon mchod ces bya ba yang // lo nyung zad cig gis theg pa chen po la lhag pa'i bsapa phun sum tshogs pas gcig pu tha skyed par ltar su dang phying / 
226a8(mdo): skam yin rnams kyi na ba tu theg kyi chen po'i mdo 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na tha rang pa'i rgyabs nad pa de nyid de'i sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstand pa dang / len pa chen po rnam
226b1(mdo): bang gtan la 'bebs pa'i dge slong dru bsand pa yin no// don de nyid kyitho ba sar gyur danas de nyid kyi myong 'dzind par gyur ro// de nas de sa bu dag byang nas lo lnga lon pa dang / de'i gtu man pa na
226b2(mdo): pa'i dge pa'i myig nyam rgyang par 'gyur ro// de rnams tus bdun gyi bar du gyur da nas bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa' dam pa de dag ma gtogs par skyes pa'amadabud myed kyang rung sems can
226b3(mdo): phal ba 'ga' yang myed do// de nas 'khor de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma 'jig rten kun mthong dga'abartan po dge slong gzugs
226b4(mdo): gyur nas// rang bzhin bstand pa 'byind byed cing / sa kyi rnga chen rdung bar 'gyur// de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nasade 'og tu 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur/ 
226b5(mdo): 'di ltar dan lha phyogs su 'byung ba'i tha ma gcag yin na/ chos smras de ni 'das gyur da na/ de 'dra bzhin/ ni 'ga' myi 'byung / de 'dra' dge slong rnyed dka' ste// 
226b6(mdo): rim kyis snang ba nyams par 'gyur// 'di ltar de ni lho phyogs su 'byung ba'i tha ma gcig yin no// dam pa'i chos de nub tu pa'i dus su// chos smra ba de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
226b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ca lang nas/ 'od srung dang kun/ dka'o dang / bzang skyong las thogs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams nas la/ 
226b8(mdo): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yid rangs te/ de dag byang chub slob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid kyi chos 'dod par gyu rang to// 
228a1(mdo): 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rnga po che chen po'o zhes bya ba'i le'u// // rdzogs s+ho// 
228a2(mdo): rgya kar skad du// a r+ya gA na byA ha na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa rgyan sdug po zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po'o// // 'di skad bdag gis thas pa dus
228a3(mdo): gcig na// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/ 
228a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na/ stobs rnams dang / mnga' rnams dang rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa rnams kyis nam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
228a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor da'aja/ lta ste/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi rnam par
228a6(mdo): 'job pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po zla gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpal med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyin pa pang dgad pa yang dag gi jis na
228a7(mdo): bzhin du stonod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras grazigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po brnyed pa dang / byang chu
228a8(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang bdag zhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje
228b1(mdo): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzind dang / de dag las sortogs pa/ sangs
228b2(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba bye ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa sems dang // rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i spyod
228b3(mdo): yul las yong su 'das pa ye shes yid kyi lus gnas gyur pa/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas tu ma'i phyag
228b4(mdo): gi dbang bskur pas dpang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i/ yul las shi nad tu 'das pa'o / gzhal myed khang gyi pad mo chen/ po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de na
228b5(mdo): mur 'dug pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu ba myed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin / shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
228b6(mdo): mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyad pa/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyend pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs du ma' stond pa'i ting nge 'dzind las
228b7(mdo): bzhengs so// bzhengs nas po brang 'jal dang klog gi 'od can rgyan dang lhab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byang ste/ zla ba dri ma myed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang stengs su gsheg so// 
228b8(mdo): gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rgyan ser ge'i ka dan dam pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhi gzigs te/ 
229a1(mdo): gtsug rin ched 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer gyi tshogs chen po 'od gzer stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can sbyin mtshams nas phyung ste/ 'od gzer gi tshogs de byung bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
229a2(mdo): gyi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rkyen gcig dang 'dra bar yongs su snang bar gyurd to// mchog tu phra ba'i rdul kyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid phra ba nyid kyang yongs su
229a3(mdo): sdang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gi rang bzhin rdul ki phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang gza' dang zla ba spangs pa ste/ 
229a4(mdo): 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu za ba'i rtul gyi/ ba nyid du myi sdang gi gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkhal dang ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur byang chub
229a5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzha na spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
229a6(mdo): kyis gzig so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu phyar de dag gi zigs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur
229a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka las \u0f7flad pa/ rnam
229a8(mdo): par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du stonang pa stug po'i rgyan ces bya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa' dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems cad tu gtogs
229b1(mdo): ba'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma rig dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi sems rnam par bsregs te/ gnas gyurd pa'i phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin kyi lus stobs dang
229b2(mdo): mngon par gas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gyis brgyan pags pa myad pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / klog dang / 'ja' dang / byi ru dang / 
229b3(mdo): ba p+la dang / ldong ros dang / mtshal dang / mgo nag gi 'bru dang / king shu ka dang / in tra ko pa dang / gser dang / tsam pa ka dang / pad mo dang / tu dang / rma bya'i mgul dang / 
229b4(mdo): mdongs bu me lod kyi nang na 'dug pa gzugs brnyan lta bu thob nas sapa zag pa myed pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyind pa bcu'i sngo bas lus
229b5(mdo): thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'od / ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams nA rna bar dkod pa// yang dag pa ji
229b6(mdo): lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu ga/ zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de log su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
229b7(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag la zhu ba zhus pa/ 
229b8(mdo): lung lasa'i slad du/ skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gyis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rnam par dkod pa yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ 
230a1(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lus bstan pas sems can mgu bar byas// khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ 
230a2(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji ba bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
230a3(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' shig/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems cad las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs/ 
230a4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags// rig/ das kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi stug po 'ba' shig/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i
230a5(mdo): sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod// rigs kyi bu 'di nas pal shin tu yang pha rol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba stong phrag
230a6(mdo): brgya 'das pa'i steng kyi phyogs can/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin rtsa kha'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
230a7(mdo): skar ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
230a8(mdo): kyi pha rol shin tu yang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems pa'i 'khor gi tshogs kyis brgyad pa/ shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod do// sangs rgyas
230b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag gi so sor rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gi gtam dang / 
230b2(mdo): mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang / rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa
230b3(mdo): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs pa ston te/ de ni rnam par dkod pa yang dag pa/ ji lta ba bzhin ston te/ de dag pa rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis/ 'di'i pha rol na
230b4(mdo): 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de de'i lan du ngas 'di smras so// rnam par dkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du stond pa khyod 'ba' shig sangs rgyas kyi
230b5(mdo): zhing gi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lted mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems pa/ ram zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che 'o shugs
230b6(mdo): 'dzin/ 'di yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki rkyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug tshad myed pa la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir
230b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga'o bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul ki mchog gis gyed du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin
230b8(mdo): 'dis/ gshegs pa cig tsam kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ka rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas ka gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ra ma/ spyi gtsug tshad byed pa yang ma mthong ste/ de nas ma mthong ba dang po
231a1(mdo): mtshar du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug bltar chad myed pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa yang dag par rjes dran zhing gyi mched kyi 'jig rten
231a2(mdo): kyi khams 'di nyid du phyin pas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas/ sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes
231a3(mdo): te/ mngon par bstod nas/ bdag gyi so so rang kyi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i pyod yul la mngon par mos shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song steng gnas par gyur to// de na/ 
231a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po sa dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas za ba dang / dmyigs su pheb das pa dang / rnam par gdon byiza pa'i gtam zlos pa stan las
231a5(mdo): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'dra
231a6(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ phyogs gcig gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad
231a7(mdo): du skabs dbye bar kanang na bdag kyis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad pa/ rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris
231a8(mdo): shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smos shig/ de skad ces bka' las pang pas/ byang chub sos/ 
231b1(mdo): dpal sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang / 
231b2(mdo): 'chang ba bgyi ba'i zhes pa'i dzin ci lags// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa'i 'phags pa'i chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs stonang pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i spong pa'i sa
231b3(mdo): la spyod pa dang / gzugs dang mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lte bar ltung ba'i rnams dang / mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang
231b4(mdo): rdul dang ga ces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / nam mkha' dang bdag dang yid dang / dbang po dang / don nye bar 'du ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam
231b5(mdo): par zlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol// bde bar gsheg/ sa pa bstan du gsol// ma rig pa dang / sred pa da 8/ las dang / myig dang gzugs dang / sdang ba dang de las
231b6(mdo): skyes pa'i yid la byed pa dang / gsuM 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang / rgyu dang de ma thag pa dang / dbang dpa dmyigs pa'i rkyend las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang
231b7(mdo): yod pa dang myed par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang / chos kyi 'drib pa'i phung po dang / gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi yang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol
231b8(mdo): chos kyi dbang po thos par 'gyur gyis/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsolang // rnam shes lnga'i rgyu sgrogs// mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas blo dpe bya dang / ji ltar gang
232a1(mdo): gis 'tshang rgya zhing // shes byarnam pa lnga po rnams// thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te// chos rnams thams cad mkhyend pas na// mya ngan 'das dang mnyam gshegs pa/ 
232a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' las lang ba// dge 'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying pos bcu la dbang ba rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed
232a3(mdo): dge'o// rnal 'byor de dam pa la dbang ba sangs rgyas dang / 'tshang rgya bar yong su rI pa 'di la ni khyod 'ba' shig ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang
232a4(mdo): dod 'di la snang mo byung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i chog gi don 'di cin rtsi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on
232a5(mdo): gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khas dang skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang // nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang myi mtho zhing byas/ 
232a6(mdo): sid+h+ya dang / 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phung po chos la de bzhin gshegs pa myed do// rgyal phra mo myed pa'i thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ shes rab dang ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul te/ 
232a7(mdo): mnyam par gzhag pa thugs kyis yang dag par rje su ma gzigs shing / phung po nas skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sbubs na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i bu chos dbyings
232a8(mdo): kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o// kye rgyal ba'i de bas na dge bar shin tu nyon la yid la kyis shig dang / des khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes nas// byang chub sos dang / 
232b1(mdo): dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHkhad pa/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge 'dzin la dbang po phung po nas ni de gshegs pa ma
232b2(mdo): yin/ phung po las gzhan yang myed de/ phung po la gnas pa yang ma yin/ phung po yang gnas pa yin/ skye ba dang 'jig pa yang gnas ma yin/ shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes pa yang ma yin/ 
232b3(mdo): don kyang ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / yul rnaMs ni mno bsam myed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di nis las nang
232b4(mdo): phyir yang myi blta'o// gzugs na bskyed pa myed cing sems myed ba ste/ 'byung ba myed pa'i chos can mthar 'jig pa/ rtswa dang shing dang bong rdo dang 'dra ba shin tu phra ba rtul gyi tshogs dbu pa 'dra ba'o// / 
232b5(mdo): tshor ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur nyudra pa skye'o// 'du// shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang / cod pan las tshogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de yang gnyis las skyes pa'i smyig rgyu dang / 
232b6(mdo): 'dra ba ste/ dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gardungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od gzer 'bab pa gyen du langs pa rnas chu'i rlabs lta bur rlob cang ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyan cing chu tshol ba rnaMs la chur rmongs
232b7(mdo): bar bya bas mongs par byed do// de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/ de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa yang dag pa ma yin par yongasasu brtags pa las skyes pa/ dpyod
232b8(mdo): pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shig tu myi dmyigs pa bong bu'i rwa dang / mo sham gyi bu brjod pa ltar mying tsam du zad pa ste/ rmyi lam kyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o// dper na rmyi lam na gzugs
233a1(mdo): kyi 'du shes mthong ba sang ba'i tshe gzugs las matogs pa dang / bud myed bzang mo yang dmyig su myed do// de bzhin du myi shes pas ldog pa na/ bud myed dang skyes pa la matogs pa mthong ba
233a2(mdo): yang mngon par sangs rgyas na myi dmyig so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying po lta bu ste/ bsal na lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba// gzugs myed pa rnams rnal 'byor da can kyi dpyod pa rnams
233a3(mdo): kyis myi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid myed pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa 'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan tu rtsa dang / shing dang po rdo tsam la brten te/ gzugs kyi yan lag du las mngon
233a4(mdo): bar bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po che dang / rta dang shing rta dang / myi dang / rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig tu ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams
233a5(mdo): rnal ma yin gyi/ byis pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drid pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtog ste/ de yang bdag
233a6(mdo): nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig pu'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug myi 'jig
233a7(mdo): ba ste/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor da can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang nam mkha' lta bur gyi
233a8(mdo): 'jig ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig kyis 'dras dang byung ba 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
233b1(mdo): byung yang rung // ma byung yang rung / chos rnams chos nyid chos kyi gan pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos skyon byed pa nyid po 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje'i gang po spyor byed pa zhes byab
233b2(mdo): ni yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// rdo rje snying po spyod byed pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang 'jug go// spyod byed par 'dal ba ni byang chub sems
233b3(mdo): dpa' ma phrel par byaste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting 'dzin gyi ni de nyid du thos te sems cad la lnga ba skyed par gyur cing / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ lugs bsregs pa'i dang 'ang
233b4(mdo): pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de sems can gyi dge sa la brtsor 'grus btan zhing snying rje chen po dang / pha rol pa/ daphyidad pa rnams dang bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam pa
233b5(mdo): chad par byed cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mur 'a ka byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam du glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/ rnam par zhes pa'i yun
233b6(mdo): rab tu zhum pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas myi gnas shing rdzogs par myi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du myi phyir bangan du bya bya zhing ma reg pa dang / nye bar gyi bsgrub par
233b7(mdo): gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rje su zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor lo skor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye
233b8(mdo): bar spyod pa/ sprul pa'i yul can de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzind las bslang pa'i sbyor ba sa brgyad pa la 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/ sangs
234a1(mdo): rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag kyi so so rang gyis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te/ thams cad 'gro ba ma g.yos/ 
234a2(mdo): pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/ lhun gyi grub pa/ rtag pa ther zug pa/ brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po dag la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa ston/ 
234a3(mdo): par 'gyur te/ gnas gyur pa yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin can stobs dang mngon par shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la spyod pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu
234a4(mdo): bo zla la bur 'gro ste blta ba'i don yod pa/ phyi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji ltar de bur 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug
234a5(mdo): po bstand pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'a drug par 'byung ngo ro// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
234a6(mdo): chen po nyidas po che'i stong po las mtshogs pa'i/ gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i mtha
234a7(mdo): thug par sku grub pa yi sngags 'chang ba ltar myi sda zhing / khang khyim gi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du myi snang ba yi gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar/ de dag phrul pa yi 'od gzer dang / 'phrul pas
234a8(mdo): sprus pa la 'apyod cing 'ga'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yi sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par gyurd to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/ 
234b1(mdo): rnams// zhags pas sems myed de yin no// khral me lce mnyam pa ste// zhe sdug tug ni dngom po yin// zub spyod nal 'byod pa pad cin gis// 'di dag rtag tun pa gzhigs te/ nga
234b2(mdo): gornams ni dong ba yi phyir// rnal 'byor cang gis rnal 'byord pyod// gzugs ni 'byung po 'i tshogs yin te// phung po yi lhag ma gzugs myed pa/ ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang // dril
234b3(mdo): dum las tshogs myed// mkha' la rlung gzugs myi snang dang / bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni// mkhas pas soso rang rig dang/ yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi myod
234b4(mdo): yul 'das pa ni// sangs rgyas dngos po myi snang ste/ @sa rgyas skas ni mya ngan 'das/ mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas te/ nam rtog rtog dang bral bas na/ de ni
234b5(mdo): stan tu myi nus pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu myed pa ste/ yod dang myed kyin rnam par dasangs// rdo ba phye mar btags pa la/ gser ni yod par myi snang ste/ sbyangs pa'i las kyi khyad
234b6(mdo): par kas// gser ni yod par 'gyur ba yin// gzugs rnams tshul tu rnams gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag ma dang // khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang / rnam par
234b7(mdo): shes deng dbang po dag/ gcig dang ma por yang / rdul phrad rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos por sangs rgyas yod pa myin/ sangs rgyas byed pa 'ang ma yin te/ rnal 'byor da can nas/ 
235a1(mdo): gzhag pa sod/ rgya pa sa rgyas dag na/ 'jig rten kun gyi rtsa ba dang / yang dag dgas pa rgyas dang / 'did #
235a2(mdo): sprul pa yi rgyal pa lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod// mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste/ rnal 'byor da can gis thub pa mthong // khams rnams
235a3(mdo): gsum po 'das pa dag/ rnam pa tu mar sangs rgyas zhing // de bzhin gshegs ni sangs rgyas zhing // rgyal sras bzang dpos kun tu dag/ de na thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs
235a4(mdo): mtshan gis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor da na sa mnyam par gzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par ma de bzhin pan mun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes
235a5(mdo): shes byed la// stug pa rin rnam par spyod/ lkug pa de mi sems cad su/ sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kung/ skad cig 'jig pa zhin tu 'das/ ting nge 'dzind pa rtag tum mo// dga'
235a6(mdo): ldan nas sapas 'phrul pa kang // rtog pa can rnams yus kyis mthong // stug po nas gshegs glang zaste/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug na bzhugs// sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te/ 
235a7(mdo): sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam gzhag pa// chu'i za ba bzhin du sdang // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni/ tshon gyi 'byor da las rnam par mdzes
235b1(mdo): de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par mdzes// thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar// kacig dang tha dad sangs par te// dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni// 
235b2(mdo): skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyend// rdul las ma yin dus las myin// dbang po las myin gces pa myin// rkyen kyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa/ 
235b3(mdo): rgyu'i tshul du sangs rgyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten sku la 'khor bya ste// rgya mtshod mi dang shing dag/ de las 'gro ba sna tshogs bsam/ mnyam par
235b4(mdo): gzhag pas shi na tu dgyes// bya ba thams cad phyi nang gza' zla las tshogs padze rnams// phyir yang bya/ gi mthil bkod de// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'jud pa// 
235b5(mdo): sangs rgyas thub pa'i 'byord pa mnga'// thub chen thub pa/ 'i dam pa po// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa myed// sa sa rgyas 'phrul kyi skul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag
235b6(mdo): kun// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par 'phrul// rab rib myi shes nyon mongs pa'i// ca rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag myed lta ba rnams// yod dang myed pa yi smra bas bcom
235b7(mdo): 'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang // chung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams// 'di la byed dam cung zad dam// bdag dang bdag myed ga la yod// sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na// rnal
235b8(mdo): 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams// ji ltar sdang ba 'jig rten na// rmyi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas rnams la smyig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin 'jig
236a1(mdo): rten sna tshogs dag/ gdeg las tshogs pa yi las rnams kyang // rlung sdang tshogs pa yi thag pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor da mkhyen kyi mchog/ myi la 'khrul 'khor skor ba ste// rgya mtsho
236a2(mdo): skye ba 'jim dra// / sdug pa yi ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'dzes dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gaH
236a3(mdo): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa yi sta ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangan pa de lakro su 'thal mo sbyar de phyag
236a4(mdo): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gas yod to// @ma ldan 'das mtshams byed pa lnga bgyid pa rnams dang / dang pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa yong ba rnams
236a5(mdo): dang / mnar myed pa la gzhol ba rnams dang / pha dang ma ya snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / ba lang 'gums pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar
236a6(mdo): yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das sems cad de dag 'khor ba'i sdug sngal las ji ltar yong su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sbyid/ 
236a7(mdo): pag mkhyen pa'i sems tsun mas/ 'a ba'i drug sa mas ngas 'grol par 'gyur te/ de 'di ska ba kyi sbyin pa dang kyi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyid pas ni bya da
236a8(mdo): gyur ro// zang zing gi skyed pas ni sems can thams cad sa pan btags par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa son bkres pa dang nam po'i spyan sngal yongs su sbyong // chos kyi
236b1(mdo): pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongasu 'grel to// 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di sbyin na/ sbyin pa thams cad 'dun
236b2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang / nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang
236b3(mdo): gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos sbyin pa dang / gsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis stug sngal thams cad yong su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam
236b4(mdo): dpal yang sems can la la mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa dag gam dam pa yi chos 'asong pa dag kam/ 'phags pa dasong pa dag ka ma/ mnar myed pa gzhol pa dag gam/ bskal pa
236b5(mdo): gnas pa dag gam/ sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsu ma la snying ring pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag
236b6(mdo): gas/ chung ngu na yug gsod pa dag kyang rung phyag dar pa yang rung / speg can yang rung ste/ 'jam dpal sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po mad du 'byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin chen 'di thos pa dang
236b7(mdo): 'dri pa dang / 'dir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par stond pa dang / chung ngu na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste/ brjod pa dang
236b8(mdo): su yang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim 'gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas po phrad par byed cing lta ba dang / sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang / lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
237a1(mdo): 'jam dpal sems cad dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yong su 'grol bar 'gyur lo// 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs ka pad chos/ 
237a2(mdo): sra ba de 'dug gsade'i drung dam/ ro 'am/ robs pa khrig yod sa de'i ro mthong nas pa mtshams byed pa lnga'i las byang bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas ste dpag tshad
237a3(mdo): brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dgas/ bdag gi las kyi sdug sngal myi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug sngal
237a4(mdo): myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal su yang mdo sde rin po che 'di rib 'gror byas te/ me tog dang / gdug sos dang / me mar dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang
237a5(mdo): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha ba dan kyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de yang mchod par byas te/ ji ste chos sla ba de mtshams
237a6(mdo): myed pa sa byed na yang 'od kyang de'i sems 'khrug par myi bya'o// chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya gapal las chos ste de shi ba'i mobam pa dur khrod
237a7(mdo): na 'dug pa'i gzos kyang / de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang / bya gzhan po de dag thas
237a8(mdo): cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du thob par 'gyur te/ de la dem nur dang / the tsom dang / yid gnyis myi bya'o// sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang
237b1(mdo): chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos
237b2(mdo): nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro// / mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / 
237b3(mdo): mtha' yas yul can shi nang tu 'phra// bsam gtan mkhyend pa skyes bu'i mchog/ dbang po 'das pa mngon gsum pa// chags dang dbang po rnam par sangs// bsam gtan pas pa
237b4(mdo): bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub pa rnam 'byor mkhas pa rnams/ kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin// yod dang myed kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni
237b5(mdo): dri ma byed// blo dang shes bya bral ba ste// tshad dang dbang po spa sa pa yin// sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin/ de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul/ mtshan rnams kur kyang snga
237b6(mdo): ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan myed pa'ang// dregs can rnams kyi dregs myed mdzad// mnyam par gzhag cing dgos pa byed// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo myed byid// chags
237b7(mdo): myed lam la gnas pa ste// lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang // dri za ste myin myi 'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yong myi g.yo// de la ngo mtshar sred
237b8(mdo): pa byed// 'gro ba gang na 'ang g.yo ba myed// sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor dkyis// de ni pha rol yin pa yi phyir// sangs rgyas baphrul pa'i spyod pa yis/ bya ba tsam tu lda dzas kyisas mthong
238a1(mdo): dang 'di na myed// ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor da yul du gnas pa ni// dregs pa myed mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam pa za dang mur 'dug rnams// gang la kang gis dbang
238a2(mdo): gyurd pa// de la de lta'i chos stond te// rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis// rnal 'byor can chos rnams phye zhing // rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnaMs
238a3(mdo): dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thul tshal dang zhing rnams kyi// phun gsum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung kun rnams dag pa// lha'i lha yi mthu/ 
238a4(mdo): yin no// phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin// 'byung ba gsu kyi thabs rnams gang // rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub
238a5(mdo): 'bras bu// de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yin// dgos dang dka 'thub can rig dang // gad mo rtsa ba'i sbyor pa dang // karamakhan rnams la rtag tu'o// dka' ldan gnas khabs 'jig
238a6(mdo): rten gyis// mthong ba bud myed 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel pa dang // cod pan can dpalag na gzhung// dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di
238a7(mdo): thub pa de yis te// thos na' yang shin tu snang // rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin// ri dgas rnams kyi smyig rgyu 'dra// 'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la// dzik+ka zhar du mthong ba dang // rmyi lam na
238a8(mdo): yang gzhan du pali// rmyi la bzhin du byis pas mthong // khyad par dag du mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor can rnams log yo bzhin// lha'i lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu// myi sbyin gu
238b1(mdo): yang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nad 'dal// sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne co la la rdzogs rnams pasas kyang / de'i yul la rnam par bskrad de// de dag rnal 'byor kyis myi mthong // thub pa gang dka
238b2(mdo): 'byung ba dang // byung da ltar gang 'khod ba// de dag yul ni gang yang myin// swa pa'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i phyir// sa dang sar ni rnam spyopyod pa'i// snying rje chen po de la bstand/ lha'i lhas ni byas pa yis
238b3(mdo): stug po'i zhib yod pa yis// 'di dag rdo rje snying po de// mnyam par gzhag pa shin tu bsta nang // rnal 'byor da can gyi rnal 'byor nga yul// ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dang // dbyibs dang mdog dang
238b4(mdo): khyad par dag/ bzo' bor gyurd pas byas pa ni/ gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste// brtags pa'i dngos po yin pa sbyin skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba 'ang chos tsam
238b5(mdo): mo// kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yo/ da brtags// mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams/ dgos pa sgrub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas myi rnyed de// 
238b6(mdo): 'jigs dang bral bas myi gnas pa'o// 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba myed// rkyen du bya rnams myed par yang // brtags pa'i dngos po gang yang myed// rkyen rnams / 
238b7(mdo): tshogs te 'dus pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen tu gyur // yod dang myed pa'i dngos myi sdang // myed pa'i sdang ba yod ma yin// phra ba'i bdag gis rdo par brtags// phung/ 
238b8(mdo): po rdza mar ras las rdzogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smyig rgyu bzhin// rmyi lam dri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor pa drug dang bcas// rab tu phra brgya yis// 'dug pa dag dang phyir ldog dang // mya ngang/ 
239a1(mdo): 'da' ba gang yang myed// de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu ston/ sa'i dbang po lag pa'i 'phreng pa tshad myed pa// lus dpe' myed pa/ dpung
239a2(mdo): rgyan dang / gtsug lag gi rin po che dang / se mo ngos shi nad tu chas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pa sa? la btsugs te theg pa gsum dang 'dzig
