239a3(mdo): rten dang myi 'gal pa/ lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde' ba la gnas rdo rje'i dbang po rnal 'byor de chen po'i rnal 'byor dade can/ rnal 'byor kyi mkhan
239a4(mdo): po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad myi 'gal bar stond pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye bo thams cad da pa/ rgyal po li 'khor dag du cod pan can dag la/ chos ston
239a5(mdo): pa yin te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol gdab kyi sa/ bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bdel bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i
239a6(mdo): lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston da cig/ des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag la mngon gsum du gyur pa'i gyod yul/ sangs
239a7(mdo): rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde' ba nan tan gis rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gi lus bcu la dbang sgyur zhing / stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
239a8(mdo): kyi gzhal myed khang gyis gnas gyur da te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa spangs te/ sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur da te/ rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor
239b1(mdo): rnams cad/ stug por mug bod/ rtsod pa rnamam sam ma chogs stond par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po ldam nog/ dag 'o dgas/ cod pan can la khyad lam du// chos
239b2(mdo): bdag myed du/ sa da de la spyod // ses kyi rang ba di mtshan nyid dag/ rna ma cos stod yul yi she'ang// nas don pa byar gyi 'o// 'gro ba ma tog sa yod nas
239b3(mdo): 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin das gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstand kyis// rgyal po pal de nyon cig/ dpyid kyi smyig rgya ji bzhin pa// de yi rnam par 'gro ba 'di/ 
239b4(mdo): mtshad gzhi la mtshan ma spya rnams las// rnam par rtog pan myi tog/ tho dang rtogs byas bskyed pa ste// togs bya de khyad gyur dpa// gnyen por gyur da pa gcig myed pa// nya
239b5(mdo): dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems myed tsam po'ang yod myid// / tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka myed// rnam par rtog pa sem sa tsam ste// rno bar rtog pa rnam myi rtog/ shes dang shes bya
239b6(mdo): rnam rtog la// sems tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya sems dang tsam pa mi// rtag tu tsam la shes yod byin// seMs kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid// gang zag dag kyang g.yol ba rnams// gang tshe los/ 
239b7(mdo): la rnam brtags na// rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur// dgu la bsam gtan pyod yul te// bcu la la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar/ 
239b8(mdo): 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // myi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste// sos dang rnam shes de bzhin te// myi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing // rtag ci zhi
240a1(mdo): pa bdel ba btas// 'dus ma byas palas zhes te// stug po 'i ning na rnam par mdzes// napa zhes 'byung sum 'das pa ste/ sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas pa
240a2(mdo): bsam myed// bsdug cing rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa// ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste// tshul kyang mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi/ 
240a3(mdo): rkyen rnams la// rgyu rnams ji ltar sdang ba bzhin// zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las mye byung ba// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bam par bya// de bzhin ye
240a4(mdo): shes byung ba'i me// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas ki lus las 'phos gyurd cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spong sa pa// chags pa myed pa'i ye shes so// stug po 'i dbus na
240a5(mdo): rnam par mdzes// bskyed myed rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i/ bdag myed nyid la skyabs su song // / rgyud kyi rgyu nad rnams chad
240a6(mdo): pa'i phyir// 'jig pa myed cing 'byung myed pas// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa// bdag myed nyid la skyabs su song // zhing gyur da zhi ba zhing ma byas// zhi bas zhibs bden nyid du// lta ba thams cad
240a7(mdo): rnam dag phyir// bdag myed nyid la skyabs su song // sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni// bdag po sa la bdag myed pas// myi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang // rnam par stond pa'i mdas kyang ste/ bsreg
240a8(mdo): pa'i me bzhin du// bdag nyid zhing gyur da de nyid du// de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te// bdag myed bsam gtan rab gnas pa// lta ba'i chos la bder gnas ki// so so rang rig spyod yul ba// tho
240b1(mdo): myed nas nyes dri myed// 'phags pa rnams kyi sa la gnas// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags pa la gnas// sems can sa las rab gyurd te// stug po la dkyil/ 
240b2(mdo): na rnam par mdzes// myig pa dag myi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa/ rdo rje'i snying so skyabs dang 'gon// gang la skyabs su mchi' par bgyil// sangs rgyas yod myin myed pa
240b3(mdo): myin// phung po'i skye shi rnams bsregs te// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas// shes bya dri myed zhi ba la// skyabs su song shig grogs po dag/ rtog dang tshad
240b4(mdo): las bral ba ste// blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin// stug pol kyis la bzhugs rnal 'byor can// de yang grogs po 'gon skyabs so// rnal 'byor da na can rnams kun kyi zhing // zhing mchog bza
240b5(mdo): ba stug po'o// rnal 'byor 'byor da pa mang pos gang // stu ga po de la skyabs su song // spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i theg zug lta bu dang / 
240b6(mdo): rmi lam mo sham bu 'byung dang // rmyi lam bud myed babang mo sbyar// thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong // dri za'i grong khyer pyod pa bzhin// skra bung 'gal pa bskor pa snyam// smyig rgyu dges sred
240b7(mdo): brdungs rgya// yod dang byed pa rnam par spangs// sbru ma'i lus gzugs snga tshogs dang // 'brul pa'i skul par de dag ni// 'jig nyeran khyod che mthong ba ste/ sa dngas la grub pa rnams// sdom
240b8(mdo): byed du ma'i gzugs gyur dag// sgyu ma'i shing ki 'bras bu lta pa// srin dang dul klogs pa yang // thub pas rnal 'byor nga rnam par mthong // rnga las phyogs pa'i pha bol bzung ltar// 'gro ba dag gi nas tog
241a1(mdo): yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // chos lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni// bdag myed myi gnyis brgyan pa ste// bag chags thog ma myed pa yi// sems kyi gnas/ 
241a2(mdo): ngan len byung yog// 'od ma'i dpa' rlabs 'dra bar ni// kun gzhi'i sa la gnas pa yin// rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la// phan tshun dag tu bskyed byas na// dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa myed// 'od pa'ang myed
241a3(mdo): par myi 'gyur te// snga myed bag chags gnas can rnams// 'dug pa'i yul la gzhol pa dag/ phun chu na sems brgyan rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// / rnam par tha dad ma yin te// dus cig tu yang de dag 'byung // 
241a4(mdo): par bdudu ni rims kyis so// thog ma myed nas sem pa 'dug pa/ skar ma gza'i dkyil 'khor dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang / ri dang sde dang tshal rtsogs la// rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste// 
241a5(mdo): rims kyis kyang ni shes par byos// yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul mas na gnas bzhin mthong ba yin// lus kyi 'jug par rims kyis kyang // srog la rten cing 'byung ba yin// rdzas dang grags
241a6(mdo): dang chos rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'byung ba ste// myur zhing bcal dang bza' rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'dab myin// ro dang dri'i rnam pa la// rims kyis ma dang 'byung ba yin// rims kyis
241a7(mdo): kha dog khyad par gyi// sna tshogs la 'ang dus gcig tu// rgyal sems ni bsam myi khyab// rtag tu rang ba'i ni 'od can no// de bzhinade gshegs pa'i snying po ste// rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas// yid
241a8(mdo): ni kun gyi gzhi'i las byung // yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te// rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang // sa'i khyad par byed pa'o// bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu// sa bon kun gyi kun gzhi'i ni// kun
241b1(mdo): nas nyon mongs rnam dag kyang // rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can kyis// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dge ba yin// rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho la rlabs dag ji
241b2(mdo): bzhin du// tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su// de bzhin kun gzhis khyad par byed// sa dang sa la rnam dag cing // gzhan du gyur na rnam par mdzes// yang dag ji bzhin don stond pa// rdo rje snying pos
241b3(mdo): yang smras pa// mthong zhing thos te shes pas na// sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis// spobs pa can la bstand par gyis// khyad par du'o khyad par bdag// khams phran rnams kyi khams nang nga // sa
241b4(mdo): la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi'i rnam par dag gyur na// sa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba yin// 'dzam bu'i gling pa dbang ba rjid// 'khor lo 'khor par yang 'gyur ro// dka' ldan la
241b5(mdo): rdzogs gzhal myed du// tshes rabs kyi dbang por 'gyur// dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te// dbang sgyur gnas su de/ bzhin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po li bdag/ gzun
241b6(mdo): khams bdag po 'dra bzhin te// gzugs myed 'du shes myed na sems can// bsam gtan ba del ba'i 'bras bur kyang // yang dag mngon byam chags sam// yang dag mthal la ma reg
241b7(mdo): pa'i nyes pa yis// chags skyed mnyam par bzhag pa ste// sal dad kyis phug por zhugs nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas pa yar// chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te// rten la bgan
242a1(mdo): du gyurd cing bdel// rtag pa btan bzhi pa'i chos// stug pa'i dkyis nasras dang bcas// chos kyi bdag por rnam par mdzes// 'jigs pa myed pa myi'i mchog/ mya ngan 'das pa
242a2(mdo): 'jigs pa gyir// mur 'dug rnams kyis cing brjod bzhin// mchog dang tha ma 'ang ma yi// rgyal po bcul po'i las rnams kyis// theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste// stug po chong pa'i khyad par yang // rgyal
242a3(mdo): por yang dag skye bar 'gyur// sa dpas la gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nye bar 'gyur// 'chi ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// rgyal po 'jigs par mthar ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
242a4(mdo): sku// sems can zad cing myed 'gyur ba// de ste mya ngan 'di'o// 'jig na// sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang // sems can 'byung ba myed par 'gyur// sems can khams rnams zad
242a5(mdo): gyur da na// rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po myed// mya ngan 'das myed shes bya myed// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyang myed// rtse mar bsregs pa'i dpe' rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i dpel
242a6(mdo): dag gis// tog can tha rad la mkhas pa rnams// lus can rnams la tha rad pa stond/ yod dang myed pa'i rnam thard kyis// tha rad pa'i bdel las de dag ring // bsam gtan gnas pa
242a7(mdo): thams cad ste/ lugs su 'jug dang bzlog pa dag/ gzugs myed 'du shes myed pa dang // mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang // ma nyams nyams pa byed pa yi// chos kyi mtshan la mkhan/ 
242a8(mdo): pan a// sa'i khamam sa lakhas pa dag// rgya'i dbang po'i sdug par 'gro// yong dang byed dang 'jig pas ni// de dag 'khosas kyi 'byung te// bzang pa gsum pa 'jigs byed cing / 
242b1(mdo): rgyu dang dmyigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang // de ma thag dang dbang yang ste// sa rnams bdag myed pha rol dag/ myig dang gzugs dag rgyu byas te// phrad pas gang dag 'jug gyur da pa// gzugs
242b2(mdo): rnams mngon byed ye shes dang // de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur// phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// yod dang myed pa'i lta bsla// de ste grol nas 'jig na ni// seMs
242b3(mdo): dang dmyigs las bral ba'i phyir// rnam par dmyigs pas myi gnas te// mdun du rtogs pa myed gyur cing // de'i rang bzhin myi gnas la// gang tshe dmyigs pa spar pa la// rnam par rtog pa
242b4(mdo): myi gnas shing // gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te// to/ ka myed rtog pa spangs pa na// de tshe sems ni mnyam par bzhag// 'gro ba rnam rtog myed pa mthong // gzung dang 'dzin
242b5(mdo): pa myed pa ste// bsam gyis myi khyab shes la gnas// rten pa'i la ni gyur da pa ste// ye shes gnas ngan len pa ngas// yid bzhin rnam pa bcul po ni// sna tshogs gzugs
242b6(mdo): kyis brgyan pa ste// sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing // stug po stug por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung // myi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nang dang phyi'i sa
242b7(mdo): rnams kyang // tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing // so ngos rang gi ye shes mkhas// lta bu'i chos la rnam par gnas// rgyal po stug por 'dod pa ni// ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byo lang
242b8(mdo): can// mtshan ma bying dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang // yang dag mtha'i gnas pa yis// so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu// rnam
243a1(mdo): 'byor de sems dpa'i rnal 'byor can// mtshan ma rgyang dang nga rgyal po stug por 'dod pa ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o// 'phrang pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te// bdag gi phyogs las nas
243a2(mdo): nyams par 'jig pa ni// rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro// ma grub pa dang yang dpel yi// rgyal po 'gal par shin tu 'gyur// rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i mtshang // de dag rnam pa sngar 'gyur ro// 'phrad
243a3(mdo): pa gsum po sun 'byind pa// chud zos bung ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byind pa// yang dag ma yin rtog pas smra// de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtog pa paslad du myig can la// 'dra chos myi la
243a4(mdo): 'ichos spyod can// nor dang bzlog pa myed pa dang // bdag dgi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo// pha rol phyogs la rten pa dang // lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig
243a5(mdo): byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gi mtha'// rgyal po yod pa ma yin te// kun tu rgyu zhing 'khod pa dag/ 'byung ba dag par rgyug pa'o// de dang de'i las rgyud du// thugs rje'i
243a6(mdo): dbang gis rgyal gshegs pa// phrul pa'i 'od gzer lha rdzas kyis// zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khom// snga ma'i las dang tshul mthun par// pa skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad// rgyad dang rgyud
243a7(mdo): byid rnams la// chos kyang bstan par myi 'gyur te// de ste mya ngan 'dal 'jig na// rgyas pas yon tan ji zhig brnyes// dbang sgyur gsum po rnams dpa yang // nam par thar
243a8(mdo): dang pa den pa mdzang// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhil po dag/ dran pa nyid bzhag stong pa nyid// tha dang yang dag shes pa'i dang // 'di sa lung bstad pa rnams dang // dmyigs pa dang ni ma tha
243b1(mdo): rgyu dang dpang yang de bzhin te// gzugs myed nang myod pa dang // dbang po stobs rnams bcas pa yang // mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang // rnam par shes pa dang de rgyu dang // 'dus ma byas chos rnams dang // 
243b2(mdo): byang chub yan lag gang zag dang // rnam par thard dang skyes bu brgyad// sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang // zild kyis gnon pa'i 'du mched dang // ye shes mngon tu chud pa bcu la// sdug bsngal chos nyid
243b3(mdo): shes pa dang // sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog/ sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjesu shes// 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang // 'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang // 'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang // 'gog pa dag la
243b4(mdo): chos shes dang // 'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang // 'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang // lam la chos kyi shes pa dang // lam la so / sor rtog pa dang // lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes// shes pa
243b5(mdo): rnams slob pa bcul// brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang // rigs las rigs dang lan cig 'ong // bar chad gcig pa gang zag dang // par mar mya ngan 'ad pa dang // gzhan skyes mya
243b6(mdo): ngan 'da' ba dang // mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang // steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang // ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs// rnal 'byor de can yul sna tshogs te// 
243b7(mdo): tha ma mchog dang par ma'o// byang chub sems dpa' khyad par d+ya// mchog dang bcas par de la sgom// rang sangs rgyas ni dbu' ma ste// nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// pun+dul gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa/ 
243b8(mdo): lnga gsum bcu drug dag tu yang // sems kyi chogs kyi 'gog pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed// gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin// sems ni rang bzhin 'od snang can// zag pa gang
244a1(mdo): g.yin de sems kyin// sems dang lhan gcig gnas pa'ang byed// ma 'ongs pa ni ma byin te// da ltar byung ba gnas pa myed// sems ni rkyenang dang myi ldan par// 'di dang gzham
244a2(mdo): du'ang skye ba myed// pas gtan bzhi'i na sems myed de// 'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa myed// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te// yid dang rnam shes lnga po'o// rang gi rnam rtog mya shes pas// dpa' rlabs
244a3(mdo): bzhin du 'byung ba yin// brtag dang rtog las rdo grol pa// thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o// yod dang myed las lha rdzas su// gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing // stug po dang ni stug dkyil na// zla
244a4(mdo): ba lta bur rab tu mdzes// de ni myi 'jig bde bar gnas// stug poli dkyil na sras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen// ye shes ro cag nyid du 'gyur// bsam yas
244a5(mdo): rnal 'byol yul can te// rgyal po zla ba lta bur myong // rgya/ nyel po phun sum 'tshogs pa 'di// rnal 'byor da khyer pa thu pa rnams kyi// rtag par rgyal po de'i phyir// khyod kyi yid
244a6(mdo): dang rnal 'byor shog/ 'dod rnams rnam pa drug po dang // che ngas pa dag ni bcu'i gnyis dang // gzugs myed shes myed sems can du// rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis// stug por 'dod pa
244a7(mdo): 'ang thob khang te// bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i ye shes bcu po rnams// bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur// chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol sos dang kun
244a8(mdo): rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang // 'gog dpal ma las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i shes dang bye skye dang // khong bkrol bsgom pa de bzhin te// sha kur ta la rgyal rigs dang // mig
244b1(mdo): sha ku dang so ma'i rigs// yang dag don stong rgyal po'i mchog/ khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags// de'i rigs su khyod skyes shing // zhum pa myed par stug por song // lta ba'i chos la gnas

244b7(mdo): myi 'byung ste// mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin// mtshan ma bying dang 'brel pa ste// rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags// mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag las// rnam par

247a1(mdo): par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// skye ba la ni rgyun yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam tog ste// gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed// 'gro dang myi 'gro 'gro ba yi// gti mug rnams kya/
