273a8(mdo): khong du chud pa rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par zhe nad par yang lhad par byed do// myi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang po pa
273b1(mdo): nas rab tu rgyug ste// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba/ rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo cad/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
273b2(mdo): thob par myi nus pa/ theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam yang myi 'jug pa rnams 'dzi nad pa las rnam par byar ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myi mthong bas stug po'i dkyil 'khor kyi skal ba can
273b3(mdo): rnams kyang / stug po 'am stug po'i sgra yang myi thos so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa 'di ni rnal 'byord can rnams kyi lta ba yongasu sbyad pa ste/ 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
273b4(mdo): gas kyang brtson par kis shig/ sangs brgyas kyi zhing stug por 'judag pa'i gnas gi tshul yang rnal 'byord can rnams la ston cig/ rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ste/ le'u brgyad do// 
273b5(mdo): khab song rdol ji ltar sugs// yongs kyis kum tu rab 'khor ba/ de bzhin phung po'i shing / stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor// rtsa dang 'jig pa shing
273b6(mdo): smyig dang / theg pa rnam su 'dus tshogs las// khyim du ji ltar sdang gyu rad pa// de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o// lcags dang khab long ro langs la// sems can nye bar dmyigs myed
273b7(mdo): kyang // thams cad sems cad lta bur g.yo// de bzhin phung po bdag byed pa'o// rgyal sras phyag na rin chen gis// gzugs mar rgyal mchog la smras pa// mnyam gzhag rdo rje snying po la
273b8(mdo): rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byas so// rgyal sras 'jigs myed mkhas pa rnams// kun gyis thos par 'gyur ba ni// brtag bral brtag par myi nus pa/ brjod pas rnam par 'ayangs pa ste/ 
274a1(mdo): mying dang myi can rnam bral ba// 'on kyang 'du ba de bzhin te// sa tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi// rang bzhin ci dang cir gnas pa// de nas gzugs mang rgyal po yis// rdo rje snying po
274a2(mdo): 'jigs myed la// rjes su 'brel ba'i skabs dris pa// dngos po don gzhan brtags pa ste// rdo rje dbang po dngos po gang // la la rab tu brtag bya ba// mying dang 'du shes sogs pa'i yul// yod das rdo rje
274a3(mdo): snying pos spros// mying rnams sus byas ji lta bu// mying ni ci la rab tu gnas// myi mgon tshig ni thos pa dang // rdo rje snying pos de la smras// 'di dag thams cad myong tsam ste// 'du shes tsam la rab
274a4(mdo): tu gnas// brjod las tha dad gyurd pa yi// brjod par bya yod pa myi// phung po bzhi po myong yin te// gzugs kyang tsam zhes rnam par brtag/ tsam la mying du brtags pa ni/ 
274a5(mdo): skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba ste// tsam la mtshan ma zhes bya bar// rgyal ba rgyal sras bdag gis gsungs// mtshan ma myed paramying du ni// de dag rnam par rtog myi nus// de bas mtshan ma
274a6(mdo): rten byas shing // mying du kun nas brtag pa yin// ji ltar lding dang lnga byin dang // bar ba de yang yod pa myin// mtshan ma myed par ci yang rung // byis pas de la rnam myi brtag/ de bzhin sa 'di thos nang
274a7(mdo): kyang // mtshan ma byed par yod pa myin// ci yod mtshan mar myi rtog pa// mtshan ma yod na rnam par brtag/ rdza dang sngam bu shing rta dag/ gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod// 'jig
274a8(mdo): rten 'di ni 'di tsam ste// gzugs tsam rnam pa gzhan myi 'gyur// tsam la mying du brtags pa ste// 'di la yang dag myang yod myin// myong myed rnam par bral bar yang / 
274b1(mdo): sa rnams grub pas mthong ba ni// rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug/ rnam rtog byed pa myi skye'o// chos skye myed pa gzhan 'gyur ba// phyi zad de la skye bar 'gyur// rgyu myed phyir na mying byed de
274b2(mdo): 'du shes tsam la rnam par rtog/ de bas rgyal po rtag par yang // 'du shes ma yin 'du shes bsgoms// 'di dag thams cad 'di tsam ste// thams cad las ni gzhan byed do// tsam ni gzugs su
274b3(mdo): shes par bya// de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs// cha lugs ring dang sku yangs te// mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs gcig/ 'du shes mying dang rnam rtog dang // brjod dang khyad par lhan gcig ste
274b4(mdo): tsam dang mtshan ma 'du shes su// spyod pa rab tu gdags pa ste/ tsam la gnas te mying rnams kyang // kun rdzob don tu rnam par brtags// brjod pa myed par dngos po ni// ma byung byung
274b5(mdo): bar myi 'gyur te// rnam shes rnams kyi 'byung ba yang // rtogs bya myed par yod pa myin// rtogs bya mying dang tsam po ni sa rnams thams cad de nyid de// dngos po gang la gang myin gis
274b6(mdo): brtags par bya ba de bzhin byin// 'di ni chos rnams chos nyid de// brtags na gnas pa myed pa'o// 'di dag thams cad phyir tsam ste// 'du shes tsam gi dngos po myed// de myed pas na myong// 
274b7(mdo): byed de// mying byed pas na rnam kyi rtag/ rnam par myi rtog zhing gyu rad pa// bsregs pas 'tshig pa'i me bzhin te// khur cas ji skad khur bskur ba// de dang tha dad ma tshan cad de// re
274b8(mdo): bzhin tsam ki myong ki khung// de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyer// sems la tsam zhes rnam par brtag/ myang kis tsam du sems tsam kis// 'di ni skyes bu sdong po zhes// mim
275a1(mdo): nung ste mying tsam brtag/ 'byung ba rnams dang 'dus pa dang // tsam yang gzugs la rnam par brtag/ tsam po myed par 'byung ba li tsam zhes bya ba myi dmyigs ste/ bum pa'i ngos
275a2(mdo): la yon tan ltar/ tsam la mying ni rnam par gnas// bum pa bum pa'i dngos po yi se// rnam par dben zhing myi dang bral// bum pa'i bum pa'i dngos por ram// myir yang mying du gnas pa myed// 
275a3(mdo): rnal 'byord can gis gang ki tshe// mying tsam g.yo ba myed pa dang // rnam rtag gnyis dang brel ba ste// myi tsam yod myin mthong ba na// ji ltar me ldan lcags rnams dang // sbrang tshil dag dang rgya spyugs
275a4(mdo): kyang/ chu dang mnyam par khur bar 'gyur// 'on kyang/ chu'i yon tan myed/ de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ na pa zhes bdun dang snyan gcig tu// rtag tu las su 'jug par
275a5(mdo): byed// rnam par shes pas yun tu sangs// Sha ba long las rten byas shing / lcags ni sems can bzhin 'kho yang // de dag gnyis ka byed pa myed/ sems can gso so/ 
275a6(mdo): zhi cag so// rnam pa ni bdu shes bgra 'a 'dakun kAn bdun 'di bzhin do// ag cags kyang bus brgyad pas // sems can bzhin ga ma sems can byed// yus sa kun tu rgyam par/ 
275a7(mdo): dug/ 'gro ba kun tu 'khor ba ste/ gcig la gcig gis myi shes pa/ byed byed lcags dang khab long bzhin/ mako lo d+ham sde mang po// kha mang lag pa du sa dang // sras kyang
275a8(mdo): rgyalar rab bsgyur cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa byed/ gnod tu mang ba'i zhing gi rnams// cad byed stong du 'gro byas zhing // de dang de yang ma kon yon pas// deng/ kun latan
275b1(mdo): mchod byed// ri ba'i dang mnyam pa'i// me tog nang bza'i char mang po/ sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas// de dag mchod pa rab tu byed// 'breng ba 'phreng byed non par dang // rin chen brgyad pa
275b2(mdo): sna tshogs kyis// thams cad mkhyend dang rgyal sras la// rtag par mchod pa rab tu byed// srin lta bu'i gzhal byed khang // sna tshogs mang po'i gzugs gyurd pa// mtha' ma nam mkha'i
275b3(mdo): mu dang mnyam// gzhan yang rdul phran rtul snyed kyis// sbrul mang lha'i bu mo'isi// rol mos la snyan rab bsgrags ste// gzhal myed dag la mngon gnas nas// de bzhin gshegs
275b4(mdo): la mchod pa byed// stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob cing / dadog pa'i sa nas mnyam par// chos kyi spri da las 'thon 'gyur nas/ sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa rnams
275b5(mdo): sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro las rdzogs// ting nge 'dzind la mnyam gzhag ste// gzungs la mkhas par gyu rad pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed// sangs
275b6(mdo): rgyas yang dag brjod mos rnams// mtha' yas zhing du 'gro byas shing // yang dag yon tan ldan pa dag/ sangs rgyas yon tan rab tu brjod// dbung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom
275b7(mdo): skye/ rgyal ba dag dang thabs gcig tu// rgyal sras so so rang rig pa'i// rtogs par bya ba'i ting 'dzind sgom/ gnas gzhan gyur pa'i yon tan can// chos la bdag
275b8(mdo): myed stond pa rnams// sos pa thams cad rgyud bcad cing // dam pa'i don la rnam bsgom pa chos lnga rnams kyi rang bzhin dang // rnam shes brgyad la'ang de bzhin te/ 
276a1(mdo): mkhas pa byas par rtag gyu rad cing // mkhas mnyam gzhag rnams mchod pa byed// shin tu phra ba'i rdul 'ang dang / de bzhin chen po'i lus kyis kyang // sna tshogs pa'i gzugs
276a2(mdo): gyu rang nas/ @#/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ sa rnams kun ka 'dag lus dang / yungs kar 'brur yang rab 'jug de// rgya mtsho ba lang rjes su byed// ba yang rjes kyang gang chen
276a3(mdo): mchod// sdug gcig rtse mor brtag g.yo ba'i// 'gro ba rab tu 'dzud byed kyang // gnod par byed pa ma yin te// 'gro ba dag na rno par spyod// longs 'apyod can gi spyod yongs yul// nyi zla sa dang / 
276a4(mdo): mnyam pa ste// tshig myed sa dang 'dra bar yang // pa rnam pa kun kyis phan 'dogs shing // me dang rlung dang 'dra ba ste// rtag tu chu dang sman 'dra ba// rin chen khams kyi 'byung kung ltar// 
276a5(mdo): sems can kun yang nye bar 'tsho// skyes pa myed cing 'gags pa myed// ma chad rtag pa'ang myed pa ste/ tha dad don myin don gcig myin// 'gro myed 'o ba myed pa' rnams/ rnam par
276a6(mdo): rnam par brtags pa'i myir dag dang // kun tu brtags pa yi rang bzhin gis// sems cad rnams kyi don byed pa// mying dang mying myed rnam sasangs dag/ sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam 'dra// dri za
276a7(mdo): 'igrong khyer dpe' bzhin te/ smyig rgya chu'i zla ba 'dra// rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa dag/ glog dang sprin dang du ba dang // mgal ba'i 'khor lo spyig rgya 'dra// 'di tshul brtags
276a8(mdo): pa'i chos rnams ni// rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa ste// gang dang gang gi mying rnams kyis// chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa// de ni de na yod pa myin// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// 
276b1(mdo): 'di dag thams cad mying tsam ste// 'gro ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// brjod pa dang ni tha dad pa// brjod par bya ba gang yang myed// 'di ni sa'i rang bzhin te// kun tu brtags pa rab tu bstanang // mying dang
276b2(mdo): gzugs las rten byas shing // gsum las yid de 'byung ba yin// rnga sgra me ni 'du 'phrod pas// myu gu sa bon sa las rims// khang pa las chags sna tshogs dang / sngam bu rdza las rdzogs
276b3(mdo): pa dang // lus can rnams dang chos rnams kyi// 'di ni rang bzhin gzhan dbang po// don rnams dor pa myed pa dang // gang yang zag pa myed pa'i chos// so so rang rig rgyud rnams dang / chos la bdag
276b4(mdo): byed nyid dag ni/ thams cad chos kyi grub pa ste// rang de bzhin du ni de brtags so// rang bzhin gis ni chos kyi nams mdang mtshan du bsgrags pa ste/ chos rnams tha
276b5(mdo): cad 'dres par ni/ rang bzhin myed na rab tu 'gyur// gcig byin rdzas rnams 'dus pa las// sgyu ma yi mkhan pos gcig myin gzugs// rtogs par sla ba ma yin pa'i
276b6(mdo): sgyu ma'i rigs byas bzhin/ de ltar dngos po thams cad kyang // rnam par rtog par rnam par brtags// rtogs par myi rlung phyi cig gzugs// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// sna chog pa
276b7(mdo): bu 'dra ba'i// ri dgas rdzas kyi rgya tshogs nas// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos nas byas dang // sems can kun gyi gzugs yin te// de ltar dngos po 'di dag kun// na par rtog pas rnam par brtags// rang bzhin
276b8(mdo): rtogs par dka' ba ste// kud kyi brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs// tshon dang phrad na nas par mdzes// de bzhinas rnams kyang ka ste// rtogs pas rnam par brtan
277a1(mdo): na// yon tadadam su kyi gnas te// rnam mis ma yin dang dra// skyig rgyu na pra lA bu ste// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// ji skar dI ba'i khang pa dag/ 'ang pa ma yin 'amapa
277a2(mdo): rgyu myed par yang myi sdang ste// de bzhin sa rnamapa sna tshogs nyid// nyi blag zhal byed khang rnams dang // tha ma la ri dang rin chen mi// du ba bzhin gi gnod pa ni/ nams kyang nyes par myi
277a3(mdo): 'gyur te// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las// rtogs pas rnam par brtags byas nas// dngos nyid myi 'grub dngos rnams kyi// rang bzhin kun tu rnam brtags pa'o// rgyu las dngos
277a4(mdo): po mya 'byung ste// rgyu myed las kyang ma yin no// rang bzhin zhes bya rnam rtog ste// dngos myed dngos myed rnam par brtags// mtsha nu ma la ni myi rten te// gnyis la rnam par rtog pa gnas/ 
277a5(mdo): yang dag shes dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog pa bzlog/ pa'o// sems ni mtshan ma 'dra ba ste// mtshan ma nyid la gnas pa yin// yid la sems rnams lnga po ni// dpa' rlabs
277a6(mdo): bzhin du rab tu 'byung // sems ni bag chags rgyu ba ste/ bag chags rnams la thog ma myed// thog ma myed pa'i blo'i yul to/ yul ni sems kyi nor pa'o// sems ni yul dang 'dra ba ste// sa rnaMs
277a7(mdo): yul zhes bya ba yis// thams cad sa bon kun gizho la/ rnam par she pa kyad kyang gnas// ni shes bdun po kun gzhi las// rab tu 'byung po phan tshun nas// sems rnaMs dang kud gzhi sa// rtag byed chang pa
277a8(mdo): bang byed pa sems nas kya thams cad kun gzhi yin// bar sngang rnam par gnas pa ste// gsu po 'dus pa'i rkyen 'byung ba/ bdag dang rgyu dbang po dag las byung // lus can rnaMs kyi rnam shes ni// yul nas rnyed sa
277b1(mdo): 'byung ba ste// 'di ni rtog pa can gi yul// rgyu dpa las kyi rgyus byung ba// dbang po sa rnams thams cad dang // tshangs las pa'i phyir ro la dang // de dag lnga myin las kyang phyin// rdul phran gis kyang sam byas// 
277b2(mdo): sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi nyid// lha'i yul tu g.yo ba yin// rgya dang rnams kun kazhis ma byas te// rkyen kyis kun gzhi byas pa myin// 'di dag la ni gsum 'dus myed// 'du shes 'on kyang 'khor bste
277b3(mdo): shel 'dra zla ba bzhin du yang // rdo shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu// bag chags byung ba'i rnam shes dang // kun gzhi rtag tu 'grogs pa dang // zla ba sbyang kis zin pa bzhin// rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig
277b4(mdo): bag chags de las langs pa yis// rgyal bar byed do yang dang yang rgyas pa gzhan yang rgyas byed de// de la'ang gzhan gzhon gis// yang dpa yang // de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i me sa// mthong nas soso// 
277b5(mdo): de rnam par ldog// myi brtan yul la kun nas 'brel// kha ba long rdo la lcags bzhin te// kun kyi gzhi la sems yod pa// zag bcas zag pa myed pa dang // bag chags dag gis bsgom pa rnas/ 
277b6(mdo): 'jug dang phyir ldog byed pa yin// ji ltar 'asreg las me bus shing // gzhan du me yang rab tu 'bud// de dang gzhan tu de bzhin bud// de dag gis kyang spo ba bzhin// de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes dang / 
277b7(mdo): gzhan yang de las byung rnams/ chos la rab tu rgyu ba ni// rtogs dang zag pa myed pa dag/ mtho ba'i chos la gnas pa yin// yul dang yul can de yin te/ 'phags pa'i mthong ba chos can gi/ 
277b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'di dag yin// 'phags pa de dag ngo ldan zhing / sbos dpa ma thong ba ldan pas na/ chos kung de bzhin nyid nyid shes pa/ zhidi nas zhing du zhab tu 'dong // nges shin tubatha ba
278a1(mdo): 9/ gser gi dbyings na gyi sdang ste/ bsal bas shin tu zhib btags nas// yongs su spyad na snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi nam zhes pa// rnam par shes pa bdum dang bcas pa gting nge 'dzin
278a2(mdo): kyis yongs sbyangs pa'i// rnal 'byol can gis brtag tu mthong // ji ltar ma bsrubs zhol yang // de na mar yod myi snang ste// bsrung ba'i tshul kis mthong bas na// mkhas pa rnams kyis de phyir bsrub // 
278a3(mdo): de bzhin kun gzhi na par shes// rnam shes bdun dang ldan pa yang // rna par bsrubs shing stug pyod pa'i// thub pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin// ma rig pa ni stug ces bya// dkyil 'khor ye shes rnam phrag te// 
278a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor 'di la srab pa yi// rnal 'byor can rnams stug por 'dong // gzugs byed gzugs yod nam mkha' dang / rnam shes 'du shes ma yong dag/ rnal 'byor can gis yul
278a5(mdo): bsgoms na// de dag stug pol zhing d+ya 'dod // nyi ma zla'i 'od bzhin tu/ 'jigs pa myed pa rgyal ba'i sras/ rnal 'byor can gyi thub ston cing // rnal 'byor pyod pa'i
278a6(mdo): lam gnas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bas// de ni dbang bskur stug por so po// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor da rjesu mthong // gzhan du gyu rad nas stug por song // stug na gnas
278a7(mdo): yul pa dang // sprul pa'i skul ba de dag gis// kang dang kang chos su 'dod la// de ni mkhas la 'dug cing stond// sngon myed dus kyi gnas ngan len// bag chags rgyu yis bsags pa'i
278a8(mdo): ku gzhi ni rtog byas pa yis// bcings pa kun tu rab tu 'byung // ji ltar rgya mtsho'i blarlabs rnams// rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa dag/ rgyad myi 'chad par rab tu 'byung / na pa zhes de bzhin kun ka'i
278b1(mdo): rnam shes de ni des byas pa'i// bag chag rnams kyis rgyas par 'gyur/ 'byung zhing la la phyir ldog ste// tshad myed rtag pa myed pa'o// rang seMs khong du ma chud pas// yul la gzhol ba'i rnam shes rnams
278b2(mdo): rab tu zhugs kyang phyir ldog pa/ 'gro ba rang sems mthong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gzhan du gyu rang pa'i sems// me dang bsregs pa ci bzhin te// kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba yang // gzhan du gyur da nas
278b3(mdo): zag pa myed// zag byed 'gro su song ba dang // 'phags pa'i rig su skye bar 'gyur// kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba ni// sa nas khyad par byas shing gnas// yid ni bdag la bdag ces ste// rang sems
278b4(mdo): rab tu 'artag pa yin// rnam shes kha doko khyad par dang // kun tu gcod pa rab tu byed// sems ni las rnams rdzogs pa ste/ yid ni khong du chud par byed// rnam par shes pa sa rnam par
278b5(mdo): rig/ lnga pos snang ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rab rib ldanapa myos pa yis// ji ltar sa tshogs mtho ba pa bzhin/ gzugs las tshogs gzugs myed de/ sems ni
278b6(mdo): gzugs ltar gnas pa yin// nyi ma zla' ba nor bu dag/ yongasu dag pa'i mtshan nyid can// nyi zla'i zer kis bgo pa dang // de dag rang gi yon tan byin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa// 
278b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// bag byed legs dang ldan 'gyur te/ gzhan du gyur dang rab tu byin// 'di ltar snang ba gang yang rung // mtshan ma gzugs su sdang ba rnams ba ka rmaka
278b8(mdo): yod pa kun ga ni nye sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas ji ltam los kya dad pa dang / yon tan 'ding dang par ldang/ de bzhi kun gzhin shes kyang / rnam par byar / 
279a1(mdo): 6/ nas gzugs lar gnas// ji ltar rab rib ldan pas ska// myig gi nyes pas nam mthong ba// de bzhin lag chags nyes ldan pa'i// kun gzhi lus can rnams kyi ste/ rta tshig gi dang song bam/ 
279a2(mdo): gzugs kyis snang ba rab tu 'dug/ 'di dag snang ba ci yang rung // skyeg rgya chu'i dpe bzhin te/ gzugs ni yod dang byed kyis sangs// kun gzhi rjes su mthong ba'o// byig dang gzugs las te
279a3(mdo): byas shing // de ni sgyu ma de bzhin du 'byung // rtag tu phyig gi nang song la// smyig rgyu bzhin du rab tu g.yo// gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs// kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas pa ste// byis pa
279a4(mdo): ji ltar brtag pa bzhin// gzugs ni 'dra yod par byin/ dbyed myed sems pa'ang myed pa ste// lta ba'i phung po bzhin du kanas// gnyid lo ka ra ro dregs pa dang / 'gro 'dug
279a5(mdo): rnam par rgyug pa yi// bya ba cir yang byed pa ni// lus can rnams kyi kun gzhi'o// ji ltar gdung bas bsar ba las// gyed du ldang ba'i sprin rgyu rnams// dpyid ka/ 
279a6(mdo): chu bzhin rab tu g.yo// ri dgas rnams la slu bar byed// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // gzugs myin lta ba'i spyod yul dang // gzugs sdang ji ltar rtog cad kyis// brtags/ 
279a7(mdo): bzhin gzugs 'dra ma yin no// ji ltar khab long mthong ba dang // lcags ni myur bar kun tu 'khor// 'on kyang de la sems dpa' byed// sems ldan bzhin du'ang rab tu sdang // de bzhin kur gzhi rnam
279a8(mdo): shes kyang // sems byed sems can ji bzhin du/ 'tsho dang 'ong bar g.yo ba ste/ sa rnams 'bri bar rab tu byed/ ji ltar rgya mtsho li tran ni// srog myed par yang g.yo 'gas // 
279b1(mdo): de bzhin kun kazhi rnam shes pa// lus la gnas shing g.yo bar 'gyur// glang po glang po'i gzugs brnyad dang // ji ltar 'thab cing choms nas phyin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa// 'jug pa
279b2(mdo): choms nas myi rgyu'o// ji ltar pad po dri myed pa/ 'dam ki nang nas byung ba ni// mying dang lha dang mtshan la 'os// lha yul gnas pa kun kyang 'dod// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// bag chags 'das
279b3(mdo): nas byung ba ni/ na ba dang / gzhan du gnas kyu rang pa// bdag nyid chernams 'dod pa yin// ji ltar rin chen rnam par dag/ ri brags myi'i sa bcags 'dud kyang // rgyal po'i cod par du yang 'os
279b4(mdo): gcod pan la ni kadags pa yin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// bka chags rnams kyis bcags 'dud pa// rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te/ 
279b5(mdo): sangs rgyas nyid du de gzung ngo // ji ltar chu ka ting rdo ba dag nya lcibs dag gis yongs bkris pa// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // bka chags dri ma can du
279b6(mdo): byasagazung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang // dngos po gnyis kyis ra 'jug/ ji ltar kha gnyis po'i sprul// kang du 'dod pa der 'gro ste// de bzhin
279b7(mdo): kun gzhi rnam par shes// rims dang cig car rgyu ba yin// rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu// de la rtog pas rnam par brtag/ rtog can rnam par myos 'gyur ba// 
279b8(mdo): bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog cing // yod dang byed pa'i rgyu sdod pa'i/ sa rnams la yang rnam rtog ste// 'gyur ba'i yongs su gyu rad pa dang // kun gzhi zab pa nyid
280a1(mdo): dag kyang // zla chub rnams kyis kyi rin pas// sgyu ma'i ri dag sa bzhin du 'khor// rang bzhin gcig byin shes par dka'// lus can kun la 'dra ba ste/ de bzhin kun gzhi nas shes/ 
280a2(mdo): kyang // rtag tu rgyu ma yi ri dgas 'dra// sems can gcig myin shes par dka'// yod dang myed par rnam par brtag/ rdul dang gtso bo skyes bu dang // myi gsal tshangs pa 'ang de bzhin te// rtog pas// 
280a3(mdo): 'khrul pa yi rtog can rnams/ kun gzhi la ni rtag tu rtag/ sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la// sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog/ sa la gang gis rtogs gyur pa'i// yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya// 
280a4(mdo): ji ltar ri mo mthon dman dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gi gzugs 'dza' dang ri dgas sred byed dang / sprin sgra 'brug kyang / ji bzhin te// rab rib can gi phreng ba dang // bzang mo'i
280a5(mdo): gdong dang de bzhin tu/ myi lam dag na rnam sna tshogs/ dri za'i khang pa gnas rten dang // ro langs chu'i shing rnams dang // brag cha sprin dang bya ba dang / me long myig la
280a6(mdo): gzugs brnyan dang // chul chu'i za' ba dang / nam rtog 'di dang mang por yang // 'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog/ gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar// rnam pa sna tshogs kun mthong
280a7(mdo): 'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang / de tshe sems ni phyir lngag go// chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi/ bag chags snyems tsams thogs pa dang // rtog pas rnyog pa can tu bya
280a8(mdo): gzhan du gyur da nas zag pa byed// zag byed dang lugs rab thob nas// de dag rtag cing brtag par 'gyur// nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam// 'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te// mnya
280b1(mdo): gzhag sems dang ldan pa lo// myi zad chos rnams skye bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar da dang // ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang // mkhas dang stobs dang mngon shes dag/ 'bri
280b2(mdo): byed myi zad de bzhin te// nam mkha' zad kyi mthar snyegs shing/ dbyings klo rnam shes brtag pa dang // mthar phyin bcu'i gnas ldan zhing // yid bzhin shin tu brtan pa yul// rnal 'byor
280b3(mdo): mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can// gzhan tu gyu rad nas rab tu 'thob// 'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin// sems can yod myin skye ba myed// 'bri myed gang ba myed par yang // rgyal ba rnams kyis
280b4(mdo): 'gro ba bshad// zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi// chos// nyid gcig tu zad pa ste// skyes par gyu rad tam ma skyesakyang // chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin gnas/ rnal 'byor// 
280b5(mdo): ldan pa grol ba la// rtag myed chad pa myed pa ste/ sems can khams rnams zhig gyur da na// thams cad mkhyen pa myi snang ngo // ma byon pa'i rgyal ba'i dang // 'das dang nga
280b6(mdo): ltar byung ba dag/ mnyam pa ma yin 'thun pa myin// shes bya zad// dag 'byung // bdud n+d+harar+ya bcad log pa ste// brjod dang bcas dang brjod myed kyang // de ste sems can 'jig na ni/ 
280b7(mdo): sdug bsngal sangs pas myi grol lo// lcags kyi kar bu bsreg pa las// me las byung ste bsil gyur cing // sngags ni rtag par 'dug pa bzhin// de ltar rnal 'byor da cad dag
280b8(mdo): 'khod// phung po'i khyim dang des byang ba'i// bag chag rnams kyang 'gag pa dang / thub pa rnal 'byo rang brtsod pa nams// de dag rtag cing krol ba yin// na pa shes rnams ni dpa' brlam
281a1(mdo): bzhin gakun gzhi mtsholas byung bste// chos lnga'i rang bzhin nas zhes kyis/ rab tu bskyod cing zhin tu rmya// gnas ngang med ni thos pa yis// bcom pa gnas byed dong gi gzus
281a2(mdo): ba'i yul tu rnam par g.yo// de ltar zhes nas phyir log ste// gzhan 'gyur gyi zang rtag pa rnams/ 'go po dag ni stug por 'dod // stug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin/ rtag tu gnas ba rnyad
281a3(mdo): rnam par mdzes / phung po sdug pa kun kazhi ste/ yid ni de la nye ban no// rnam par shes pa rtog par byed// gzugs dpalas las sogs pa'i rgyu// na shes tshogs rnams ni// dbang por bcas shing lus
281a4(mdo): gzhol bas// sna tshogs lus la 'dzin par byed// kun gzhi yul can ma yin no// tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te// yid ni dadrod du rab tu gnas// yid kyi rnam shes de na ste// lhag ma dbang
281a5(mdo): po ltar yang gnas/ sems dang yin rnam par shes// phung po'o// dbus na rnam par gnas/ bag chags las dang 'brel pa rnams// sngan chad byas pa rnams kyis 'byung / 'dod chags/ 
281a6(mdo): sred pas byung ba yi// las kyis bya ba byed pa ste// snga chad de dag las byas pas// rgyun tu las rnams 'byung ba yin// lus las lus ni gzhan las 'gro// 'pho ba srin bu pad mo/ 
281a7(mdo): bzhin// sems dang sems byung bcas pa rnams// rgyun chags par ni shi nad tu 'dod// yang zhi pa phung po'i tshogs rnams dang // rnam shes sri par dog par yang / tshogs shing rab
281a8(mdo): tu 'byung ba yin/ las rnams shin tu 'byung ba'i phyir// che oM dang rnam shes 'dis// gang tshe lus ni dor ba ste// shing bzhin tshor ba myed pa'o// sems ni kun ka'i rnam par shes
281b1(mdo): ngang sems bdag nyid yod myin no// gang zhig yul la 'dzin byed pa// de ni rnam par shes zhes bya// sems ni las rnams rtogs pa ste// yid ni khong du chud par byed// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ 
281b2(mdo): lnga pos snang ba rtogs par byed// / 'phags pa rgya nad stug po li/ bam po
281b3(mdo): lus ni sems kyis gzung ba yin// yid ni lam rgyun 'dod pa ste// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ snang ba gcod pa lnga pa'o// rgyu las dmyigs shing rnam shes
281b4(mdo): rnams// skye ste gzhan ni de rjes 'brang // yid la dmyigs deshing gzhan dog kyang // mthar chags su rib tu 'byung / yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni/ dbang po yon tan rnams
281b5(mdo): kyis byas// dbang ni lnga dang ldan gcig tu// rnam parashes pa rab tu byed// 'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu// yos 'gro dang 'dra ba ste// skyog rgya dag gi gzugs dang mnyam
281b6(mdo): mag pa ma yin bden pa myid// 'di ni bdas byed spong pa ste med pas kun tu drapa pa yin// 'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/ thams cad dus yod spyod cig te/ khams 'byung mid ches
281b7(mdo): bdas na ci/ rnam pa shes pa 'byung / ras shes lnga pa de dag dang // srid kyin pashes ldan pa'i// gnas dan len dang maud 'arnams pa/ rgyun gyi ched pa rab tu 'byung// sa can du
281b8(mdo): kyiban ga sang/ sems dang sams phyis ldan pa 'byung/ kun meg rnyed ma de dag rgyas/ rgyams byed sems dmas rgyad ma cwa/ tshan pa ga da / 
282a1(mdo): rgyas 'gyur// sa 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung// kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni// rnam zhes rnams kyi gnas yin no// phan tshun rgyu'i stobs ldan pa/ 
282a2(mdo): nam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste// kun gzhi mchol dpa' rlabs bzhin// sa bon dag dang mya ku'i rgyud// chu bo'i rgyud dang mtshams myed cing // rgyu dang kyi 'chad par 'byung skyod kyi/ tha dang bye brag rag
282a3(mdo): kyang sdang // de bzhin rnam shes spyod pa ste// mtshams myed pa'i rgyun tu yang // rgyun myi 'chad par rab tu 'byung // gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang // sems dang yid dang nam shes rnams
282a4(mdo): bag chags sred pas bskyed pa dang // rang sems rnam par lam/ dpa'i sa// dpa' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung // chos rnams kun kyis 'byung ba dag/ phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te// thub pa'i
282a5(mdo): gnas kyang rnam bsgoms nas// mnyam par gzhag pa stug par 'gro// rdo rje snying po khyod dang yang // rgyal sras 'jigs// myed gzhan dag kyang // stug por 'jug par byed pa'i chos// 
282a6(mdo): thams cad chos kyang rab stond pa// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams// thabs cig rab tu rnam dgongs ste// chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe' byed pa// rmad du 'byung ba 'di bstan to// rdo rje
282a7(mdo): snying po 'jigs byed pa/ ring chen sna tshogs zla snying gi/ ming ge'i khri la rab 'dug ste/ shes rab chen pos rnam snyoms kyis// rgyal ba sems kyis mdun 'dang pa// stug po'i rgyan
282a8(mdo): la rnam par sgoms// rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'dri// rnal 'byor da can gi rnal 'byor nga stonang // zla dbang rgyal ba des bsta nang pa// bag myed par ni ma byed cig/ zla ba'i dpal gi bcom ldan 'das
282b1(mdo): smrab par bye ba yang sgrub cing / 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsdebs mas dang / gzugs cad rnams kyi gnas su yang // rgyal zas rnams kyis kun nas 'amadod// lha rnams kyis kyang mdun padang cing // tshul ki sa
282b2(mdo): pa ston pa ni// 'jigs phyed stug po'i rkyen yin no// rnal 'byor nga can gi spyod pa'i mchog/ tshul bzang rnal 'byor nga pyod pa ste// so so rang rig gis pa yi// ting nge 'dzind dang 'de ba'i rnams// yang dag
282b3(mdo): mthal la myi rig par// rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor bde las mngon langs shing // gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lta// rnal 'byor da dpyod pa yi tshul dge 'di// gang gis shin tu mthong bar
282b4(mdo): gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yis// stan gi mchog la 'kho du pa rnams// kun kyang ngo mtshar rab tu rnyed// bsam byed/ bsam gtan bsam pa dang // bsam gtan rnams kyi dgos pa
282b5(mdo): dag/ 'argyal sras 'jigs pa myed pa rnams// kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas// stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la lta ba mnyam par gzhag pa rnams// mgo la cod par thog/ 
282b6(mdo): pa dag/ mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// yan lag bris pa de dag kun// bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste// g.yo ba rnams dang shind tu bral/ thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes
282b7(mdo): rnal 'byor da pyod pa stobs chen te// lha'o rdo rje snying po la// rnam par rtogapa dpyod dang // chos pa mos pa yang dag tu/ mthong ste de nas de kun dang // phyogs rnams bzhi por blta
282b8(mdo): byas te// 'jam pa sngon du rab btang nas/ 'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su smras// rgyal sras mnyam par gzhag pa rnams// rnal 'byord can ka rnal 'byor da yul// ga
283a1(mdo): rtog ces myos 'gyur ba// de dag bdag la mnyam par gyis// gang bsam gtan gis ji lta bung// bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis bded/ nas/ 
283a2(mdo): par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas/ dga' ba de dben pas skyes par yang // bsam gtan dang po skye ba yin// de lta bu'i rims tshul tu// bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu// myur 'dug/ 
283a3(mdo): bdag tu sbrul dang / bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed// nyan thos theg pa cad rnams dang // rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te// kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan byed// chos rnams dang
283a4(mdo): ni sa dag gi// rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / phung po skyemached tshogs rnamasa'adi dag thams cad bdag myed/ dbyed pa myed cing g.yo ba myed// gsum po 'dus pas rab
283a5(mdo): tu byu ba// 'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste// byed pa rnams kyi sa rnam par sasangs/ thub pa phyi rol bsam gtad byed sdod pa lta ba'i lta ba can/ chos kyi mtshan la myos pa nas
283a6(mdo): chud gson mtshan nyid ma yin no// phung po bdag myed mkhas pa rnams// bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/ lha rdzas bsod nams lta
283a7(mdo): spyod pa// rnal 'byord can dang rgyal ba'i sras// mnyam gzhag ta rnas ma ga tad byed// 'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste/ mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa phyin// phung po rnams myed mkhas sor byin/ 
283a8(mdo): thams cad chos la mtshan nyid myed// rdul phrad rnam par gzhigs pa dang // de dag de yar phyi gnas so// rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni/ dngos po sa dang chu las thog/ dngos po'i rang
283b1(mdo): bzhin byin shes pas// mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog/ kha dog sdug dang myi sdug pa// kha dog sdong ba gzhan de bzhin// 'jam dang in 'dra ko ba ltar// kha dog snga mang sprin lta bu'i// sangs rgyas/ 
283b2(mdo): sku dang 'dra ba yis// thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste// rgyal ba'i skye su ched ces bya bas// 'byung ba rnams dang nam gzhigs ste// rnal 'byor de shes pa gzugs can gis// lus la rtag tu
283b3(mdo): gzugs myed kyang / gapal dmyigs te mnyam gzhag pa// de la dbyigs shing rnam par ldan/ gang dang gang lan pa rtog pa// de dang de ni dmyigs pa yin// rnal 'byor ca
283b4(mdo): myed rnal 'byor de myed// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni// rnal 'byor da can gi rnal 'byor de nyid// kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad dang // thub pa'i rnal 'byor nga bde la gnas// chos
283b5(mdo): dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas ni / mnyam par gzhag pa'i khyad par dag/ mnyam gzhag/ ldan pa rab tu stodang / chos kyi rang bzhin rnam bye bas
283b6(mdo): rnal 'byor can gi blo 'khrug pa// blo gros zhad pas rab tu ste/ chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur// yid ches lung dang ldan par// chos rnams stond par byed pa ni// mtshan
283b7(mdo): nyid rnam par rtog pa yin// bdag kyang chud gsod gzhan chung gson// mtshan nyid can myed mtshan nyid byed// 'dres pa yi phyir na rnam por sda // dngar 'a rnams mi 'khrim pa sel// bdag
283b8(mdo): tsha sbyar yan cha ste// ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang // lan tsha las tshogs rnam par sel// 'khrim pa pad kan 'khrugs pa las/ rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang // lus can nas kyi lus sul bya// 
284a1(mdo): 'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang // rims dag rnam par gzhag pa yi phyir// thub pas bsdu pa byas pa ni// kha ra las tshogs yan lag drug// sha dang skol ma khu pa dag/ tha dad mtshan
284a2(mdo): kyis 'jug 'gyur pa// lus can rnams kyi rims kun to// rnam shes rnams ni kun gzhi la// phan tshun tha dad myi gnas ste// gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam// mtshan nyid gcig ni yod gyur na// 
284a3(mdo): de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la// mtshan nyid myi 'ang myed par 'gyur// rdzas rnams 'dus pas sel myi nus// phyi yang sos par myi 'gyur ro// sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste// 
284a4(mdo): gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste/ sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin 'khor ba// rnal 'byor da pa ston pas brtags pa yin no// mtshan myed mtshan can myed pa ste// 
284a5(mdo): gzhan du kun kazha par rnam shes pa/ phung po rnams las phung po can// gzhan myed yang lag nyid lag las// yan la/ can myed yan lag la// 'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te// 'bras bu
284a6(mdo): nas la rgyu yang byed// 'jig rten du rdul phran bsal ba phyin// phyogs dang gnas su myi 'gro'o// de dag sor gnyis sor gsum bya// ci yang thom par myi byed de// dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i phyir// rdul phrar thas
284a7(mdo): cad 'dru bar 'dong // de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa// yon tan kun gyi yon tan du// 'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gis// 'jig rten rkye nang las ma byung ste// 'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin myid// chos gsu bas kyang ma byas pa/ 
284a8(mdo): bag chags rnaMs kyis bkrus pa'i sems// rna bar rtog pa mang pos gnas// snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yin/ lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// 'gro ba dag gis
284b1(mdo): sna tshogs brtags// / 'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te// sgyu ma yi rang bzhin du gnas// sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las// gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ga/ sa la stong zhes brjod
284b2(mdo): par bya// ga sems dang dngos po yi tshul tu gnas// rdza las thogs pa yi yul myed de// sems 'di rdza ma lta bu'o// sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams kyang / 
284b3(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba// de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin kya ni kun tu lag pa ste// kun tu kha myig mgo bo yang // cig car rim pa rigs kyis kyang // sa rnams log par rab tu gnas// byis pa
284b4(mdo): rnam par byos byed de/ gang gi snying las gang gnas pa de ni de la gnyis tshul tu// lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas/ stong myin dngos po gang yang myed// thobs ji ltar rdza bzhin
284b5(mdo): d+hu// dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i// dngos po sku yod pa myin// de ste dngos po'i dngos yod na// 'jig myed ma yin gzhig par 'gyur// gzhig bya ga zhig par byed pa gang
284b6(mdo): de ni rnam par rtog par rtog pas brtags/ r-i rab ni po tsam 'gyur ba'i// bdag tu lta ba myi gnod kyi// stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni/ nga rgyal myi bden brtags pa'o// rnal 'byor da pyod pas
284b7(mdo): stong pa nyid// gnas ma yin par sbyar myi bya// gnas myi gal te sbyar gyu ra na// bdud rtsi drug du 'gyur ba yin// lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung // lus can rnams la yod pa'i
284b8(mdo): lta ba rnam par spasangs pa'i phyir// stong pa nyid tshul bstand to// stong po nyid ki lta thos kyang // la la'i lta ba ma zhig na// gsor myi rung ba'i lha can te/ spa nad pas btang ba'i nang
285a1(mdo): ba bzhin// ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa yi me// bsreg pa myed pas myi gnas so// de bzhin sreg bya lta tshig na// stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur// lta ba 'gog pa dus su ya/ 
285a2(mdo): ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste// nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed// nyon mongs bsregs na rnam par mdzes// thub pa rnal 'byord ldan pa rnams// ye shes 'di ldan thub pyor dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
285a3(mdo): gnas kyi mchog// stug po der ni rab tu 'dong // ri bong rwa yis ri bo rnams// mngon par gzhig bya ma mthong ste// 'di la mo sham bu yis kyang // srog chags gang yang bsad pa myed// ri bong mA yi
285a4(mdo): gzhu yis kyang / u yang 'thob mo myi byed de// mo sham bu la su yang rung // khyim ki las su skye'o// stong pa nyid dang myi rtag nyid// rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur da te// yod dang mye/ 
285a5(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin yang // de bzhin gcig pa nyid du 'gyur // 'angal na gnas dus tshun cad kyang // gzugs rnams gzhi ka par brtson pa ste// gang na'ang de myed gzugs yod byin
285a6(mdo): gzugs myed par yang de myed de// khyad par byed 'gyur ba ni// ma bsgribs zla dang 'od gzer bzhin// de bzhin dngos rnams stong dang // lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste// phra tshun rnam
285a7(mdo): pa tha da da du// de dag dgongs pa myi slab bo// rgyu rkyend rnams tshogs pa las// rnal 'byor da can gyis las bsgrub bo// lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te// ro langs 'khrul 'khor rab tu/ 
285a8(mdo): 'dra// sred pa'i srad bus bcings byas shing // yul gi rnams kyis drang ba yin// lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa// lta ba thams cad spyod pa ste// mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba// rgyal ba nas/ 
285b1(mdo): kyis lha myed bshad// stong nyid lta ba spyod pa ni// yod dang myed pa bshig pa'i phyir// blo ldan mnyam par gzhag pa yi// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rtsa dang shing dang gyo mo dag// sgyu ma// 
285b2(mdo): mkhan pos rgyu nad byas te// sngags kyis ci dang cing 'dod par// gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed// gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // sred dang phyika rnams rgyur byas shing // byig ki rnam shes sku
285b3(mdo): ma bzhin// myig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o// gang gi yul du 'ong ba byed// yul gzhan dag du'ang 'gro ba byin// 'di la lha'i rnam shes 'byung ba la// yod dang byed par brtag kyi bya/ sna tshogs dnga'ong
285b4(mdo): bu'i ma// mo sham bu dang smyig rgya dang // ri za'i grong khyer rmyil ma dag/ mying du grag gi yod pa myed/ stag dang gzig dang don raka dang // pro ta bong bu khyi rnams dang // dbyi dang mtshal
285b5(mdo): dang ru sbal la// ro ni yod pa ma yin na// thub pa rtsod pa brtson pa yis// de dag ci phyir myi rtog cing // bong du ma la brtag par bya// ji ko de dag sgrub nus snyam// shes
285b6(mdo): rab can gyis sar bstan pa// de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya// rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni// blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra// sgrol pa'i ye shes de la byed // so so rang rig yul yang myed// gzhan
285b7(mdo): gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la// rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus// stug bor gnas par rnam par rtog/ de la brtags shing dge ba 'thob// rnal 'byor nga mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor can// de na
285b8(mdo): gnas pa bzhin du snang // lha yul gnas pa'i snyems bral dang // zla ba gza' las rdzogs pa yang // rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa rnams// ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin// de bzhin rnam par shes pa
286a1(mdo): bdun// bag chags rnams dang ldan pa'i// kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can// de la brten cing rab tu rgyu// ji ltar sa las kun brtend cing // sa skyes kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin// 
286a2(mdo): sems can kun gyi gnas yin te// 'byung kur kun gyi khyad par du// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te// sems dang sems las 'byung bar ldan// dpa'
286a3(mdo): rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // ji ltar ma bya'i ma ba skarnams// 'od dang kha dog rnam yang ste// gtsug pud can rnams yang ba sgra yis// sa bya mo dang longs rtse ba// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang
286a4(mdo): sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas// thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin rtse// rnas 'byor da can gyis rtag tu mthong // ji ltar rgya mtsho dpo yis// nyid gcig bzhin du dkar bya yang // chu bo rnams
286a5(mdo): ni rgyund kyi 'chang // rgya mtsho rtag gar yod kyi byed// de ba na/ na kun kazhi rnam shes kyang // zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste rnam shes rnams kyis nyin cig bzhin// bag chags chu bos
286a6(mdo): rab tu gang // ji ltar rin chen ldan pa yis// sna tshogs kun tu lan 'dogs te// sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho// yon tan dngos su stond pa yin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // 
286a7(mdo): rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung // de ni 'khor 'phel byed de// byu ngan de bzhin gshegs pa yid// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can// spyod pa legs spad gcang ba de// sa bcu pa
286a8(mdo): mdzan 'byung ste// bde par ga shegs pa'i sar bzhugs nas// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa// sna tshogs sems cad nam sprul 'am// 'jig pa byed par 'byung ba ni// rnam par rtog/ 
286b1(mdo): myed sa bzhin no// sos ka me tog mang po'i gzugs// myi dang bya'i yid du 'ong // de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems// thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed// ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i
286b2(mdo): sras// 'byung ba las 'byung ba ma yin pa// byed pa'i blo can de bzhin te// log par smra ba brtson pa dag/ chos dang myi mthun phra ma can// lde gnyis log par lta ba dka// rnam pa gzhan
286b3(mdo): tu gnas pa'i dngos// rnam pa gzhan du stond par byed// ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig// 'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa// 'bras bu me tog de na myed// sngags dang 'ong bzos zo mdog bde// / 
286b4(mdo): 'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa// rnam pa gzhan du stond pa der byed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras// kun kyang zab ras kyi dmyigs la mazhes// bstan pa gzhan la ji snyed du// 
286b5(mdo): bstan pa byas pa de dag kun// bde gshegs rnal 'byor dam zhes pa yis// bstand pa stug po'i rkyen la bstand// mkhas rnams drug dang bco brgyad dang // skye mched bcu dang
286b6(mdo): gnyis kyi phyin// yid kyi srad shus btags pa dag/ sems can kun tu rab tu 'khor// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs// khams dang skye mched phung po ste// yid kyi srad bus bcings byas
286b7(mdo): shing // lus dang lus la rab tu rgya// 'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi don tu bstanang // lus can kun gyi skyes bu ni// 'gro ba yang byang ba ma yin te// mkhas rnams drug
286b8(mdo): skyes bu yin// skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te// bco brgyad rnams la yid chu ba// dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste// dbang sgyur po brang sna tshogs pa// nor bu rin chen klong rdal dang // dka'
287a1(mdo): ldan las tshogs bsnyems bral dang // 'che ma'i gnas su 'ang de bzhin bshad// rdo rje snying po dbang can la// rgyal sras 'jigs pa myed pa rnams// dge'o dke'o zhes 'bod cing // thams cad
287a2(mdo): mgo bos 'phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa rnal 'byor de spyod pa dang // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang // rnal 'byor bdag
287a3(mdo): po rnal 'byor can// ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang // dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang // zil mo sbyar te gnas par gyurang // phan tshun kacig la gcig lta zhing // rgyal ba'i sras la/ 
287a4(mdo): smra ba ni// 'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang // mur 'dug pa dag sma spangs pa ste// thub can kun kyi skyes bu ni// thub dpa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstanang // 'das dang da ltar byung ba
287a5(mdo): yis// sngon byas ma byas thos pa ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i// sras rnams kyis// khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o// lur mkha' sa bya rjes rnams// rnam par bzhag pa
287a6(mdo): bzhinadu// sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams// gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bas dang // rdzis man thams me dag ni// me ste gnas du gnas par 'gyur// bsreg pa gzhan ni ma rnyed/ 
287a7(mdo): cing // rlung gis bab nag tan gyi 'brang // bya rjes rnam par gzhag pa ri// mkha' sa gnas pagyi snang ste// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yi// 'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin// bya rnams
287a8(mdo): dang bas kyi 'dong ste// de dag sgo'i shugs kyis 'dod // bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni// skyes bu'i sgo des rab tu bstan// lam gi skyes bu bstan pa ni// 'khor na rtag tu 'khor ba ste// bde dang
287b1(mdo): sdug bsngal myong byed pa// byas pa'i las ni chud kyi za// ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las// 'bras bu byed partse 'gyur te// don dang ldan pa de dag ni// gzhan yang 'ong zhes mo bskyed// lha rdzas 'gro
287b2(mdo): ba'i skyes bu ni// rnal 'byor de can la rnal 'byor de ston// lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing // de ni dge ba'i las byed do// 'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang // lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing // 'khor la
287b3(mdo): sangs rgyas 'gyur 'gyur ba'i// bsod nams lus can rtag tu byed// thar dang pha rol phyi nang rnams dang // sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun// 'gro ba'i skyes bu myed na ni// kun kyang 'bras bu
287b4(mdo): myed par 'gyur// lha'i bde ba thams cad dang // dbang sgyur na/ rnams kyi 'bras bu dang // de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyang myed par 'gyur// las dang las kyi 'bras bu
287b5(mdo): mthong // las rnams don myed ma yin te// lo dod 'bod las sotshogs pa dang // mnar myed mtha' dang lha rnams kyi// lam/ gi rgyud kyang yod pa yin// 'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na// srid
287b6(mdo): pa'i 'kho lo 'khor bar 'gyur// 'khor dang bral mtha rang ba ste// blo zhan rnams kyis kyi zhes so// 'jug pa'i skyes bu myed na ni// mo sham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// bong bu'i ma yang rdo 'gyur te/ 
287b7(mdo): bye ma las tis mar 'byung // phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// kang dang kang du 'dra ba dka/ de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin// lba dang lha'i bu mo'i tshigs// dbang sgyur rgyal
287b8(mdo): ba'i srasaso rnams dang // dri la grul bum rgyal po dang // sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang // mug la mchod par 'os pa'i// rdo rje snying po mas bcas la// mchod de gsol ba 'debs pa byed/ 
288a1(mdo): gathams cad dge lanas smra/ nyams babyed pa tshas kyi rgya dang dpel 'as brgyan pa'o// gzhan gyi rgol ba 'joms pa ste// dpal po chen po khyod kyis bstan// bka' thungs ldan
288a2(mdo): gtsang ba// bcag rtson pa kyi yon tan ston // shes raman gyis bstan chugapas// 'gro ba 'di dag nyan par 'gyur// ji snyed rgyal ba'i mas rnams dang / lha'i rgyas po kun kyang nyon/ 
288a3(mdo): shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu// btag 'das tog dang bral ba yis// phyung ba dpe'i me tog ste// rnal 'byor nga rnams kyi thub dgel ba// stug po rgyan ni bshad par bya// de ni thub la rnal 'byor
288a4(mdo): ston da// stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te// stug na spyod pa'i grong du sa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ rngub pakun gyi dam pa'o// 6/ sa stengs thub pa'i ma la// rdo rje spang
288a5(mdo): pos yang smras pa// rtag par du ma khyod kyis kyang // chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis// dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi/ dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes// 'di 'dra'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i
288a6(mdo): grub pa rnal 'byor kyi 'khrul lo/ chos pa gcig tu rtogs pa yis// chos pa mngon du shes pa'i ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang // dngos pa gcig gis shes par 'gyur// ji ltar ji tsani/ 
288a7(mdo): bsgrubs pa'i 'o// son mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa// de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi// rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur// dngos po ji myeng stong pa nyid// dngos po dngos por yod pa 'ang byed
288a8(mdo): 'od dag kun ka 'i rnam pa ste// stong nyid kun gzhi 'i rnam pa'o// rgyal sras rgya ma 'jigs myed pas// rdo rjes snying po de sa smras// lus can rnams kyi khams kyi myi// ji lta bur na sos tsam 'gyur
288b1(mdo): 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing // 'byung las 'byung ba ji lta bu// g.yo gsher tsha dang sra ba'i// khams rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis// du ma'i bdag po'i chog rmo
288b2(mdo): nas// myi 'am ci bdag khyod dge' ste/ khyod ni dge 'o yang dge'o// rnal 'byor can gyi snying po'i mchog/ yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa// sems kyi skyes bu'i lus can la// khams rnams skye
288b3(mdo): 'gyur ji lta zhes// de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la// de ni dge bar bshad par bya// de bas myi 'am ci ba dag/ pi bang slob dpon bdag las nyon// ji ltar myi 'am ci'i bdag/ khyod dang myi ci mang
288b4(mdo): bcas pa// snyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis// nam malas ni rab 'dong zhing // rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor// pi bing sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas// thub pa du ma ltos shig ces
288b5(mdo): na tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung // bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs na// myi 'am ci dang 'grogs brtse zhing / pi bang bye cu rgyas smras pa// len cing mkha' las 'gro'i che
288b6(mdo): yidi 'ang shin tu ldan// dbyangs rgyam yongs su sbyangs pa ste/ kyi ma ci'i bdag po yis/ rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe// nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de// nyan mos de dag gyu ra ba
288b7(mdo): byas zas rnams kyis mthong ba dang // 'od srung nas 'byor bathang can dang // lha'i cod pa nas smras pa// nas tog myed pa'i sgra byangs kyi// ba mang sgode bsgrags pa mas// 'dod chags sa
288b8(mdo): gyi gas// 'od srung khyod kyis reng la sund/ rgyal mas stobs che sangs chung bzhis// ri dgas rnams dang 'dra ba ni/ nyan mo sa zhis pa'i batshan rnams// 
289a1(mdo): 'das kyi dri ma can// nyon mongs rnam rtog byung bar mnang // yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas// bag chags dri ma yongs bsal te// bdag myed gnyis kyis yongs dag cing
289a2(mdo): shes bya'i sgrib pa li tshwa myer ni/ sems kyi khams las gzhan gyur dpo'o// de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur// khyod ni dbang can pa yul ldan// shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas/ 
289a3(mdo): dbang po 'jig rten phal ba li// gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te// kyi 'am ci'i gtsug lag kyang // de bzhin gshegs po'i nas 'byor dgel// sa'i mtshan nyid mkhas byam/ 
289a4(mdo): babra' ste zla ba bzhin gnas pa/ mye 'am ci'i dbang po / sa dang zhing rnams byed par mdzes// khyod ni de ltar rnamadzes shing // zub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su/ 
289a5(mdo): grags pa'i skyes // rgyanams gang gis 'byung ba'o// de tshul bdag gis bstan pa bya// can da rnams skyes par byeng // rnan me ngas// gdag la gsapa
289a6(mdo): rdu sa kyi kAnAnas co// gzugs snang sogs pa'i sa tshams nA~M// nam[рд╜]sa kun sa rtso ra byed// da zhis sa tshogs sus can ni// ga chag pa
289a7(mdo): kyis rab tu myor/ da da phyin dag na/ 'i rnarnams byed pan// sa kun / da ni
289b1(mdo): rin chen sna tshogs gnas/ dbang sgyur po zang bzang po na// rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis mdun mdar cing // so so'i stan las kun langs te/ yab dang sa pa'i
289b2(mdo): phyag 'chas nas// rim 'gro'i rdo rje snying po la// mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed// rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing // yang dang yang du gsol bar byed// dge 'o dge lo yang dge' ste/ 
289b3(mdo): dge' ba ldan la rab gnas shing // chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas// sangs rgyas sa la rab bzhugs te// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan da
289b4(mdo): rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis// de nas yang d+ha mchod byas te/ rnal 'byor che can dge'o dgel// rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs// myed pa// lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa'i// chos de bdag
289b5(mdo): la bstan pas na// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas/ kra shis thang mar rab tu byas// thub ldan 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs// glo gros chen po byams pa dang / 
289b6(mdo): glo gros myi bzang mthu chen dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang // lha'i nod pan rnal 'byor de bdag/ shugs 'dzin tu ma blo gros dang // gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang // 
289b7(mdo): chen gtsug bud 'phrul chen dang // yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang // 'tshe ba'i rab dang 'gro 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor can las sems ston pa// thub pa thams cad don grub
289b8(mdo): pa// thub sras 'jigs pa myed pa rnams// 'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste// rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams// so so'i stan las kun langs nas// de dag gcig la gcig bltas te// rdo rje snying po de la/ 
290a1(mdo): ba can pa kyis/ tha na tus dbang byi kyis gzhug/ rgyas ma gnas kyis bca yod// samamatshan pa sa'as payang// khyod la la ca pa cagadas/ byang sa mams
290a2(mdo): 'debs pa ni// rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang // rnal 'byor da can dang rnal 'byor dag/ sngags 'chang bud myed thams cad do// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang / 'jig rten rnams kyis ngo mtshar
290a3(mdo): gzhi'o// mdo sde kun gyis tris myed cing // bstan dang grag pa rnam spangs pa// stug po'i rgyan 'di bstand po'i phyir// rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis// sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste/ 
290a4(mdo): de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang // zag pa myed po'i chos kyi dbyings// so sor po reg myod pa'i yul// lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde'o// 'phags pa rnams la de ston
290a5(mdo): tsoka/ phung po lhag ma ma lus par// gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings stond cig/ ting nge 'dzind dang gzungs kyi rnaMs rnam par thar da dang dbang rnams dang // yid bzhin rnam pa
290a6(mdo): bcu po yis// lus kyi tshogs kyang bstand par gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsam yas dang // 'gon po rnams kyi zhing ga rgyan// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// rdul phran bzhin gyi sku ma
290a7(mdo): dang // rtswa rtse brgya char phra ba dag/ rgyal mas khyod kyis bshad par gyis// bstan dang klag dang nas bral zhing // brjod pas rnam par spangs po'o// stug po zhing gi dam pa der// ji nas thus
290a8(mdo): pa 'dod pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor skakhas pa seng ge ltam// thub pa de dag kun bltas te// 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// btag par myi nus btag bral ba'o// chos tshul rab tu bstan
290b1(mdo): bya bar/ blo'i mthu yang kun btags na// rnal 'byom can dag chos kyi tshul// sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas// tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste// ka la bying ka'i sgra skad du// rgyal chen
290b2(mdo): lce'i sa rab bstan par// rdo rje snying pos shin tu bshad// seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba// mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang // dpel byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// rdo rje snying pos shin
290b3(mdo): tu bsta nad// mya dka' sgra la mkhas pas na// sgra'i mtshan nyid grags pa yis// mdor na de'i nyes gyur da du// rgyal sras de ni shin tu stond// sangs pa dag pa dbyangs las tshogs// mthong zhing ring / 
290b4(mdo): ba'i sgra skad dang // man dA ra dang rab ldan par// rgyal ba'i sras bos rab tu bstand// rai sha pa dang de pa ta// shardza ke shaM lnga po'i// sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan po'i// dbyangs kyis thub
290b5(mdo): pa rnam par gsung // rings dang dal ba myed pa'i tshig/ zab tsang snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs te// mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la// de bzhin sem par byed pa'o// tshig gi yon tan ldan pa tshig/ 
290b6(mdo): de je snying pos brjod pa ni/ snyun gyis grub par byas pa ste// sprul pa bzhin du 'byung ba yin// thub zas rdo rje'i snying po ni// rtse yang brjod par gyi byed par// thams cad yan lag mtshan kyi swA/ 
290b7(mdo): yan lag rnams las mngon par 'byung // sbyin ma bral ba skye blo dang // phrag pa sna rtse byin pa sras// chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing // dgel ba'i sgra rnams byung bar gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyu
290b8(mdo): ba'i// smon lam legs las byung ba ste// bre mo'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus// dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po ni// thams cad gzugs kyi 'on chen bzhin
291a1(mdo): mdzes// ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang / zla ba'i 'od tu bye brag byed// de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang // rgyal ba rnams su khyad par byed/ yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i/ rgyal ba'i mas po snyatham ma
291a2(mdo): rnal 'byor da dpyod pa'i las gnas pa// stan las legs par ldang byas shing // rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas nas// tshika dge rnam par smras pa ni// kye ma theg chen theg pa ni// sangs rgyas pyod sum
291a3(mdo): bsam gyi khyab// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba dmam gyis kyi khyab stond// bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang // rgya da sras de dag thams cad dang / dri myed bsam gyis myi khyab chos/ 
291a4(mdo): dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin// theg pa chen po'i tshul dge/ 'ani// 'amachog tu 'phral zhing dkon pa ste// gzhan du gyur da pa tshul gyi mchog/ rtog pa can gi yul gyi mchog ma yin// rnam
291a5(mdo): bar shes pa brgyad kyi yul// rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed// bdag myed nyid ni lnga po yi// de bzhin khyad par byed pa na// bag chags spras pas 'bangs pa ste/ yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang // sems
291a6(mdo): dang sems las byung ldan zhing / rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung // lha rdzas tshul 'di 'thong ba dang // gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur// ni dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas rigs su de dag
291a7(mdo): 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs// mur 'dug nyan thos rnam spangs pa// thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog// stug por de bzhin 'dod par 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di'i yul ni gang // ting
291b1(mdo): 'dzid 'di'i phying yang ni/ rdo rje snying pos gang thob phyir// tshul dge' 'di ni ston par su rang // rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang gnyis la/ thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs myed kyis/ 
291b2(mdo): re re'i zo la bshad par mdzod// ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin// ting 'dzin da 'di'i mying yang ci// gangal gnas shing tshul 'di yang // rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzad// rgyal ba'i sras rnas nyan
291b3(mdo): par 'dod// dbang skur bdag kyang de bzhin no// rdo rje snying po 'jigs myed kyis// 'khor du 'dus pa thas cad dang // tshul 'di bsam gyis kyi khyab dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthul stobs dang // blol
291b4(mdo): 'dzin pa'i mthu' kun dang / nus ma ts+li nus zhes ltas nas/ datho 'dzidi mthul ldan mthong ba dang // rgyal sras thams cad can da' ldan zhes/ thams cad ma 'gyur ma nyam par byos/ 
291b5(mdo): gzhad du gyu pa'i tshul dge' ba/ dbar bskur lnga yul / nas pa dang / mul pa rnams la bshad par ma// theg na pa 'ad can gyi// ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te// de la
291b6(mdo): gnas shing rgyal zas nas// sras dge 'a rab tu sbyin par byed// khye ba'i ning nas rab tu mthong// de dag 'gon pa de bzhin // rtsus kyi mthal sa thun pa nas/ de dag na zhem man to// dge 'a
291b7(mdo): zhes rab tu gsung // 'di ni nas 'byor nga bzang ldan no khal// lam 'dis ded rnams thams cad kyang // ting nge 'dzidad la dbang sbyang ba// thob nas sangs rgyas rdzi byed 'gyur// mag yang sangs rgyas
291b8(mdo): ting 'dzind skyes// theg pa chen po snang ba yid// ting nge 'dzin ga phra sems pa// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba gyis ma yas khyod yul can// la ba bye ba yang ba yis// ma ma
292a1(mdo): nga 'jim sangs rgyas 'khod pa ni/ shin du wa ba'i dngul snyed do// so so rab ris ris tshul na
292a2(mdo): ste// rnam par ton la gangs sa skyes// chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid// de di sang dag sum mthong ba// de kyi mishes kyang dag sadzad// rang bzhin brtags pa phying yin te/ mtshan pa kanan bye dab pa las byung
292a3(mdo): tshub dpapa can mgyed pad// rang bzhi dod kyang pa yin// thams cad lus la kun das gnas// kun kazhi'i dpyir 'byung ba ste// bka chags rnams kyi ri khrod gnas// yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs
292a4(mdo): yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa yis / yid ni gyi ning phyogs rgyas par byas/ nam nas lnga po yus can dag/ 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog na shes lnga li yul rnams ni// sems can gzhin gnas lus can
292a5(mdo): la/ kun gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las// dpa' rlabs pa zhin du rab tu 'byung // rnam shes kun kazhi'amatshor gnas pa/ bag chags rnams kyis rtogs pa rnams// yul gyi rlung gis skyong
292a6(mdo): pa dag/ rnam pa rgyun chad myed par rgyu// chos la bdag khyed mkhas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// bde' bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste// mngon sangs rgyas kyis chos ston to// 
292a7(mdo): phung pa gang zag bdag myed par // rab tu rnam phye mthong bar cing // chos kyi dngos yod ma pa shig par// nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'byung // bdag myed gnyis la mkhas pa nyid// rgyal ba'i sras nas bsgom par
292a8(mdo): byed// rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni// tshul bshad bzhin du yang dag man/ yang dag mtha'i bde 'a myong zhing // snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni// sems can dgos pa'i rgyun bcad pas/ 
292b1(mdo): da ma/ sargyas ldanas 'dra// sems can nams kyi 'di' bskyed/ ched cing rgyas brgyal mam rnams/ bcung nas latul da te/ ji ltar 'das la
292b2(mdo): dge' bamam can ldan pa thong // thub pa rnas pa dang shAdag go/ nye la song srod rgya mdang/ de bzhi la'ar ba'i 'das tsha las/ rgyal ba'i rdzas napas 'byung ba
292b3(mdo): sangs rgyas dri srid ra brnyed cing // lhal yid du 'ong ba yid/ byang chub sems dpal phyirnams dang / wa'i khong du khyad par du// rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor lo can tu khyang par du/ 
292b4(mdo): sum gnas pa'i bdag po dang / rnaMm rnams kyid bzhin te/ pag chen yod tan ldan pa'i// sum can rnams kyis rtag tu ladag// de kyi rgyal ba mas rnams kyis/ theg pa ches
292b5(mdo): bar gyis/ mtha rad kyis bde'i gshegs gnas rab dang / rgyal po dag tu'ang 'gyur bar 'ong // kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang / rnam par byang ba yod pa kun// rtag tu lus can
292b6(mdo): thams cad kyi// sa la kun gzhi'i 'byung ba yin// sbyin ma dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gas// 'anod te skyid pa dbang pos kyang // gtso ba rkyend dang rgyu rnams kyis// 'jig rtend rab tu bsgrub pa byas/ 
292b7(mdo): khyad par can gi rgyu brjod pa// ji ngas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// rgyu myed rang yang byed par 'gyur// bya myed byed pa'ang myed par 'gyur// rnam par byang dang tha myi dang // kun gzhi la tha dang 'gyur ba yin// 
292b8(mdo): de ste rnam byang tha dad na// kun gzhi'i rtag pa ma yin 'gyur// sngon byed 'jig myed rtag pa ste// mtha' bzhi'i rnam par spangs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ sprul pa ye shes smra
293a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa sang / de ku gan 'a brlan pa zis sa/ tho na nams kyis rgyag ses// gser 'gang mkhas pa rnams kyis de/ gseng lam ya du' byas padi/ 
293a2(mdo): ma marnams sa rnam pa mdzes// pan tshun za dang mtshan yin te/ mdu chu ba zhes kyang brjid med kyi/ las kyi 'khar thos yongs bsgyur bas// gser ni gzugs bzhide rab tu gnas/ 
293a3(mdo): chos mthong nas 'byod da ldan pa yi/ mams dang rnam par pa yul/ bdud po sa ni rnyed pa dang // 'byung ba la sa kyang rnam par ldog// 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan kyi/ 
293a4(mdo): so so rang rig mthong ba dang / sbyin dang bdag gi legs 'phag sa pa/ thams cad brjod par myi nus so// ci snyed yul yod ci yang rung // sems dang rnam shes pyod yul du/ 
293a5(mdo): sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang // rnam shes yin te yul gyid do// sems ni rnapa gnyis dngos mu// gzung dang 'dzind par snang ba ste// rdza khru snam bu thogs pa yi// yul nigang yang yod pa
293a6(mdo): myin// ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing // nyi zla ka za'i tshogs kyi rnam// bral ba byed pa rtag tu 'khor// de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi' la// rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni// 
293a7(mdo): rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar// kun gzhi'i snying por bsgrags pa yang // rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin/ rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dag/ brtag par nus pa ma yin dang // 
293b1(mdo): yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin dang // rnal 'byor da thub can rtag tu mthong // yid kyi rnam par yul can ni
293b2(mdo): byis padzas la 'ching ba'i dngos// smig rgyu sna tshogs 'byung ba ste// 'phags
293b3(mdo): pa rnams kyis dri myed gzigs// stong phrag bcu'i gnyis pa'i rgyar rdzo stug po las// ji snyed pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ 
293b4(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ kra ran phrad nyi ba ti// bod skad du/ rgyu gdags pa/ bam po
293b5(mdo): dang po dkon mchog gsusuM la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad pa
293b6(mdo): dedag gis thos pa'i dus she kan/ bcom ldan 'das parase'i drang srongs ba dkyus kyi gnas na bzhugs te// don
293b7(mdo): dge' slong mang po sa 'bra'i leng par 'dus te// 'khod pan sa kyis skabs su rnam 'di lta sa nig glegs te/ dang
293b8(mdo): nabadag kye chen pa'i mtshan sum bcul \u0f7fgnyis
293b9(mdo): rta rin po che dang / bud khyed rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po dang / bdun pa ste/ 
293b10(mdo): zad pa na kyi'o// de'i bye slong rnam pa pong// dpa' ba rgyal ma sa// 
294a1(mdo): mchon gi gzugs dang ldadag/ pa mdag lnga tu 'dos bag no// de'i tshu ma'i chen pol thug pa'i sachen pos lus pa// gnang par rdzo babyed cing 'phel babyed pa 'di nyid
294a2(mdo): chad bskyed cing mtshon gyis bda' pa byed lachos dang mthud ni sgoms pas legs par la ba ste gnas so// gal te snyed nga la kun mas thegs te/ gos dung skyigs bgos das dad pas khyis nas khyim byed pa
294a3(mdo): legs pa kho na rab tu thung nani 'jig rte dang 'did de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ sgra cher grags par 'gyur ba den pos tsha rang to zhes glengs so/ 
294a4(mdo): dge' slong bang po rim 'gro'i khang par 'dus te 'khod pa rnams kyis darti de lta bu glengs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid mo gnas pa ma bzhugs pasalha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi li las
294a5(mdo): 'das pas gsan te// gsan nas kyang bcom ldan 'das bye 'a phreng dang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ rim 'gro lakhA pa pa ga la ba der gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang bcom/ 
294a6(mdo): ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge' 'dun gi kung la/ bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// btsugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge' slong rnaMs la bka' stsal pa// dge' slong dag dge'
294a7(mdo): slor mang po// rim 'gro'i khang par 'tshogs shing 'dus pa khyed kyis skabs su rtam ci zhig glengs// khyed rtam kang ki phyir da ltar 'dus shing 'khod// de skad ces bka' rtsa la nas// dge la
294a8(mdo): srong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun po bdag cag dge la slong mang po rim 'khro 'i kha pa 'dir 'dus shing
294b1(mdo): 'khod pa rnams kyis/ bskabs su bkal mching 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ tshe dang ldad pa dag skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu 'cha gnyis dang ldaldan pa'i skyes bu chen pon/ rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ 
294b2(mdo): kaugazhan du myi 'gyur te// gal te khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na no// 'khor los smyung ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes bgyi' ba nas/ 'jig rten 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgral
294b3(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'gyur te// sgra char grags par 'gyur ba de ni ngo mtshar to zhes// btsun pa bdag cag dka' slong mang po rim 'gro'i khang pa 'dir 'dus shing mchis pa rnams
294b4(mdo): kyis skabs su bka' mchi glengs te/ bka' mchod de'islad du// bdag cag da ltar 'dus shing mchis so// de bskad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
294b5(mdo): dge' slong mang po la bka' stsal pa/ dge' slong dag skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gang dag dang / ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po nai rna ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du myi 'gyur te/ gal te
294b6(mdo): khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthal bzhir rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'jig rten 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
294b7(mdo): rgyas kyi bar du 'gyur te// sna cher grags par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la rtsa gnyis po de dag ga pa yin// de skad ces bka' rtsa lang pa dang / dge' slong dag bcom ldan 'das ka la
294b8(mdo): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa chos rnams kyi rtsa bdi/ bcom ldan 'das lags/ stond pa ni bcom ldan 'das lags/ 
295a1(mdo): rton pa mi bcom ldan 'das lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid dge 'aslong rnams leg legs par bka' rtsa lang du gsol// bcom ldan 'das la thos na dge' slong rnams 'dzin
295a2(mdo): par 'gyur lags so dge' slong dag de'i phyir legs par nyon la shi nad tu yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o// dge' slong dag skyes ze chen pon rkang pa shi na tu gnas pa ste// 'di lta ste rkang pa sha
295a3(mdo): nad tu gnas pan/ sa la mnyam par gnon te dge' slong dag 'dir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu' de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi 'ogag 'thal nas kyang / 'khor lo tsa thos stong pa dang bcas// gru lung
295a4(mdo): dang bcas pa rnam pa bams cad yongs su rdzogs par byung ste/ dge' slong dag 'didi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dgel song dag skyes bu chen po'i mtshan med do// song mo ring ba ste/ 
295a5(mdo): dge' slong 'di ni skyes bu chen po yin mtshan yin no// dge 'grong dag skyes bu chen po// rkang pa'i rting pa yangs ba skye/ pa ste// dgel slong dag 'dir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// 
295a6(mdo): dge' slong da/ skyes da pa/ pa dang ga parda pa da ra te dpe nga ba'idum pa sna pang 'jug pa 'i mag pa gnyis dang / dngas gnyis bad so// dga' bang nga/ 'di
295a7(mdo): tham/ dod khye bu man da/ dge yang ma pal ma ma 'o// 'a / da kyi'o/ 
295b1(mdo): chen po de ra ba dgas men la'i sA bu ste// dge'aslong dag 'dod skyes bu chen po'im can yin no// dge' slong dag skyes bu chen po'i lus ma 'dud pa ste// lus ma btud par lag pas bus mo slebs/ 
295b2(mdo): shong kun tu slebs pa ste/ dge' slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshad yin no// dge' slong dag skyes bu chen po ni 'doms kyi sa basbubs su nus pa ste// dper klab pa che cang shes sam/ rkatsa
295b3(mdo): shes skyed do// bar 'dug pa lta bur de'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub ste// dge' slong dka 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge' slong dag 'di skyes bu chen po ni shing n+ya kro da ltar chu zhe ka' pa
295b4(mdo): ste lus ji tsam pa 'dom gyi tshad kyang de tsam la// 2dom gyi tshad ni ji tsam pa lus kyi tshad kyang de tsam ste/ dgel slong da / 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge' slong dag skyes
295b5(mdo): bu chen poni lus kyi ba spu gyen du 'phags pa dang / dge' srong dag skyes bu chen po ni spre re re nas skye ba ste/ lus kyis rnams rer nas skye zhing 'jam ne reg na bde' ba dang // mthon ting du
295b6(mdo): 'dug pa dang / 'khyil ba dang / g.yas su 'khyil pa ste// dge' slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge' slong dag skyes bu chen po'i lus kyi pakas pa kasder 'dra bas na// gser
295b7(mdo): kyi mdog can yin te// dge' slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge' slong dag skyes bu chen po'i 'od 'dom gang dang ldan te/ dge' slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dgel
295b8(mdo): srong dag skyes bu chen po ni lus kyi pags pa srab pa ste/ pakas pa srab pas na lus la rdul dang dri mas kyi chags te/ dge' slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dgel slong dag skyes bya
296a1(mdo): chen po ni mdun mtho' ba ste/ lus mdun mtho' bar gyur pa ni lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis dang / thal gong gnyis dang lhag pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan/ 
296a2(mdo): yin no// dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bya chen po thal gong rgyas pa te/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin/ dge slong dag skyes bu chen po ni ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba ste/ 
296a3(mdo): dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag skyes bu chen po'i ni lus che zhing drang ba ste/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yino/ dge slong bdag
296a4(mdo): skyes bu chen po'i ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa te/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag skyes bu chen po ni so bzhi bcu yod pa ste/ dge slong bdag 'di ni
296a5(mdo): skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag skyes bya chen po ni so mnyam pa ste/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan yin no// dge slong dag
296a6(mdo): skyes bu chen po'i so theg bzang ba ste/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no/ dge slong bdag skyes bu chen po ni mche ba shin tu kar ba de/ dge slong bdag 'di
296a7(mdo): skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong dag skyes bu chen po'i 'gram pa seng ge 'grob ste/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag
296a8(mdo): skyes bu chen po ni ro tho ba'i mchog snyed bte/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yi no/ dge slong dag skyes bu chen po'i na lce ring zhing srab ba te/ 'di lta ste/ 
296b1(mdo): lce ring zhing srab pa'i na/ kha na phyung nas lce skra'i mtsham su thug pa'i kha thams cad khebs te/ dge slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong skyes bu chen po ni tshangs pa'i
296b2(mdo): dbyangs bya ka la bying ka'i sgra ltar snyan cing rnga bo che'i sgra lta bu dang ldan te/ dge slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag skye bu chen po ni myig mngon
296b3(mdo): ting lta te/ dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu'i mtshan yin no// dge slong dag skyes bu chen po ni pa'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan te/ dge slong dag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu che
296b4(mdo): bo'i mtshan yin no// dge slong bdag skyes bu chen po ni mgo bo'i gtsug tor dang ldan te dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no/ dge slong bdag skyes bya
296b5(mdo): chen po'i smin 'tsham su mdzod ze skyes pa dkar la 'jam la reg na bde ba dang / g.ya su 'khyil ba dang ldan te dge slong bdag 'di ni skyes bu chen po dang ldan skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
296b6(mdo): yin no// dge slong bdag skyes bya chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu rtsa gnyis de dag yin te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan de dag dang ldan na/ rnams pa gnyi su 'gyur gi gzhan du myi 'gyur te/ galte
296b7(mdo): khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na naM/ 'khor los gyur pa'i po mtha' gzhir rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rin por che sna bdun
296b8(mdo): ni 'di lta bu yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin por che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rje rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud myed rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin por che dang / bdun pa ste rjen
296b9(mdo): rin por che'i/ de'i bya stong thams pa yod de/ dpa' brtul phod ga/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gi sde rab tu 'jom pasha stag go/ de ni brgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po
297a1(mdo): ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba myed cing 'che ba myed pa'i'adi nyid chad pa myed cing mtshon gyi bdal the myed la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pa'i legs par phab te/ ni gnas so// gal te spa dang
297a2(mdo): khaspu rnams bregs te/ gos dur spogs dag bgos nas/ dad pa'i khyim nas khyim myed par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ba ni 'jig rten 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang yi dag
297a3(mdo): papar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur te/ sgra cher sgrags par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i de skad gsungs nas/ ston pa'i gzhan yang 'di
297a4(mdo): skad ces bka' stsal to/ thub chen bdag nyid rab bsgoms pa/ lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa'i/ lus la mtshan rnams yod pa dag/ nga'i rab tu bshad par bya/ de'i rkang pa shin tu gnas/ sa la
297a5(mdo): mnyam par gnod pa yin/ de rkang gnyis kyi 'og 'thil na/ 'khor lo rab tu dbyibs legs yod/ lag sor yang ni ring ba ste/ rkang pa rting ba yangs par ldan/ lag pa rkang pa dra ba'i 'brel/ 
297a6(mdo): shing bal lta bu'i 'jam pa yin/ de'i long bur tshigs myi mngon/ myi mchog rjengang e na ya/ lus ni thur du ma btud par/ lag pa'i spus mo'i lha nga slebs/ 'dom gyi sba ba sbub su nub/ 
297a7(mdo): n+ya gro ltar chu zheng gang/ ba spu rnams ni gyen du phyogs/ de spu g.yas 'khyil ba re re skye/ gser gi kha dog 'dra ba dang / 'dom gang 'ad ni kun nas 'khor/ lus kyi pags pa sra ba dang / 
297a8(mdo): de'i bdun po mthong ba yin/ srog rus bdag kyang sha yi rgyas/ ro stod seng ge 'dra ba srin/ lus ni che zhing drang ba dang / de'i phrag pa'i dbyibs kyang legs/ so ni bzhi bcu yod pa ste/ yongasu chad ni/ 
297b1(mdo): nams pa myed/ mnyam zhing zags kyang bzang ba ste/ de'i so rnams dbyibs kyang legs/ mche ba rab dkar seng ge'i 'gram/ ro rnams bro ba'i mchog rnyed pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ 
297b2(mdo): myig ni mthon ting brdzi ma/ de'i mgo ni gtsug tor ldan/ de ni sbyin 'tshams mdzod spu yod/ drung ltar dkar zhing mdzes pa yin/ thub chen bdag nyid rab bsgom pa/ lus kyi za ma 'dzin pa yin/ 
297b3(mdo): lus la mtshan rnaMs yod pa ni/ sum bcud rtsa gnyis de dag yin/ gang gis lus la mtshan btags rnaMs/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan 'gyur ba/ de lta bu ni rgyal gyur nas/ sa'i steng ni dul par
297b4(mdo): byed/ yang na byang chub mchog kyang thob/ dran pa dang ldan zhing bu mang la/ nad myed shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang bgo ba dang / mal cha stan rnaMs rnyed par 'gyur/ de ni myi phyed la
297b5(mdo): dang ldan/ lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong / de lta bu ni lha myi rnaMs/ rjesu mthun par byed par 'gyur/ de lta bu'i myi dag ni/ chos kyi dbang gi mchog yin no// myi mnyam pa dang zla myed
297b6(mdo): dang / mtshungs myed rnams par 'dren par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon
297b7(mdo): par dga'o// ci'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' skyes bu chen po'i mtshan shin tu gnas pa thob ce na/ smras pa/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ sngon gyi srid pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / 
297b8(mdo): sngon gyi lus dang / sngon gyi bdag nyid thob pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rab gzhan dag dang // 
298a1(mdo): 'am/ btul zhugs sas/ yo dpa gang dang gang yang dag par blangs te// gnas par gyur kyang rungaste// de tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang yi das de la yi dam mang po bgyur na ci / yin
298a2(mdo): btad po gyur to// yi dpa brtan par gyur nas kyang // rgya g.yo kun tu rgya g.yo// kun tu rab tu phyi g.yo'o// mya 'gul kun tu gyi 'gul kun tu rab tu kyi 'gul to// kyi 'khrugs kun tu kyo 'khrugs
298a3(mdo): kun tu rab tu myi 'khrugs so// myi 'phrogs kun tu myi 'phrogs kun tu rab tu myi 'phrogs te// de las de dang / yang dag/ bar blangs pa de lta bu dang // yang dag par bzung ba de lta bu
298a4(mdo): lus zhig nas// dka' ldan gi lha rnams dang skal mnyam pa skye'o// der skyes nas/ ring po ma lon par// dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha sngar skyes pa rnams las// lha'i gnas gsum
298a5(mdo): rgyas 'phags te// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i tshe dang / lha'i kha dog dang / lha'i grags pas 'phags so// de de mchi'i tshad rdzi tsam pa de srid du gnas nas// de nas shi 'phos te// 
298a6(mdo): khams 'dir gyi rnams dang // skal pa mnyam par skye'o// de 'dir rgyal po 'i lo zang ngam// mdun na 'don gyi khyim du skye bar 'gyur te// de byang chub sems dpa' des skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rkang pa
298a7(mdo): shin tu gnas pa nyed par 'gyur ro// de yis las na 'di yid te// gas te khyim par 'dug cing khyim pa na gnas nano// 'khor los sprur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi rgyal 'azhis chos kyi rdu
298b1(mdo): po chos dang ldan pa// rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu yin te// 'khor lo rin po che nas/ bdun pa ste/ blon po rin po che'i bar rnams so// de'i bu stong
298b2(mdo): tham sa yod de// dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag gi mchog gi kazhugs dang ldan pa// pha rol sde rab tu'i joms pa sha stag go// de ni rgya mtshe tshe la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa// gnod par sngo pa myed
298b3(mdo): cing 'tshe ba byed pa 'di nyid chad pa myed cing // mtshon gi bda' ba myed la// chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas la// rgyal srid de la sgra 'am phyir rgol ba'am/ rgyal po zla ba'am/ 
298b4(mdo): sa'i bdag po 'am/ rgyal rigs kyis// myi g.yo kun tu myig/ yo// kun tu rab tu myi g.yolo// myi 'gul kun tu myi 'gul/ kun tu rab tu myi 'gul lo// myi 'azhugs/ kun tu myi
298b5(mdo): 'khrugs// kun tu rab tu phyi 'khrugs so// myi 'phrogs/ kun tu myi 'phrogs/ kun tu rab tu myi 'phrogs so// bcu na mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu rnams dang / blon po rnams
298b6(mdo): dang / gtso bo dang / dpag ki ru dang / grong gyi dang / yul gi gyi rnams kyis// bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// kal te swa dang kha sU rnams bregs te/ gos du
298b7(mdo): phyag dag bkas nas// dad pas khyim nas// khyil myed par legs pa kho na sa byung na ni// 'jig rted du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 
298b8(mdo): sgra cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te// dge sbyong gi tshul des// dge sbyong ngam// bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam// tshangs pa'am gzhan yang rung bas chos dang mthun pas// myi ga yo
299a1(mdo): kun tu rab tu myi ka yo lo// myi 'gul kun tu myi 'gul// kun tu rab tu myi 'akul lo// myi 'khrugs/ kun tu myi 'khrugs// kun tu rab tu myi 'khrugs so// myi 'phrogs/ kun tu myi 'phrogs
299a2(mdo): kun tu rab tu myi 'phrogs so// dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge snyen rnams dang / dge snyen ma rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam ka
299a3(mdo): lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / gyi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang // srin po rnams dang / kyi rnams dang / myi ma yin pa rnams dang / bkur sting lta byed// 
299a4(mdo): bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de// 'di ni de'i snga ji ltas yin no// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang tshe bde gshegs zhabs ni shin tu gnas pa
299a5(mdo): yi// mtshan ni gang gis rnyed gyur de dag mnyan par gyis// bden dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs gtong ba dang // chos dge/ bde dang skyid pa gzhan rnams gang yin pa// nyid kyis yang dag
